T02D2626:1b-1: bha ga ba ti sarba du rga ti pa ri
T02D2626:1b-2: shodha ni te dzo r'a dza ta th'a ga t'a
T02D2626:1b-3: ya aarha te samya ksam buddh'a ya mah'a ta ndra
T02D2626:1b-4: r'a dza by'a khya sunda r'a aa langk'a ra n'a
T02D2626:1b-6: bcom ldan [dd] 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T02D2626:1b-7: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song
T02D2626:1b-8: thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal
T02D2626:1b-9: po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnam par bshad
T02D2626:1b-10: pa mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba /
T02D2626:1b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D2626:1b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal phyag na
T02D2626:1b-14: thugs ni rnam dag chos kyi dbyings nas mi bskyod kyang ;
T02D2626:1b-15: / sku ni rnam par longs spyod rin chen gzhal yas nas //
T02D2626:1b-16: thub pa'i 'od zer spros pas 'gro ba'i don sgrub sbyor //
T02D2626:1b-17: bde gshegs 'khor los sgyur rgyal thabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2626:1b-18: rdo rje'i spyan can khyed ni rin chen bdag nyid 'dzin //
T02D2626:1b-19: dam chos dkar pos 'gro ba ma lus rnams kyi ni //
T02D2626:1b-20: las kyi sgrib sbyong sgrol mdzad mdzes pa'i bum pa can //
T02D2626:1b-21: shes rab padma lta bu'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2626:2a-0: @2a * // 'gro kun don la sems pas rgyal po ltar bzhugs shing //
T02D2626:2a-1: pha dang ma ltar chags pas legs pa'i bzhin yang ston //
T02D2626:2a-2: rin chen rgyal mtshan btsugs pas nyi ma'i 'od zer khyab //
T02D2626:2a-3: bde ba dam pas bzhad pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2626:2a-4: chos kyi ral gris srid pa'i 'khor lo gcod //
T02D2626:2a-5: sngags rnams gsung zhing 'gro ba'i las la brtson //
T02D2626:2a-6: dam tshig go bgos 'chi bdag mche ba gcod //
T02D2626:2a-7: phyag rnams bsdams par phyar la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2626:2a-8: 'gro rnams yid 'phrog sgeg pas phreng thogs nas //
T02D2626:2a-9: snyan pa'i glu len bde ba'i yan lag bskyod //
T02D2626:2a-10: bung ba ltar gnag mun pa'i tshogs sel mdzad //
T02D2626:2a-11: autpala gzugs dri ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2626:2a-12: thugs rje lcags kyus bdud kyi zhags 'phrog cing //
T02D2626:2a-13: rdo rje tho bas 'khor ba'i lcags sgrog gcod //
T02D2626:2a-14: gsung gi dril bus ma rig gnyid las ni //
T02D2626:2a-15: gang dag slong mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2626:2a-16: dpa' bar 'gro la sogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2626:2a-17: zhi las khro bo ngo mtshar dpe med ldan //
T02D2626:2a-18: rang sangs rgyas pas nyon mongs dgra bcom zhing //
T02D2626:2a-19: bde ster bla ma gsum la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2626:2a-20: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rin chen gter mdzod las //
T02D2626:2b-0: 'gro kun snang med @2b mun pas rab bsgribs pas //
T02D2626:2b-1: 'dod pa'i dbang gis de nyid ma rnyed par //
T02D2626:2b-2: 'khrul pa'i dbang gis dug sdong la sogs rnyed //
T02D2626:2b-3: longs spyad pa yis bde 'dod sdug bsngal rmongs //
T02D2626:2b-4: de rnams mar mes de sgo bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2626:2b-5: rdo rje tshig gis mtshan pa'i zhal snga nas //
T02D2626:2b-6: 'bad pas drin thob nus pa'i dbang gis brtsam /
T02D2626:2b-7: de la gang dag rgyal bas gsungs pa'i don //
T02D2626:2b-8: zab mo'i dgongs pa ji bzhin rtogs sam ci //
T02D2626:2b-9: de lta min na phal dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02D2626:2b-10: mun pas mun pa bsal bar 'gyur ram ci //
T02D2626:2b-11: mar mes mar me snang bar bya mi dgos //
T02D2626:2b-12: dang po'i tshig la de ltar rtog skye na //
T02D2626:2b-13: mkha' la sbrang bus mthar phyin mi nus kyang //
T02D2626:2b-14: 'bad pa'i dbang gis rang gi spyod yul bgrod //
T02D2626:2b-15: de bzhin rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho la //
T02D2626:2b-16: bdag blo dman pas ji bzhin mi nus kyang //
T02D2626:2b-17: yid ches mtshan mas ji ltar nus rtsom pa //
T02D2626:2b-18: rnyed pa'i phyir min grags pa'i phyir ma yin //
T02D2626:2b-19: nga rgyal phyir min bkur sti'i phyir ma yin //
T02D2626:2b-20: 'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i bka' las kyang //
T02D2626:2b-21: snying po las kyang snying po'i mchog gyur pa //
T02D2626:2b-22: 'gro kun rgyud sbyong rgyud rgyal 'grel 'di ni //
T02D2626:2b-23: rnal 'byor rgyud rnams bla ma dang //
T02D2626:2b-24: bla med pha rol phyin gzhung dang //
T02D2626:2b-25: gang 'dir gsungs pa'i gzhung gi don //
T02D2626:2b-26: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen gsum //
T02D2626:2b-27: shes rab rdo rjes legs phug nas //
T02D2626:2b-28: rig pa'i skud pa grims bkal bas //
T02D2626:2b-29: legs par brgyus pa mdzes pa'i rgyan //
T02D2626:2b-30: skyes bu gang gi lus la 'dogs //
T02D2626:2b-31: de ni rgyan mchog bla na med //
T02D2626:2b-33: / de la 'dir ni rgyud gsum dang //
T02D2626:2b-34: rgyud gnyis dag ni rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2626:2b-35: de rgyu de rkyen 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2626:2b-36: bsnyen bkur rim gro yan lag ldan //
T02D2626:2b-37: dpag bsam shing zhes grags pa yi //
T02D2626:2b-38: brtag pa yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D2626:2b-39: de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
T02D2626:2b-40: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
T02D2626:2b-41: pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
T02D2626:2b-44: skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba /
T02D2626:2b-45: bla na med pa'i ston pa des dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gnas skabs na /
T02D2626:3a-0: sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang @3a * //
T02D2626:3a-1: rgya bar bya'o zhes dam bca' ba'i tshig rgya chen po mdzad do //
T02D2626:3a-2: des mngon par rtogs pa las sems can thams cad la mos pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2626:3a-3: dbang po rno rtul gyi tshul dang sbyar nas /
T02D2626:3a-4: rnam par thar ba'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig gsungs te /
T02D2626:3a-5: de la kha cig tu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus chos ston /
T02D2626:3a-6: kha cig tu sprul pa'i skus chos ston /
T02D2626:3a-7: kha cig tu sprul pa'i sprul pas chos ston to //
T02D2626:3a-8: de la longs spyod rdzogs pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2626:3a-9: theg pa thun mong pa dang theg pa khyad par can gyi tshul lo //
T02D2626:3a-10: theg pa thun mong ba'i tshul ni dga' ldan gyi
T02D2626:3a-11: gnas su bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2626:3a-12: kyis sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2626:3a-13: dang / lha dang klu la sogs pa rnams la chos ston pa'o //
T02D2626:3a-14: theg pa khyad par can gyi tshul ni de bzhin
T02D2626:3a-15: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang
T02D2626:3a-16: ba rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs te
T02D2626:3a-17: / bde mchog 'khor lo la sogs pa ston to //
T02D2626:3a-18: de la blo chung bshes rab zhan pa kha cig ni //
T02D2626:3a-19: theg pa chen po gsang sngags zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin zhing /
T02D2626:3a-20: gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pas bshad pa ste /
T02D2626:3a-21: 'jig rten pa rnams bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la
T02D2626:3a-22: brten nas dpyod de de ltar gnod sbyin la sogs
T02D2626:3a-23: pa la yang 'jig rten na bcom ldan 'das zhes
T02D2626:3a-24: brjod pas na / de rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos
T02D2626:3a-25: dang 'gal ba'i phyir chos ma yin no zhes pa
T02D2626:3a-26: brjod pas na / dang / kha cig ni gnod sbyin la sogs pas kyang ma bshad la /
T02D2626:3a-27: 'dod chags chen po'i lha gar gyi dbang phyug la
T02D2626:3a-28: sogs pas 'khrig pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
T02D2626:3a-30: de lta ma yin na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
T02D2626:3a-31: gi zhal nas dam pa'i chos rin po che gsungs
T02D2626:3a-32: pa la chos nyid kyis gsungs pa dang 'gal ba
T02D2626:3a-33: ni thabs mi mkhas pa ste /
T02D2626:3a-34: the tshom gyi dbang gis sems can grol bar mi
T02D2626:3a-35: 'gyur ba'i phyir dper na smyon pa'i tshig lta bu'o
T02D2626:3a-36: zhes 'dod na de dag ni mi dge ba'i bshes
T02D2626:3a-37: gnyen can du rig par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:3a-38: gzhan du gsang sngags 'ba' zhig la mngon par dpyad
T02D2626:3a-39: pa rnams rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin dag ni drang ba'i
T02D2626:3a-40: don gyi mdo sde yin la gsang sngags ni de
T02D2626:3b-0: bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag @3b pa'i snying po
T02D2626:3b-1: bsgrub par bya'o zhes 'dod pa dang de dag la
T02D2626:3b-2: sogs pa phan tshun du 'khrul pa'i gzhir gyur cing
T02D2626:3b-3: / kha na mtho ba'i tshig dang log par lta
T02D2626:3b-4: ba sna tshogs pa 'byung ba yod pa de la
T02D2626:3b-5: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyir chos thams cad
T02D2626:3b-6: rgyud rnam pa gsum du gsungs so //
T02D2626:3b-7: de la sku'i rgyud ni 'dul ba'i mdo la sogs pa'o //
T02D2626:3b-8: gsung gi rgyud ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2626:3b-9: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sogs pa'o //
T02D2626:3b-10: thugs kyi rgyud ni theg pa chen po gsang sngags so //
T02D2626:3b-11: gang 'dir rgyud rnam pa gsum ni gang zag rnam
T02D2626:3b-12: pa gsum gyi dbang du mdzad nas bka' stsal te
T02D2626:3b-13: / byis pa rab rib can dang mkhas pa rab rib can dang dag par lta ba'o //
T02D2626:3b-14: yang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas ni mos pa ji lta ba dang /
T02D2626:3b-15: spyod pa ji lta ba dang /
T02D2626:3b-16: 'dul ba'i zhing ji lta ba dang /
T02D2626:3b-17: de dag gi lam ji lta ba bzhin du thabs
T02D2626:3b-18: sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa ni ci nas kyang
T02D2626:3b-19: sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T02D2626:3b-21: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po lta bu'o //
T02D2626:3b-22: de ltar bram ze la sogs pa khrus dang gtsang sbra dang /
T02D2626:3b-23: gos kyi cha byad mdzes pa dang //
T02D2626:3b-24: smyung ba za gcig pa la mos pa rnams 'dul
T02D2626:3b-25: ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dul ba dang bya ba'i
T02D2626:3b-26: rgyud la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2626:3b-27: yang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02D2626:3b-28: smra byed kyi mkhan po nam mkha'i gos can la
T02D2626:3b-29: sogs pa 'dul ba'i ched du shes rab kyi pha
T02D2626:3b-30: rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2626:3b-31: gang du spyod pa thun mong ba bzang po la
T02D2626:3b-32: bsten cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i phun sum tshogs
T02D2626:3b-33: pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa
T02D2626:3b-34: 'dul ba'i ched du gzhung 'di la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2626:3b-35: so // gzhan du 'dod chags chen po'i sems can
T02D2626:3b-36: gzhan gyis 'dul ba'i thabs mi mnga' ba rnams 'dul
T02D2626:3b-37: ba'i ched du spyod pa rlabs po che la brten
T02D2626:3b-38: pa gsang sngags bla na med pa rnams gsungs so
T02D2626:3b-39: so // // de la 'dir kha cig rtog pa rnam pa gnyis skye ste /
T02D2626:3b-40: 'di ltar thabs kun gyis ni mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2626:3b-41: 'tshang mi rgyal gcig la gzud ba'i ched du gzhan
T02D2626:3b-42: dag kyang gsungs pa yin nam snyam pa dang /
T02D2626:3b-43: lus kyi kun tu spyod pas ni 'tshang mi rgyal
T02D2626:3b-44: sems kyi kun tu spyod pa rgya chen pos 'tshang
T02D2626:3b-45: rgyab kho na yin pas bdag cag gi thabs su
T02D2626:4a-2: kha cig ni bde bar gshegs pas ni chos thams
T02D2626:4a-3: cad du 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa bkag
T02D2626:4a-4: pas ni bdag cag gi thabs su gzhan 'gyur ro
T02D2626:4a-5: snyam na de yang 'dus pa rin po che'i mdzod
T02D2626:4a-6: las nad pa'i khams dang sbyar nas /
T02D2626:4a-7: dug la sogs pa'i gnod pa yang//
T02D2626:4a-8: sman gzhan rkyen gyis dug bsad nas //
T02D2626:4a-10: de bzhin gang du 'gal bstan pa //
T02D2626:4a-11: de la chos kyi de nyid rtogs //
T02D2626:4a-12: goms pa'i mthu yis rnam par thar //
T02D2626:4a-14: de bas na gang dang gang gis 'dul ba'i sems
T02D2626:4a-15: can de dag la de dang de nyid zhi bar
T02D2626:4a-16: byed pa dang de dag las mchog tu gyur pa'i
T02D2626:4a-17: chos yongs su gsungs pas sdig pa'i rkyen du mi
T02D2626:4a-19: de la sems kyi kun tu spyod pa 'ba' zhig
T02D2626:4a-20: kyang ma yin pa ni sdong po bkod pa las
T02D2626:4a-21: / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog kyang //
T02D2626:4a-22: gang dang gang gi yul dag tu //
T02D2626:4a-23: lus spyod la sogs kun bsdams nas //
T02D2626:4a-24: sdig pa'i rgyu ni mi sogs 'gyur //
T02D2626:4a-26: de bas na bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa'i gang
T02D2626:4a-27: zag rnams kyis kyang yul gang dang gang du spyod
T02D2626:4a-28: pa gang dang gang grogs gang dang gang rnams kyi
T02D2626:4a-29: ched du de dag gi kun tu spyod pa dang
T02D2626:4a-31: de dag dang rjes su mthun pa las de dag
T02D2626:4a-32: dga' ba'i sems skyes pa nyid dge ba'i mchog go
T02D2626:4a-33: // gzhan du rjes su mi mthun pa las ni de dag zhe sdang bar byed /
T02D2626:4a-34: 'phya bar byed tshig rtsub po smra bar byed de /
T02D2626:4a-35: de dag ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:4a-36: de la gang dag theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags
T02D2626:4a-37: bla na med pa la smod pa dang de dag
T02D2626:4a-38: sun 'byin pas ni bskal pa chen po grangs med
T02D2626:4a-39: pa gsum du mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar
T02D2626:4a-40: skye ba ste / de yang rnam smin bstan pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D2626:4a-41: gang zhig zab mo'i don dag la //
T02D2626:4a-42: rgyal ba'i bka' min zhes brjod pa //
T02D2626:4a-43: mnar med pa ru ltung gyur nas //
T02D2626:4a-45: nges par skye bar the tshom med //
T02D2626:4a-47: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2626:4a-48: rab 'byor skyes bu gti mug can dag legs par
T02D2626:4a-49: gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas
T02D2626:4b-0: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu @4b phyin pa
T02D2626:4b-1: la sogs pa zab mo'i don rnams sun 'byin par
T02D2626:4b-2: sems pa de ni sdig pa'i rtsa ba chen pos
T02D2626:4b-3: ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D2626:4b-4: gsang sngags la rab tu spyod pas kyang legs par
T02D2626:4b-5: gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba sun dbyung bar rnam pa
T02D2626:4b-6: thams cad du rung ba nyid ma yin te /
T02D2626:4b-7: thar pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /
T02D2626:4b-9: kun gyi yul gyur rtsa bzhi'i zhing //
T02D2626:4b-10: 'di gnas bar du bstan pa gnas //
T02D2626:4b-13: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i le'u las kyang //
T02D2626:4b-14: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02D2626:4b-15: rnal 'byor pas ni spang mi bya //
T02D2626:4b-17: de la kha cig ni 'dul ba la sogs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa ni rgyu'o //
T02D2626:4b-18: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa ni rkyen no //
T02D2626:4b-19: sngags kyi theg pa ni 'bras bu'o zhes 'dod na /
T02D2626:4b-20: de ni rigs pa ma yin zhing lung dang 'gal ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:4b-21: kla klo dang sred med kyi bu'i tshig bzhin te /
T02D2626:4b-23: theg pa gang gi sgor zhugs pas //
T02D2626:4b-24: de yis de yi 'bras bu mthong //
T02D2626:4b-26: de la gang dag phan tshun dang theg pa gsang
T02D2626:4b-27: sngags spyod pa rnams kyis ni legs par gsungs pa'i
T02D2626:4b-28: chos 'dul ba spyad du mi rung ste rtog pa
T02D2626:4b-30: dper na rma bya dang shi ri sha'i shing bzhin
T02D2626:4b-31: no zhes pa dang de bzhin du 'dul ba la
T02D2626:4b-32: rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gis bla na med
T02D2626:4b-33: pa'i gsang sngags spyad du mi rung ste dper na
T02D2626:4b-34: sprul dang phag rgod lta bu'o zhes smra na de
T02D2626:4b-35: dag ni rigs pa ma yin te lung rigs dang
T02D2626:4b-36: 'gal ba'i phyir dper na srin po khyab 'jug gi
T02D2626:4b-37: chung ma bzhin te lung las kyang /
T02D2626:4b-38: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa che //
T02D2626:4b-39: sngags rnams gsung zhing 'khar gsil bsnams //
T02D2626:4b-40: de nyid sgom zhing gso sbyong brtson //
T02D2626:4b-41: de ni bde bar gshegs dang 'dra //
T02D2626:4b-43: sgyu ma brtag ba'i rgyud las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D2626:4b-44: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la //
T02D2626:4b-45: rten bcas gsang sngags sdom pa 'dzin /
T02D2626:4b-46: de ni shes rab thabs ldan pas //
T02D2626:4b-47: chos kyi sku ni mngon du byed //
T02D2626:4b-49: de la gang zag gi dngos pos ni chos kyi dngos po rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2626:5a-0: dus kyi snyigs ma la sems can gyi snyigs mar gyur ba'i @5a * //
T02D2626:5a-1: dbang gis gang zag kha cig ni rang nyid nyon
T02D2626:5a-2: mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pas theg pa chen po
T02D2626:5a-3: gsang sngags la tshig bkal nas spyod pa la sogs
T02D2626:5a-4: brlang por spyod pa dang bud med la sogs pa

T02D2626:5a-6: pa dang / rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos po
T02D2626:5a-7: rnams za ba la dam tshig gi zas su rung

T02D2626:42a-56: bcas pa bris te de'i dbus su khyab 'jug 'khor
T02D2626:42a-57: dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42a-58: byang phyogs su ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gru
T02D2626:42b-0: bzhi @42b pa'i gzugs la kha dog ser po gling
T02D2626:42b-1: g-yog dang bcas pa bris te /
T02D2626:42b-2: de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-3: de nas cha lnga la gling drug tu bcas pa der 'gro ba rigs drug dgod par bya ste /
T02D2626:42b-4: lha'i gnas su lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam bdud rtsi'i bum pa'am /
T02D2626:42b-5: lha lha zhes pa'i phreng ba dgod par bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-6: lha ma yin gyi gnas su lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs ris sam /
T02D2626:42b-8: lha ma yin lha ma yin zhes bya ba'i phreng ba dgod bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-9: mi'i gnas su mi'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i
T02D2626:42b-10: rgyal po'i cha lugs sam 'khor lo'am mi mi zhes
T02D2626:42b-11: bya ba'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-12: dud 'gro'i gnas su ni dud 'gro'i rgyal po mtha' yas sam /
T02D2626:42b-13: seng ge'am dud 'gro dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i phreng ba dgod par bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-14: yi dags kyi gnas su ni yi dags kyi rgyal
T02D2626:42b-15: po kha rab tu 'bar ba lcags kyi thu lum
T02D2626:42b-16: rab tu 'bar ba'am yi dags yi dags zhes pa'i
T02D2626:42b-18: dmyal ba'i gnas su ni dmyal ba'i rgyal po chu srin gdong can sh'a la ma li'i sdong po'am /
T02D2626:42b-19: dmyal ba dmyal ba zhes bya ba'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-20: de la sring mo bzhi dang /
T02D2626:42b-22: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni gling bzhi po rnams kyi
T02D2626:42b-23: bar bar du bud med kyi gzugs su cung zad
T02D2626:42b-24: khros pa dang / rab tu khros pa'i bzhin gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-25: srid ba'i 'khor lo rnams kyi bar du ni ri
T02D2626:42b-26: dang shing dang 'bab chu dang khyim dang dur khrod
T02D2626:42b-27: dang nya dang / gtsug lag khang la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-28: de la gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du rdo rje dang padma dang /
T02D2626:42b-29: 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas 'khor bar bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-30: 'phags pa rnams kyi 'khor lo ni me tog gi phreng bas bskor bar bya'o//
T02D2626:42b-31: 'jig rten ba'i gtso bo'i 'khor lo ni dpag bsam gyi shing gis bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-32: gling bzhi'ang de bzhin du byas te /
T02D2626:42b-33: srid pa'i 'khor lo ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyis bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2626:42b-34: de'i phyi rol du ni rlung dang gser dang chu'i phreng bas bskor bar bya ste /
T02D2626:43a-1: dag thams cad kyi kha dog dang /
T02D2626:43a-3: gdan la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar blta bar bya ste /
T02D2626:43a-5: de la gang dag 'di skad du sa la gnas
T02D2626:43a-6: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba la rdo rje
T02D2626:43a-7: sems dpa' la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi nang
T02D2626:43a-8: du bkod la / byams pa la sogs pa rta
T02D2626:43a-9: babs kyi khyams su dgod pa ni rigs pa ma
T02D2626:43a-11: de ni shin tu rmongs par gyur pa yin te /
T02D2626:43a-12: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' nges pa'i don gyi mdo
T02D2626:43a-13: rnams la the tshom za ba rnams la lan gyi
T02D2626:43a-14: tshig sbyin par bya ba yang ma yin na 'on
T02D2626:43a-15: kyang 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni
T02D2626:43a-16: 'khor los sgyur ba lnga la dgongs nas byang chub
T02D2626:43a-17: sems dpar btags kyi thog ma med pa nas yang
T02D2626:43a-18: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin la /
T02D2626:43a-19: byams pa la sogs pa ni bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
T02D2626:43a-21: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog //
T02D2626:43a-22: rdzu 'phrul che ba'i sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2626:43a-23: zhes khyad par gyi tshig gsungs pa dang /
T02D2626:43a-24: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
T02D2626:43a-25: byams pa la sogs dgod par bya //
T02D2626:43a-26: zhes khyad par phye ba nyid kyis yon tan gyi khyad par yod par shes par bya ste /
T02D2626:43a-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las kyang /
T02D2626:43a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2626:43a-29: rab 'byor mi bskyod pa'i drung na gnas pa'i byang
T02D2626:43a-30: chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba'
T02D2626:43a-31: zhig 'dus pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D2626:43a-32: pa'i phyir ro // de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2626:43a-33: bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang //
T02D2626:43a-34: gdugs dang rnga ma lnga ldi dang //
T02D2626:43a-35: 'phan dang sna tshogs na bza' mchog //
T02D2626:43a-36: gser la sogs pa'i bum pa mchog /
T02D2626:43a-37: brgyad dang bcu drug lhag kyang rung //
T02D2626:43a-38: dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i //
T02D2626:43a-39: bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:43a-40: mar me gtor ma'i bum pa dang //
T02D2626:43a-41: mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag bya ste //
T02D2626:43a-42: gza' dang btung ba sbyar legs dang //
T02D2626:43b-0: bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag @43b par bya //
T02D2626:43b-1: gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su //
T02D2626:43b-2: gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag //
T02D2626:43b-3: 'byung po kun dang lha dang klu //
T02D2626:43b-4: mi dang mi min de bzhin te //
T02D2626:43b-5: me tog dri rnams sna tshogs gzhag //
T02D2626:43b-6: 'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas //
T02D2626:43b-7: rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus //
T02D2626:43b-8: rab tu bkang ste gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:43b-9: zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir mchod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa bsags par gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:43b-10: de la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2626:43b-11: dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2626:43b-12: dmigs pa med pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2626:43b-13: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i mchod pa la gsum ste /
T02D2626:43b-14: lus dang ngag dang rdzas so //
T02D2626:43b-15: dmigs pa med pa la gnyis te /
T02D2626:43b-16: thun mong dang khyad par can gyi mchod pa'o //
T02D2626:43b-17: de dag la dbye ba ni dpag tu med pa cig yod de 'dir ma bshad do //
T02D2626:43b-18: de la 'dir re zhig dmigs pa dang bcas pa rdzas kyi mchod pa gsungs te /
T02D2626:43b-19: gsang sngags la sogs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis
T02D2626:43b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi steng logs su bla re dbub pa
T02D2626:43b-21: dang / de'i zur bzhi la rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can gdags pa dang /
T02D2626:43b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi zur bzhir chu srin la sogs pa'i rgyal mtshan gzugs pa dang /
T02D2626:43b-23: de dag gi bar bar du gdugs dang /
T02D2626:43b-24: lda ldi dang ba dan dang /
T02D2626:43b-25: dar la sogs pa'i na bzas brgyan par bya'o //
T02D2626:43b-26: de nas skyil khor gyi mtha' logs su gser ram dngul lam /
T02D2626:43b-27: zangs sam sa la sogs pa'i bum pa rtsa ba'i lha'i grangs dang sbyar ba'am /
T02D2626:43b-28: bcu drug gam brgyad la sogs pa'i nang na dri dang sman dang 'o ma dang /
T02D2626:43b-29: me tog la sogs pas bkang pa /
T02D2626:43b-30: gos dang kha rgyan du bcas pa gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2626:43b-31: de dag ni mchod pa'i bum pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:43b-32: dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang pa'i ;
T02D2626:43b-33: / bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:43b-34: zhes pa ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:43b-35: bum pa'i kha dog dkar po lnga la padma'i steng
T02D2626:43b-36: du bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya 'khor lo
T02D2626:43b-37: dang / rdo rje la sogs pas mtshan par bris la /
T02D2626:43b-38: nang rin po che sna lnga dang /
T02D2626:44a-1: dang 'o mas bkang ba gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2626:44a-2: de dag ni dbang gi bum pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:44a-3: de nas rang gi mdun du sngar bsnyen pa'i skabs
T02D2626:44a-4: su bgegs mthar byed kyi snying po bzlas pa'i bum
T02D2626:44a-5: pa dri'i chus bkang ba bzhag ste /
T02D2626:44a-6: de ni las thams cad pa'i bum pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:44a-7: de nyid kyi tshe gzhal yas khang gi nang du
T02D2626:44a-8: lha bskyed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa
T02D2626:44a-9: zhes bya'o // lha grangs bstun la lha re re la snod re /
T02D2626:44a-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' logs su bla na
T02D2626:44a-11: med pa'i lha dang bla mar gyur pa'i lha gnyis
T02D2626:44a-12: kyi grangs dang sbyar ba'am bla na med pa'i grangs
T02D2626:44a-13: dang sbyar ba'am / drug cu pa la sogs pa'i zhal zas dang /
T02D2626:44a-14: rgun 'brum la sogs pa'i btung ba dang /
T02D2626:44a-15: kha ra la sogs pa'i bca' ba dang aa mra la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D2626:44a-16: autpala la sogs pa'i me tog dang /
T02D2626:44a-17: aa ka ru la sogs pa'i bdug pa dang /
T02D2626:44a-18: ga bur la sogs pa'i dri dang /
T02D2626:44a-19: rin po che la sogs pa'i snang ba dang /
T02D2626:44a-20: gur gum la sogs pa'i byug pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2626:44a-21: de nas bdag nyid chen pos lha la sogs pa'i
T02D2626:44a-22: yo byad du'ang de bzhin du gzhag par bya ba'o
T02D2626:44a-24: klu la mngar gsum dang dkar gsum du sbyar ba'i gtor ma chen po gcig dang /
T02D2626:44a-25: gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa la sha
T02D2626:44a-26: dang khrag dang chang la sogs pa sbyar ba'i gtor
T02D2626:44a-28: gzhan yang snying rje bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D2626:44a-29: la mi rnams kyis longs spyod pa'i kha zas sna
T02D2626:44a-30: tshogs pas bkang ba'i gtor ma chen po gcig gzhag
T02D2626:44a-31: par bya zhing me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs
T02D2626:44a-32: pas kyang dkyil 'khor dang rdzas thams cad brgyan par
T02D2626:44a-33: bya'o // de nas khrus sogs rab byas la //
T02D2626:44a-34: dri dang rgyan mchog phreng ba can //
T02D2626:44a-35: dri zhim kha bkang mchog mdzes pa //
T02D2626:44a-36: rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang //
T02D2626:44a-37: me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug //
T02D2626:44a-38: gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor //
T02D2626:44a-39: mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te //
T02D2626:44a-40: phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing //
T02D2626:44a-41: lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2626:44b-0: @44b dza: h'um bam ho: thugs rje'i bdag //
T02D2626:44b-1: tshur gshegs kyis ni brjod nas kyang //
T02D2626:44b-2: gsang ba'i bcing bas bcings nas ni /
T02D2626:44b-3: mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya //
T02D2626:44b-4: zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang //
T02D2626:44b-5: de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya //
T02D2626:44b-6: mtheb gnyis nang du bkug nas kyang ;
T02D2626:44b-7: / bskyod par gyur na dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2626:44b-8: zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:44b-9: de la 'dir ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi tshig mang
T02D2626:44b-10: bas 'jigs pas ma bris shing tshegs chung ba bsgrub
T02D2626:44b-11: pa'i phyir thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar byas
T02D2626:44b-12: so // 'dir ni rgyud kyi tshig drang thang du bkrol ba ste /
T02D2626:44b-13: de la rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2626:44b-14: bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2626:44b-15: las phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02D2626:44b-16: de la bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa ni 'di ltar /
T02D2626:44b-17: de nas khrus sogs rab byas la //
T02D2626:44b-18: dri dang rgyan mchog phreng ba can ;
T02D2626:44b-19: / dri zhi ma kha bkang mchog mdzes pa //
T02D2626:44b-20: rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang //
T02D2626:44b-21: me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug //
T02D2626:44b-23: de la dang por dri dang 'o ma la sogs
T02D2626:44b-24: pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ched du khrus legs
T02D2626:44b-25: par byas la gur gum la sogs pas lus legs
T02D2626:44b-26: par byugs te / gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2626:44b-31: dar dbyangs dang do shal la sogs pas lus brgyan la /
T02D2626:44b-32: gos dkar po gyon la me tog gi phreng bas mgo la brgyan cing /
T02D2626:44b-33: 'o ma la sogs pas kha bkang la ci nas
T02D2626:44b-34: kyang shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong bar byas
T02D2626:44b-35: nas rdo rje 'dzin mas 'jug par byas te /
T02D2626:44b-36: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma ni rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2626:44b-37: gcig ni bdag nyid kyi 'og tu aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hr'i: las autpala//
T02D2626:44b-38: de dag gyur pa las bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs
T02D2626:44b-39: pa thams cad mchod pas dgyes shing dbang du byed
T02D2626:44b-40: pa / las thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin ma
T02D2626:44b-41: zhes bya ba'i lha mo sku mdog dkar mo shin
T02D2626:44b-42: tu mdzes pa cig tu bsam mo //
T02D2626:45a-0: gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @45a * //
T02D2626:45a-1: yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya
T02D2626:45a-2: ba'i phyag rgya lag pa gnyis padma ltar byas la
T02D2626:45a-3: mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug mthe bong gnyis brkyang
T02D2626:45a-4: ste mdzub mo gnyis kyi rin chen dang srin lag
T02D2626:45a-5: gnyis padma'i tshul du byas la gung mo gnyis ngos
T02D2626:45a-6: sbyar te bsgreng la de'i rtse mo la me tog
T02D2626:45a-8: shar gyi sgor 'dug par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:45a-9: de la gang dag 'di skad du rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2626:45a-10: dang por ni chos thams cad bdag med par sgom
T02D2626:45a-11: pa ste / de yis rnam par dag pa las
T02D2626:45a-12: khrus dang rgyan la sogs pa ni dgos pa med
T02D2626:45a-13: do zhe na de ni ma yin te /
T02D2626:45a-14: bde bar gshegs pas 'di nyid yang gsungs pa /
T02D2626:45a-15: ci nas kyang yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa rnams
T02D2626:45a-16: kyis bde bar gshegs pa la mchod pa dang de
T02D2626:45a-17: dag gi spyan sngar mi mdzes pa spang ba'i phyir
T02D2626:45a-18: dang / de bzhin du 'dul ba'i mdo rnams su
T02D2626:45a-19: 'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba 'khor la bka'
T02D2626:45a-20: dang / stsal pa / nye ba 'khor dge slong
T02D2626:45a-21: rnams kyis nang bar sngar langs la gdong dang so'i
T02D2626:45a-22: dri ma dag par bkrus la bla gos dang snam
T02D2626:45a-23: sbyar tshul bzhin du bgos te /
T02D2626:45a-24: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kun nas
T02D2626:45a-25: bsdams shing mdzes pa nyid kyis ston pa dang bla
T02D2626:45a-26: ma dag la phyag bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
T02D2626:45a-27: // yang gang dag 'di skad du mchod pa'i skabs
T02D2626:45a-28: su ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs spa yin pas
T02D2626:45a-29: bdag nyid tha mal pa'i gnas skabs nyid kyi mchod
T02D2626:45a-31: lha'i skur bsgom pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa yin pas na /
T02D2626:45a-32: lha mo'i skur bsam pa ni 'brel ba med do zhe na /
T02D2626:45a-33: de ni 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud chen po las /
T02D2626:45a-34: rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yin te //
T02D2626:45a-36: 'jigs pa yi ni gzugs can dang /
T02D2626:45a-37: sna tshogs pa ni lha yi sku //
T02D2626:45a-38: las rnams ma lus byed par 'gyur //
T02D2626:45a-40: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i khyad par yid du 'ong bas bya ba dang /
T02D2626:45b-0: dbang du bya ba'i las kyi lha mo'i gzugs su bya ba @45b kho na'o //
T02D2626:45b-1: de bas na lha mo'i tshul du gnas pa las
T02D2626:45b-2: sems can rnams kyi don du sems bskyed la chos
T02D2626:45b-3: thams cad bdag med bar bsams te /
T02D2626:45b-4: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2626:45b-5: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par
T02D2626:45b-6: dag pa dri ma dang bral ba stong pa nyid
T02D2626:45b-7: du bsams te / aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba
T02D2626:45b-8: dha rm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes brjod par
T02D2626:45b-9: du bsams te / bya'o // de nas gong du smos pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D2626:45b-10: sngags kyis bgegs bskrad par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:45b-11: rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa'am /
T02D2626:45b-12: rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sngags kyis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtshams gcad par bya'o //
T02D2626:45b-13: de nas bdag nyid khro bo stobs po cher bskyed
T02D2626:45b-14: la gnas dang bdag nyid dang mchod pa'i rdzas rnams
T02D2626:45b-15: la / aom badzra kro dha ma h'a ba la raksha raksha: sv'a h'a /
T02D2626:45b-16: zhes bya bas bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D2626:45b-17: de yang rdo rje thod kyi rgyud las /
T02D2626:45b-18: dang por yungs kar dri chu yis //
T02D2626:45b-19: gnas dang bdag nyid rnal 'byor bsrung //
T02D2626:45b-21: de nas mgrin pa'i nang du hr'i: bsams te /
T02D2626:45b-22: de gyur pa las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa cig tu bsam mo //
T02D2626:45b-23: de nas padma'i nang du lce la yi ge h'um bsams te /
T02D2626:45b-24: de gyur pa las rdo rje rtse gsum pa cig bsam par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:45b-25: lag pa gnyis su aa dang ma las nyi ma dang zla ba bsams te /
T02D2626:45b-26: de dag gi steng du yang h'um bsams la /

T02D2626:46b-22: bdud rtsi la sogs pa lha dang mi rnams kyi
T02D2626:46b-23: mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa dpag tu med pas
T02D2626:46b-24: mchod par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:46b-25: de la dam ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dmigs
T02D2626:46b-26: pa med pa khyad par gyi mchod pa gsungs te
T02D2626:46b-27: / de la 'dir ngan song sbyong ba'i thugs ka nas sangs rgyas spyan phyung ste /
T02D2626:46b-28: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar phul nas bde ba dam pa'i ros rgyas par mchod pa dang /

T02D2626:46b-39: lcags kyu ma bzhis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs

T02D2626:46b-42: rje rin chen la sogs pa la mchod pa dang
T02D2626:46b-43: dang / / nub kyi sems ma bzhis rdo rje chos la sogs pa la mchod pa dang /
T02D2626:46b-44: byang gi sems ma bzhis rdo rje las la sogs pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /

T02D2626:47a-1: pa'i gzugs kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje

T02D2626:47a-18: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gcig pa yin te /

T02D2626:47a-31: dbyangs snyan pa yis bstod ba dang //

T02D2626:48a-0: pas 'thungs par bsams nas sngags dang tshigs @48a *

T02D2626:63a-12: de bzhin du ma byin par len pa spang ba'i phyir te /
T02D2626:63a-13: ji srid du ser sna can dag mthong ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2626:63a-14: de bzhin du 'dod pa'i dbang gis gzhan gyi bud med spyad par bya ba ma yin te /
T02D2626:63a-15: ji srid gter la sogs pa ster ba'i par du'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D2626:63a-16: de dag la sogs pa bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad ni gzhan du 'ang rgyas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2626:63a-17: yang 'dir rnyed pa la sogs pas bslang ba'i lus
T02D2626:63a-18: dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni mi dge ba
T02D2626:63a-19: nyid yin te / mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2626:63a-20: de la de'i rang gi ngo bo ni lung du
T02D2626:63a-21: ma bstan pa yin zhing gang du gzhan la phan
T02D2626:63a-22: par byed pa'i bsam pa las byung ba ni byang
T02D2626:63a-23: chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i rang gi ngo ba yin
T02D2626:63a-24: te bla na med pa'i 'bras bu 'dren par byed
T02D2626:63a-25: pa'i phyir ro // yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2626:63a-26: kyis ni bdag nyid kyi spyod pas yongs su spyod
T02D2626:63a-27: pa la ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas
T02D2626:63a-28: par mi 'gyur te de yang shes rab kyi pha
T02D2626:63a-29: rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa las /
T02D2626:63a-30: chos dang yon tan byang chub lung bstan shes gyur pa //
T02D2626:63a-31: de ni tshul khrims nor dang chos dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2626:63a-32: gang zhig chos dang byang chub yon tan smod byed pa//
T02D2626:63a-33: de ni gtso bo'i tshul khrims 'chal zhes rab tu bshad //
T02D2626:63a-35: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo chen po
T02D2626:63a-36: las kyang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dag gis
T02D2626:63a-37: dngos po thams cad smad par mi bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D2626:63b-0: pa'i phyir ro // de la 'dir gzugs la @63b
T02D2626:63b-1: sogs pa'i yul rang gi bsam pas longs spyod par
T02D2626:63b-2: pa'i phyir ro // mtshungs kyang / kha na tho
T02D2626:63b-3: ba dang kha na ma tho ba med pa'i 'bras
T02D2626:63b-4: bur rnam par gzhag bar bya ste /
T02D2626:63b-5: nyon mongs pa'i bsam bas ni nyon mongs pa'i yul la spyod do //
T02D2626:63b-6: nyon mongs pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med par longs spyod pa'o //
T02D2626:63b-7: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2626:63b-8: 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bur mthun pa dang /
T02D2626:63b-9: rang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bur mthun pa dang bla na med pa'i 'bras bur mthun pa'o //
T02D2626:63b-10: de la dang po ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i
T02D2626:63b-11: 'bras bu 'dod pas lha la sogs pa la mchod
T02D2626:63b-12: pa'i nges par 'byung ba yid la byed pa'o //
T02D2626:63b-13: gnyis pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub
T02D2626:63b-14: kyi don du gzugs la sogs pa la nges par
T02D2626:63b-15: 'byung ba'i rnam pas so sor rtog pa ste /
T02D2626:63b-16: ji ltar yang dag pa mtshungs par ldan pa'i mdo las /
T02D2626:63b-17: dge slong dag 'dir gang mig gis gzugs rnams mthong
T02D2626:63b-18: ba na gzugs de dag nye bar dmigs par mi
T02D2626:63b-19: bya ba ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i bar
T02D2626:63b-20: la gnas te / gzugs la sogs pa la nye
T02D2626:63b-21: bar dmigs par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
T02D2626:63b-22: la gnas te / // gsum pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2626:63b-23: smon lam gyi stobs kyis rnam par grol ba bsgom
T02D2626:63b-24: pa dang de kho na nyid 'ba' zhig la so
T02D2626:63b-25: sor rtog pas bsgom pa dang /
T02D2626:63b-26: bdag med pa tsam la dmigs pas bsgom pa dang /
T02D2626:63b-27: zab cing rgya che ba la bsgom pa'o //
T02D2626:63b-28: de la dang po ni gzugs la sogs pa 'di
T02D2626:63b-29: ltar snang zhing nyams su myong ba rnams kyi rjes
T02D2626:63b-30: su 'brangs te 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan par
T02D2626:63b-31: byed ba'i sems mngon du bsgom pa ste /
T02D2626:63b-32: ji ltar spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo las /
T02D2626:63b-33: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gnas gang du gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag ma thong na /
T02D2626:63b-34: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog gi
T02D2626:63b-35: gzugs thob par gyur cig ces de ltar sems bskyed
T02D2626:63b-37: gnas gang du gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba dag mthong ba na /
T02D2626:63b-38: sems can thams cad 'di 'dra ba'i 'khor ba'i sdug
T02D2626:63b-39: bsngal las thar bar gyur cig ces pa de ltar
T02D2626:63b-40: sems bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:63b-41: gnas gang du btang snyoms kyi gzugs mthong ba na /
T02D2626:64a-1: can thams cad sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur cig
T02D2626:64a-2: ces de ltar sems bskyed par bya ba la sogs
T02D2626:64a-3: pa rgya cher gsungs pa dang /
T02D2626:64a-4: de bzhin du mdo sde rgyan las kyang /
T02D2626:64a-5: dbang po'i spyod yul sna tshogs ji lta ji lta bar //
T02D2626:64a-6: de ltar de ltar rig pas mnyam nyid go 'phang la//
T02D2626:64a-7: sems can rnams la phan pas mngon par 'du byed cing //
T02D2626:64a-8: snying rje'i bdag nyid zhugs pas spyod yul yongs su brjod //
T02D2626:64a-10: gnyis pa ni sems can gyi khams la snying rjes
T02D2626:64a-11: rnam par bltas te bdag med pa la so sor
T02D2626:64a-12: rtog pa yid la byed pas yul mtha' dag la
T02D2626:64a-13: nye bar longs spyod pa nyid do /
T02D2626:64a-14: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2626:64a-15: nyi khri lnga stong pa las rigs kyi bu chos
T02D2626:64a-16: smra ba'i dge slong de la bdud sdig can bar
T02D2626:64a-17: chad bya ba'i phyir yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang
T02D2626:64a-18: sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams kyi
T02D2626:64a-19: stobs te / de la thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab
T02D2626:64a-20: kyis bshigs [*bshegs?] nas yongs su longs spyod par bya'o
T02D2626:64a-22: de bas na de kho na nyid yid la byed
T02D2626:64a-23: pa ni nyes pa mtha' dag gi gnyen po yin
T02D2626:64a-24: pa'i phyir / gang du mi 'dod pa'i las skyes
T02D2626:64a-25: pa rnams kyang de kho na nyid la so sor
T02D2626:64a-27: de'i dbang gis mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa la gegs byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2626:64a-28: gang la so sor rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyis gzugs
T02D2626:64a-29: la sogs pa yongs su shes pa de la nyon
T02D2626:64a-30: mongs pa dang las kyi sgrib pa ji ltar 'gyur
T02D2626:64a-31: te / phyin ci log gi sems kyi khyad par
T02D2626:64a-32: las byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa dang bdag
T02D2626:64a-33: med pa la so sor rtog pa 'gal ba'i phyir
T02D2626:64a-34: lhan cig tu ni skye par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:64a-35: de yang mdo sde rgyan las /
T02D2626:64a-36: gang la 'jig rten du mar snang bar 'dod pa min //
T02D2626:64a-37: skyes bus chags par bltas pa 'dod pa ste //
T02D2626:64a-38: sna tshogs de yis 'khor bar gnas 'gyur bas //
T02D2626:64a-39: des na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul bar 'dod pa yin //
T02D2626:64a-41: gsum pa ni bdag med pa las dmigs pa nyid
T02D2626:64a-42: kho nas gzugs la sogs pa'i tha mal gyi ngo
T02D2626:64a-43: bo la lhag par zhen pa'i gnyen po ste /
T02D2626:64b-0: des ni gong @64b nas gong du brgyud pas yang
T02D2626:64b-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang la
T02D2626:64b-2: gnas par byed pa'i rgyu yin zhing yang dag par
T02D2626:64b-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2626:64b-4: du nga rgyal gyis gzugs la sogs pa nyams su
T02D2626:64b-6: de la gang dag 'di skad du de lta na
T02D2626:64b-7: ni gang zag de dus yun ring bzhig na nges
T02D2626:64b-8: par 'byung ba'i phyir don dam par yang dag par
T02D2626:64b-9: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang gi ngo bo ma
T02D2626:64b-11: de lta na tha mal du longs spyod pa 'ang med par 'gyur te /
T02D2626:64b-12: de kho na nyid la gang zag la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2626:64b-13: de la ji ltar lhag par zhen pas gzugs la
T02D2626:64b-14: sogs pa mthong ngo zhes yul du byed pa dang
T02D2626:64b-15: / de kho na nyid la ni gzugs la sogs pa med par ni sngar smras zin to //
T02D2626:64b-16: de bas na lhag par zhen pa ni de kho na nyid la ltos pa med pa ste /
T02D2626:64b-17: kha cig tu mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba ni mi dge ba'i dbang las byung ba'o //
T02D2626:64b-18: gzhan du skyes bu mchog gi don du sbyor ba
T02D2626:64b-19: ni dag bar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhung du mthong
T02D2626:64b-20: ngo / de bas na de'i ming tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal bya ba ste /
T02D2626:64b-21: da ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2626:64b-22: ba'i byang chub kyi rgyur bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam
T02D2626:64b-23: par gzhag go // de bas na thams cad bdag
T02D2626:64b-24: nyid kyis nye bar longs spyod pas ni dge ba'i
T02D2626:64b-25: bdag nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ni
T02D2626:64b-26: rnam par gzhag par mi nus te /
T02D2626:64b-27: de ni bsam pa'i dbang gis dge ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
T02D2626:64b-28: de yang dkon mchog bkod pa'i mdo las /
T02D2626:64b-29: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong phrag brgyad cu
T02D2626:64b-30: re re la yang dge slong stong phrag brgyad cu'i
T02D2626:64b-31: 'khor dang bcas pa la bskal ba du mar bde
T02D2626:64b-32: ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas pa
T02D2626:64b-33: bas / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis
T02D2626:64b-34: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bdag nyid
T02D2626:64b-35: rnam par dag pas longs spyod par byed pa ni
T02D2626:64b-36: sngar gyi byang chub sems dpa' bas ches bsod nams
T02D2626:64b-37: khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i
T02D2626:65a-0: bas / phyir ro // yang 'dir bzhi pas btsal bar bya ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i @65a * //
T02D2626:65a-1: sku'i bdag nyid ni rang bzhin gyis rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral ba yin te /
T02D2626:65a-2: 'di ltar 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i tshogs 'byung
T02D2626:65a-3: zhing sprul pa sna tshogs bkye bas 'gro ba ma
T02D2626:65a-4: lus pa'i don byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa
T02D2626:65a-5: yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa thams cad de'i ngo
T02D2626:65a-6: bor mthong zhing sngar smras pa'i rnam pas dngos po
T02D2626:65a-7: mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed de
T02D2626:65a-8: / phan tshun du ltos pa med pas rang gi
T02D2626:65a-9: ngo bo la bsgrub pa mngon du dmigs pa'i phyir
T02D2626:65a-10: / ro // de bas na gzugs la sogs pa
T02D2626:65a-11: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis bdag med pa'i
T02D2626:65a-12: sku la mchod pas sangs rgyas la mchod par ji
T02D2626:65a-13: ltar 'gyur snyam pa'i dogs pa ni kha na mtho
T02D2626:65a-14: ba'i rgyun chen por 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2626:65a-15: de bas na de dag ni tha mal gyi gnas
T02D2626:65a-16: skabs phyin ci log yid la byed pa'i gnyen po
T02D2626:65a-17: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yin pa'i phyir
T02D2626:65a-18: / mig la sogs pa'i yul rnams la bden pa
T02D2626:65a-19: ma yin pa yid la byed pa spangs pas mchog
T02D2626:65a-20: gi mya ngan 'das pa thob cing don chen po
T02D2626:65a-21: bla na med pa'i sdom pa ste /
T02D2626:65a-22: mig la sogs pa'i yul thams cad la'ang phyag rgya
T02D2626:65a-23: bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lhar bskyed par bya zhing
T02D2626:65a-24: / de'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dag par bya ba nyid de /
T02D2626:65a-25: de yang mdo sde nyis brgya lnga bcu pa las kyang /
T02D2626:65a-26: mig gi sdom pa legs pa ste //
T02D2626:65a-27: rna ba'i sdom pa'ang legs pa yin //
T02D2626:65a-28: sna yi sdom pa legs pa ste //
T02D2626:65a-29: lce yi sdom pa legs pa yin //
T02D2626:65a-30: lus kyi sdom pa legs pas na //
T02D2626:65a-31: yid kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
T02D2626:65a-32: kun du bsdams pa'i dge slong ni //
T02D2626:65a-33: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol //
T02D2626:65a-35: de bas na rang dang gzhan thams cad yang dag
T02D2626:65a-36: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su dmigs pa nyid kyis
T02D2626:65a-37: byang chub kyi bslab pa sems kyi bslab pa rang
T02D2626:65a-39: rang gi ngo bo la phyin ci ma log par
T02D2626:65a-40: rtogs pa nyid kyi bslab pa shes rab kyi bslab
T02D2626:65a-41: pa nyid do // yang 'di ltar ser sna la
T02D2626:65a-42: sogs pa las bzlog nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2626:65a-43: pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag kyang de'i khongs
T02D2626:65b-0: su 'dus pa ni sngar gyi rjes su 'brangs @65b
T02D2626:65b-2: thabs de lta bu'i sems las yang dag par byung
T02D2626:65b-3: ba'i gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo dang
T02D2626:65b-4: rjes su mthun pa las bzlog pa ni bla na
T02D2626:65b-5: med pa'i rgyu bsal bas na yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2626:65b-6: pa'i byang chub kyi snod ma yin pa dang /
T02D2626:65b-7: skrag pa'i gnas ma yin par skrag pa ni sdug
T02D2626:65b-8: bsngal gyi phung po 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir
T02D2626:65b-9: ro // de yang phyin ci log bzhi bstan pa'i mdo las /
T02D2626:65b-10: gnas ma yin par skrag pa ni //
T02D2626:65b-12: bsod nams ma yin phung po che //
T02D2626:65b-13: 'byung bar byed pa'i gzhi dag dang //
T02D2626:65b-14: rigs min dam tshig ring ba dang //
T02D2626:65b-15: bshes med bya ba ma yin byed //
T02D2626:65b-16: dge sems snga na med gyur pas //
T02D2626:65b-17: dam chos 'di yis skrag pa ni //
T02D2626:65b-18: don chen po las ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D2626:65b-20: de bas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D2626:65b-21: thob par byed pa'i thabs ni 'di yin pas skyo
T02D2626:65b-22: ba med cing gzhan la mi g-yeng bar gzhung 'di
T02D2626:65b-23: kho na la 'bad par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:65b-24: de dag ni bla na med pa'i sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ste /
T02D2626:65b-25: da lta ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis spyad par bya ba'o //
T02D2626:65b-26: da ni tshe 'das pa'i sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2626:65b-27: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2626:65b-28: bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pa'i sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams /
T02D2626:65b-29: ji ltar na sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2626:65b-30: dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal spangs pa'i slad du
T02D2626:65b-31: bsgrub par bgyi zhes pa ni de yan chad du
T02D2626:65b-32: gsal bar ma gsungs pa nyid kyis ni don rgyas
T02D2626:65b-34: de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02D2626:65b-35: rang gi lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i
T02D2626:65b-36: 'od sems can dmyal ba'i gnas nas thar ba thabs
T02D2626:65b-37: ji lta bus bsgrub par bya zhes zhu bar 'brel
T02D2626:65b-38: to // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2626:65b-39: lha'i dbang po sems can gang dag sdig pa chen
T02D2626:65b-40: po byas pa'i dbang gis sems can dmyal ba la
T02D2626:65b-41: sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa de dag ci nas
T02D2626:66a-0: kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i @66a *
T02D2626:66a-1: // sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ba nyon cig
T02D2626:66a-2: ces gsungs pa ni nan tan du gyis la sgrubs
T02D2626:66a-3: shig ces par go bar bya ste go ba'i phyir
T02D2626:66a-4: // ma bshad do // de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02D2626:66a-5: de ltar yang ni bum pa la //
T02D2626:66a-6: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni //
T02D2626:66a-7: dbang bskur bar ni rab tu brtag //
T02D2626:66a-8: ces pa ni mdor bstan pa ste /
T02D2626:66a-10: de nas sdig pa kun byang ste //
T02D2626:66a-11: dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las //
T02D2626:66a-12: de ni myur du rnam par thar //
T02D2626:66a-13: sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid de //
T02D2626:66a-14: dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi //
T02D2626:66a-15: rigs su skye bar gyur nas kyang //
T02D2626:66a-16: de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2626:66a-18: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas //
T02D2626:66a-19: rim gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2626:66a-20: zhes gsungs pa ni de'i 'bras bu yongs su gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:66a-21: de la sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las kyang thar
T02D2626:66a-22: nas lha dang mi'i rigs chen po rnams su skyes
T02D2626:66a-23: te / bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum dang
T02D2626:66a-24: rtag tu mi 'bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
T02D2626:66a-25: la gnas te mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D2626:66a-27: de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba'am //
T02D2626:66a-28: gur gum gyis ni ming yang rung //
T02D2626:66a-29: ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las //
T02D2626:66a-30: sems can rnams ni dgrol ba'i phyir //
T02D2626:66a-31: sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing //
T02D2626:66a-32: snying rje can gyis de la ni //
T02D2626:66a-33: sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te //
T02D2626:66a-34: lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang ;
T02D2626:66a-35: / rang gi lha'am gzhan gyi lha //
T02D2626:66a-36: snying po snying gar bris byas nas //
T02D2626:66a-37: lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de //
T02D2626:66a-38: mchod rten dbus su gzhag pa'am /
T02D2626:66a-39: khyim sogs nang du gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:66a-40: zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir sgrub pa'i thabs phyogs gcig gsungs pa ste /

T02D2626:106b-25: can thams cad kyi don du sgrubs shig gdon mi
T02D2626:106b-26: za bar 'grub pa'i thabs bshad par bya'o zhes par
T02D2626:106b-27: 'brel to // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
T02D2626:106b-28: rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe
T02D2626:106b-29: dang ye shes dpag tu med pas khyab par 'byung
T02D2626:106b-30: ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2626:106b-32: tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag
T02D2626:106b-33: tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin
T02D2626:106b-34: gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi
T02D2626:106b-35: thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni 'di
T02D2626:106b-36: ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
T02D2626:106b-37: / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2626:106b-38: da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2626:107a-1: pa thams cad snga rabs su 'khor bar bzhugs pa'i tshe /
T02D2626:107a-2: tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes thams cad sgrub
T02D2626:107a-3: pa 'di la brten te yang dag par byung ba
T02D2626:107a-4: dang / sngags dang sgrub pa 'di nyid la dus
T02D2626:107a-5: gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyab
T02D2626:107a-6: dang / pa'i phyir dang / de nyid rdo rje
T02D2626:107a-7: rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir tshe dpag tu
T02D2626:107a-8: med pa khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya
T02D2626:107a-9: dang / pa'i phyir dang / ba dang / yang
T02D2626:107a-10: khyab pa ni 'dir gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang gsang
T02D2626:107a-11: sngags dang las thams cad la 'dis khyab pa'i phyir
T02D2626:107a-12: khyab pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o ;
T02D2626:107a-13: / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni
T02D2626:107a-14: de lta bu gsungs pa la thugs mnyam par gzhag
T02D2626:107a-15: pa'o // tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T02D2626:107a-16: tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba
T02D2626:107a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes
T02D2626:107a-19: bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T02D2626:107a-20: byin gyis brlabs pa nyid do //
T02D2626:107a-21: snying po ni ye shes te de skyed par byed pa ste /
T02D2626:107a-22: de nyid kyi thugs ka nas zhal du phyung ba'o //
T02D2626:107a-23: aom pu n+ye pu nye aa p'a ra mi ta
T02D2626:107a-24: a'a yu dzny'a na sam bha ro pa tsa ya
T02D2626:107a-26: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i snying po ste /
T02D2626:107a-27: tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes thams cad skyed par byed cing /
T02D2626:107a-28: nyon mongs pa'i dgra ma lus par 'joms par byed pa'o //
T02D2626:107a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di
T02D2626:107a-30: bshad ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu
T02D2626:107a-31: zhi ste / sems can dmyal ba dang byol song
T02D2626:107a-32: dang yi dags rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams
T02D2626:107a-33: cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis rab tu shes so
T02D2626:107a-34: zhes pa ni 'di ltar don rnam pa gnyis su
T02D2626:107a-36: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
T02D2626:107a-37: po 'di bshad ma thag tu zhes pa ni rgyu
T02D2626:107a-38: rab tu grol ba dang 'bras bu rab tu grol
T02D2626:107a-39: ba ste / rgyu rab tu grol ba la gsum mo //
T02D2626:107a-40: rdo rje lta bu'i dmigs pa la mnyam par gzhag pa dang /
T02D2626:107a-41: nam mkha' lta bu'i dmigs pa la mnyam par gzhag pa dang /
T02D2626:107b-0: dbu ma lta @107b bu'i dmigs pa la mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D2626:107b-1: de la rdo rje lta bu'i dmigs pa la mnyam
T02D2626:107b-2: par gzhag pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab
T02D2626:107b-3: rin po che las yang dag par byung ba'i shes
T02D2626:107b-4: rab kyi 'khor los rjod par byed pa'i dmyal ba
T02D2626:107b-5: dang / kun du 'jug pa'i dud 'gro dang /
T02D2626:107b-6: 'tsho bas gdungs pa yi dags rnams las bdag nyid
T02D2626:107b-7: kyis yongs su 'grol bar byas bdag nyid la yongs
T02D2626:107b-9: nam mkha' lta bu'i dmigs pa la mnyam par gzhag pas ni de las byung ba'i dmyal ba dang /
T02D2626:107b-10: de nyid sems pa'i yi dags dang /
T02D2626:107b-11: gnyis kas stong pa'i dung 'gro gsum gyi sdug bsngal
T02D2626:107b-12: bdag nyid la yang dag par grol bar shes so
T02D2626:107b-13: // dbu ma lta bu la dmigs pa la mnyam
T02D2626:107b-14: par gzhag pas ni brtan par 'dzin pa'i dmyal ba
T02D2626:107b-15: // dang / las su byed pa'i dud 'gro dang /
T02D2626:107b-16: 'dod pas gdungs pa'i yi dags gsum bdag nyid kyis grol bar yang dag par shes so //
T02D2626:107b-17: 'bras bu rab tu grol bar bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2626:107b-18: yongs su rdzogs pa'i skad cig ma la ngan song
T02D2626:107b-19: gi rgyud bcad nas bla na med pa yang dag
T02D2626:107b-20: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2626:107b-22: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang snang bar byas te /
T02D2626:107b-23: snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
T02D2626:107b-24: bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2626:107b-25: pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi yi ge de nyid
T02D2626:107b-26: du zhugs par gyur to zhes gsung ba ni yang
T02D2626:107b-27: rnam pa gnyis su go bar bya ste /
T02D2626:107b-28: rgyu'i bdag nyed la dgongs pa dang /
T02D2626:107b-29: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid la dgongs pa'o //
T02D2626:107b-30: rgyu'i bdag nyid la dgongs pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2626:107b-31: las las byung ba la dgongs pa dang ;
T02D2626:107b-32: thabs las byung ba la dgongs pa'o //
T02D2626:107b-33: thabs las byung ba la gnyis te phyi rol du dmigs pa dang /
T02D2626:107b-35: de la 'bras bu'i bdag nyid la dgongs pa ni
T02D2626:107b-36: 'di ltar sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos 'dis
T02D2626:108a-1: sangs rgyas nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i gnas skabs
T02D2626:108a-2: ni gang gi dus su rigs gang btsun pa'i bur
T02D2626:108a-3: skye ba blangs nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu
T02D2626:108a-4: gnyis kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin du mdzad nas
T02D2626:108a-5: yang chos kyi sku'i ngang du bzhugs pa nyid dang
T02D2626:108a-6: / yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid
T02D2626:108a-7: kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
T02D2626:108a-8: de nyid las bde bar gshegs pa'i sprul ba'i chogs
T02D2626:108a-10: da ltar sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2626:108a-11: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du mdzad pa yod
T02D2626:108a-12: pa nyid do // rgyu'i bdag nyid la dgongs pa ni skyed par bye pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D2626:108a-13: de'i dbye ba las las byung ba'i rgyu ni nang
T02D2626:108a-14: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis las yang
T02D2626:108a-15: dag par byung la slar rtog pa med pa'i lus
T02D2626:108a-17: de ni skyo ba skyed pa'i don to //
T02D2626:108a-18: thabs las byung ba ni sems can gyi khams yang dag par sbyong ba la zhugs pa'o //
T02D2626:108a-19: de'i dbye ba phyi rol du dmigs pa ni 'di
T02D2626:108a-20: ltar ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yongs
T02D2626:108a-21: su bskyed de / de la ting nge 'dzin rnam
T02D2626:108a-22: pa bcu gnyis ni bar chad med pa zhes bya
T02D2626:108a-23: bar ting nge 'dzin la ni lhums su zhugs nas
T02D2626:108a-25: skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni rtsal 'gran byas pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108a-26: gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni rkyal 'gran byas pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108a-27: thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni rtsis 'gran byas pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108a-28: bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi shigs pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2626:108a-29: ting nge 'dzin la ni yig 'gran byas pa nyid
T02D2626:108a-30: do // kun du rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting
T02D2626:108a-31: nge 'dzin la ni 'phong 'gran byas pa nyid do
T02D2626:108a-32: do // // kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D2626:108a-33: ting nge 'dzin la ni khab bzhes pa nyid do
T02D2626:108a-34: do // // // yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya
T02D2626:108a-35: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni mchod rten rab tu
T02D2626:108a-36: brtsegs pa'i rtsar rab tu byung ba nyid do //
T02D2626:108a-37: nye bar brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2626:108a-38: la ni dka' thub lo bdun mdzad pa nyid do
T02D2626:108a-39: // rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2626:108b-0: 'dzin la ni @108b bdud kyi tshogs yang dag par
T02D2626:108b-1: // bcom pa'o // de nyid gcig pa zhes bya
T02D2626:108b-2: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni rdo rje gdan la
T02D2626:108b-3: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108b-4: mngon par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2626:108b-5: la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid do
T02D2626:108b-6: // nang du dmigs pa yang ni 'di ltar bar
T02D2626:108b-7: chad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2626:108b-8: ni lhums nas bltams pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108b-9: thams cad du dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2626:108b-10: ting nge 'dzin la ni rkyal 'gran byas pa nyid
T02D2626:108b-11: do // dpa' po grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting
T02D2626:108b-12: nge 'dzin la ni rtsal 'gran byas pa nyid do
T02D2626:108b-13: do // // thugs las grub ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D2626:108b-14: ting nge 'dzin la ni rtsis 'gran byas pa nyid
T02D2626:108b-15: do // // do // de dag ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2626:108b-16: yi ge brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni yig 'gran byas pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108b-17: rten pa rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni 'phong 'gran par byas pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108b-18: ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni khab bzhes pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108b-19: rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni rab tu byung ba ste /
T02D2626:108b-20: de dag gis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2626:108b-21: rims nad rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ni bka' thub mdzad pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108b-22: bdud rtsi gong bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2626:108b-23: la ni bdud kyi tshogs yang dag par bcom pa'o
T02D2626:108b-24: // rang bzhin gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2626:108b-25: 'dzin la ni rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs
T02D2626:108b-26: par sangs rgyas pa nyid do //
T02D2626:108b-27: rnam par mi rtog gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting
T02D2626:108b-28: nge 'dzin la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
T02D2626:108b-29: ste / de dag gis ni las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2626:108b-30: de bas ni gong du gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2626:108b-31: pa'i thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du
T02D2626:108b-32: zhugs par gyur to zhes pa'ang 'bras bu'i skabs su
T02D2626:108b-33: ni 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D2626:108b-34: gyis rnam par dag cing dngos po rnam par rtog
T02D2626:109a-1: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba yod pa dang
T02D2626:109a-2: med pa dang yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma
T02D2626:109a-3: yin pa dang yod pa dang med pa ma yin
T02D2626:109a-4: pa'ang ma yin pa'i mu bzhi'i skye mched dang bral
T02D2626:109a-5: ba yin zhing / de la sngon gyi smon lam
T02D2626:109a-6: gyi stobs las yang dag par byung bas 'gro ba'i
T02D2626:109a-7: ba yin zhing / don mdzad de / slar mnyam
T02D2626:109a-8: pa'i ye shes kyi dang la bzhugs pa'i phyir chos
T02D2626:109a-9: kyi yi ger bzhugs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:109a-10: yang yi ge ni mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2626:109a-11: chos ni chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid du zhugs par gyur pa nyid do //
T02D2626:109a-12: de nyid de nas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:109a-13: yang gcig ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D2626:109a-14: thugs mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje nas snying po dang
T02D2626:109a-15: bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dpag tu med
T02D2626:109a-16: pa sprul nas 'gro ba'i sems can rnams ngan song
T02D2626:109a-17: gsum las yang dag par grol bar mdzad pa'i ting
T02D2626:109a-18: nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sbyangs nas slar bcom ldan
T02D2626:109a-19: 'das nyid kyi thugs ka'i mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje
T02D2626:109a-20: zhugs pa ste / de yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do //
T02D2626:109a-21: thabs las byung ba'i phyi rol du dmigs pa'i bdag
T02D2626:109a-22: nyid ni thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting
T02D2626:109a-23: nge 'dzin las yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2626:109a-24: ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa spros te /
T02D2626:109a-25: 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi dan song rnam
T02D2626:109a-26: pa gsum yongs su sbyangs nas slar thams cad 'byung
T02D2626:109a-27: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa
T02D2626:109a-28: ste / de nyid snying gnas spros pa'i phyir thugs ka'o //
T02D2626:109a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi yi ge yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2626:109a-30: chos rnams 'byung ba'i phyir thugs kyi chos yi ger zhugs zhes bya bar 'brel te /
T02D2626:109a-31: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:109a-32: nang du dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyang 'di ltar thams
T02D2626:109a-33: cad dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2626:109a-34: 'dzin las ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting
T02D2626:109a-35: nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyis ngan song gsum dang der
T02D2626:109b-0: skye ba'i rgyu nyon mongs pa thams cad yang @109b
T02D2626:109b-2: slar de nyid du zhugs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:109b-3: de nyid thugs kun gnas pa'i phyir thugs kyi'o //
T02D2626:109b-4: de nyid mi 'gyur bar bsgom pa'i phyir yi ge'o //
T02D2626:109b-5: de nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo
T02D2626:109b-6: bo yin pa'i phyir chos te de'i phyir de bzhin
T02D2626:109b-7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi
T02D2626:109b-8: ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to zhes bya
T02D2626:109b-9: ba nyid do // yang de nyid bla na med
T02D2626:109b-10: pa'i sems 'byin pa'i phyir na sbyin pa'i pha rol
T02D2626:109b-12: rnam par g-yang ba'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir na /
T02D2626:109b-13: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2626:109b-14: phyi rol gyi rna par 'tshe ba la sogs pa
T02D2626:109b-15: bzod pa'i phyir na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D2626:109b-16: pa dang / le los bar mchod pa'i phyir na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2626:109b-17: mnyam pa nyid kyi rtse gcig pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2626:109b-18: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2626:109b-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsod ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2626:109b-20: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i phyir stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2626:109b-21: bla na med pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i thabs bla
T02D2626:109b-22: na med pa yin pa'i phyir thabs kyi pha rol
T02D2626:109b-24: ye shes rnam pa gnyis bskyed pa'i phyir ye shes
T02D2626:109b-25: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ste
T02D2626:109b-26: / de nyid phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar
T02D2626:109b-27: gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad bskyed pa
T02D2626:109b-28: yin pa'i phyir bka' thams cad nas 'byung ba'i yum
T02D2626:109b-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya
T02D2626:109b-31: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las /
T02D2626:109b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2626:109b-33: koo shi ka chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa
T02D2626:109b-34: gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2626:109b-36: nam du 'du shes dang kun shes pa dang /
T02D2626:109b-38: tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i shes rab kyi pha
T02D2626:109b-39: rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D2626:110a-1: kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i 'od byed
T02D2626:110a-2: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D2626:110a-3: zhugs nas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2626:110a-4: tshe dpag tu mad pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di
T02D2626:110a-5: zhugs nas / bshad do // aom aa mi te aa mi ta aa mi tod bha ba /
T02D2626:110a-6: aa mi te sam bha be aa mi ta bi kr'a nte /
T02D2626:110a-7: aa mi ta bi kra nte /
T02D2626:110a-9: sarba karma kle sha ksha yam ka ri sv'a h'a /
T02D2626:110a-10: de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du
T02D2626:110a-11: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o
T02D2626:110a-12: zhes gsungs pa'i 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na
T02D2626:110a-13: rdo rjes gong ma ni nyid kyi snying po rtsa
T02D2626:110a-14: ba'i sngags las thams cad du 'jug pa bdud rtsi
T02D2626:110a-16: 'di ni bdud rtsi bsgrub pa bcud kyis len te /
T02D2626:110a-17: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi snying po'o //
T02D2626:110a-18: tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje'i 'od byed pa
T02D2626:110a-19: ni sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med par
T02D2626:110a-20: 'tsho ba ste / de nyid rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig pas na rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:110a-21: 'od byed pa ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal bar byed pa ste /
T02D2626:110a-22: de gsungs pa la thugs mnyam par gzhag pa la
T02D2626:110a-23: snyoms par zhugs zhes pa rgyu kun nas slong ba
T02D2626:110a-24: zhes bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni
T02D2626:110a-25: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de
T02D2626:110a-26: zhes bya'o // / de dag dang por 'khor ba
T02D2626:110a-27: na zhugs pa tsam na rig sngags chen mo 'di

T02D2626:113b-34: de nas gtso rnams byon pa dang /
T02D2626:113b-35: mchod pa'i tshogs ni rab byas te //
T02D2626:113b-36: 'chi bdag sbrul gyis zin pa rnams //
T02D2626:113b-37: 'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya //
T02D2626:113b-38: zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du sems bskyed de //
T02D2626:113b-39: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i mthar rang gi snying ga'i
T02D2626:113b-40: sa bon las 'od zer spros pas bde bar gshegs
T02D2626:113b-41: pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te /
T02D2626:113b-42: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D2626:114a-0: sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug @114a * //
T02D2626:114a-1: pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dgyes pa rnams byas te /
T02D2626:114a-2: gzugs brnyan gyi lha dang gnyis su med par byas nas zhabs bsil la sogs pa drangs te /
T02D2626:114a-3: phyag 'tshal ba dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs
T02D2626:114a-4: pa'i yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa yongs su
T02D2626:114a-6: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2626:114a-7: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas
T02D2626:114a-8: zhugs la dge ba'i las rnams yang dag par bya
T02D2626:114a-9: ba ste / de la sngags kyi don ni kye
T02D2626:114a-10: ma bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can bdag la dam
T02D2626:114a-11: tshig gis yongs su gzung du gsol zhes pa'o //
T02D2626:114a-12: de nas bdag nyid dang por rim pa ji lta
T02D2626:114a-13: ba bzhin du bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbang
T02D2626:114a-15: gnang ba legs par blangs nas 'chi bdag gis nyen pa'am /
T02D2626:114a-16: bsod nams dang skal ba chung ba'am /
T02D2626:114a-17: ye shes chen pos stong pa rnams dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2626:114a-19: rdo rje slob dpon dgongs su gsol //
T02D2626:114a-20: thog ma tha ma med pa nas //
T02D2626:114a-21: mi dge'i dbang du gyur pas na //
T02D2626:114a-22: lus kyi sdig pa'i las rnams bshags //
T02D2626:114a-23: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas sdig bshags par bya'o //
T02D2626:114a-24: de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2626:114a-25: rdo rje theg pa la khas yang dag par 'ches pa la sogs pas byas te /
T02D2626:114a-26: dar la sogs pas mig bkab nas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2626:114a-28: rdo rje ti rinti ri bcing //
T02D2626:114a-29: lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug / yang na me tog phreng ba ste //
T02D2626:114a-30: de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dor //
T02D2626:114a-31: aom pra t'i tstsha badzra h'um /
T02D2626:114a-32: de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2626:114a-33: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2626:114a-34: de nas 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2626:114a-35: aom badzra h'a spyod gha ta ya h'um /
T02D2626:114a-38: zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di ltar bdag khro
T02D2626:114a-39: bo ti ri nti ri'i rnal 'byor gyis phyag rgya
T02D2626:114b-0: sor mo rnams nang du bsnol la mthe bong @114b
T02D2626:114b-1: gnyis bsgreng ste / sngar bzlas pa'i bum pa nas chu blangs la de'i bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2626:114b-2: de nas sngags dang pos ni dam tshig gi mna' bsgrag par bya'o //
T02D2626:114b-3: de nas sngags gnyis pas ni rin po che dang me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o //
T02D2626:114b-4: sngags gsum pas ni gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2626:114b-5: sngags bzhi pas ni bsal bar byas la lha'i go
T02D2626:114b-6: rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya ba
T02D2626:114b-7: nyid do // de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2626:114b-8: aom buddha aa bhi shinytsa aom //
T02D2626:114b-9: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2626:114b-10: aom ratna aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02D2626:114b-11: aom padma aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02D2626:114b-12: aom karma aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02D2626:114b-13: de nas 'dis bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //

T02D2626:114b-15: aom badzra ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2626:114b-16: aom ratna ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa aom //
T02D2626:114b-17: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2626:114b-18: aom karma ka la sha bya'o //
T02D2626:114b-19: aom buddha m'a la aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02D2626:114b-20: aom badzra m'a la aa bhi shinytsa h'um /

T02D2626:114b-25: aom badzra mu dra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /

T02D2626:114b-31: aom ratna karma aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02D2626:114b-32: aom padma karma aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02D2626:114b-33: aom bi shva karma aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02D2626:114b-34: aom badzra tsa kra aa bhi shinytsa h'um bhr'um /
T02D2626:114b-35: aom badzra tsa kra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2626:114b-36: aom badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2626:114b-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dha ra ni aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02D2626:114b-43: aom badzra dha ra ni aa bhi shinytsa h'um ;
T02D2626:114b-44: aom ratna dha ra ni aa bhi shinytsa trv'am /
T02D2626:114b-45: aom padma dha ra ni aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02D2626:114b-46: aom karma dha ra ni aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
