T02D2626:114b-48: aom badzra gu hya aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2626:114b-49: aom ratna gu hya aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02D2626:114b-50: aom padma gu hya aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02D2626:115a-1: pra dznyo pa ya sa ma yo ga aa bhi shinytsa aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2626:115a-2: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags 'di ltar dbang bcu yongs su rdzogs par bskur bar gsungs te /
T02D2626:115a-3: de la 'di ni bshad pa'i rgyud yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2626:115a-4: khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D2626:115a-5: dkyal 'khor thams cad du khyab par gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D2626:115a-6: 'di gsungs pa'i phyir 'di gsungs pa'i sngags dang rnal
T02D2626:115a-7: 'byor dang bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni rgyud
T02D2626:115a-8: kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2626:115a-9: bcu gnyis po thams cad la khyab par bya ba
T02D2626:115a-10: nyid de // de la dang po ni bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2626:115a-14: me tog chen po rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas la /
T02D2626:115a-18: lte ba dang gsang ba'i gnas rnams su de dag gi sa bon dang /
T02D2626:115a-19: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2626:115a-20: de ni bde bar gshegs pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2626:115a-21: gnyis pa ni lo tsa n'a dang /
T02D2626:115a-24: sgrol ma rnams su bum pa lnga byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2626:115a-29: ltag pa rnams su dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2626:115a-30: de dag ni bum pa'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:115a-31: gsum pa ni mu tig dang gser dang /
T02D2626:115a-33: rdo'i snying po la sogs pa'am /
T02D2626:115a-34: yang na de dang rigs mthun pa'i shing 'bras la
T02D2626:115a-35: sogs pa'i phreng ba bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i snying
T02D2626:115a-36: po dang / rang gi lha'i snying po rnams zlos shing sbyin pa ste /
T02D2626:115a-37: de dag ni phreng ba'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:115a-38: bzhi pa ni bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2626:115a-43: spyi bo rnams su dbang bskur bar bya ba ste /
T02D2626:115a-44: de dag ni phyag rgya'i dbang zhes bya'o /
T02D2626:115a-45: lnga pa ni lag tu rdo rje dang dril bu byin la /
T02D2626:115a-46: aom khyod kyis dbus su rang song nas //
T02D2626:115a-47: sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2626:115b-0: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' @115b bzhin du //
T02D2626:115b-1: sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2626:115b-2: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2626:115b-3: de dag ni las kyi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:115b-4: drug pa dang bdun pa ni gcig ste 'khor lo
T02D2626:115b-5: rin po che la sogs pa rin po che sna
T02D2626:115b-6: bdun gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du
T02D2626:115b-8: de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:115b-9: brgyad pa ni bum pa'i dbang gi khongs su 'dus pa ste /
T02D2626:115b-10: chu la sogs pa dbang bskur ba'i rjes la rang
T02D2626:115b-11: gi rigs dar mthun pa'i ming gdags par bya ba
T02D2626:115b-12: ni dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D2626:115b-13: la sogs pas dbang bskur bar bya ba ste /
T02D2626:115b-14: de ni ming gi dbang zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2626:115b-15: de la de dag gi 'og tu gsungs pa'i yig
T02D2626:115b-16: 'bru bco lnga po ni sngags gsum po rnams la'ang
T02D2626:115b-18: rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02D2626:115b-20: las lnga'i tshig mtshon par bya bar gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:115b-21: gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya ba'o //
T02D2626:115b-22: dgu pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa snang ba
T02D2626:115b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i
T02D2626:115b-24: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis snying ga'i thig le lnga
T02D2626:115b-25: la dbang bskur bar bya ba ste ;
T02D2626:115b-26: de dag ni gzungs kyi dbang zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2626:115b-27: bcu pa ni gsang ba'i don gyi phyag rgya bcings la rang gis yongs su rig par bya ste /
T02D2626:115b-28: mu tig lta bu'i thig le dkar po lngas gdong gi padmar gtang bar bya ba ste /
T02D2626:115b-29: de ni gsang ba'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:115b-30: bcu gcig pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag
T02D2626:115b-31: rgya mdzes pa bcings la ting nge 'dzin gyis bde
T02D2626:115b-32: ba chen po'i ngo bor rig par byas la /
T02D2626:115b-33: dbang bskur bar bya ba ste /
T02D2626:115b-34: de ni thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:115b-35: de nas 'dir ma gsungs na'ang gong du gsungs pa'i phyir 'dir bka'i dbang yang dran par bya ste /
T02D2626:115b-36: de dag gi rim pa dang rnal 'byor dang /
T02D2626:115b-37: tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2626:115b-38: mtshan nyid bshad pa rnams ni tshig mangs pa'i skyon du 'gyur gyis dogs nas 'dir ma bris te /
T02D2626:115b-39: dbang gi rim par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2626:116a-1: nas dbang bskur nas tshe bsring ba'i rim pa 'di sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2626:116a-2: aom badzra a'a yu she bhr'um h'um a'a:zhes pa ni
T02D2626:116a-3: skabs 'dir dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i rjes la snying po
T02D2626:116a-4: de brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa'i grangs su sbyin
T02D2626:116a-6: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D2626:116a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe zla ba'i 'od can
T02D2626:116a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs shing phyag gnyis pa
T02D2626:116a-10: la mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa
T02D2626:116a-12: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo
T02D2626:116a-13: brkyang la gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta
T02D2626:116a-14: bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de
T02D2626:116a-15: de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D2626:116a-16: 'di ltar 'dir gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgyud gzhan
T02D2626:116a-17: las gsang sngags thams cad 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes
T02D2626:116a-18: gsungs te / tshegs chung bas rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang bshad pa dang /
T02D2626:116a-19: sgrub pa la sogs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi don
T02D2626:116a-20: du gsungs pas tshe dpag med kyi bsgrub pa'i dkyil
T02D2626:116a-21: 'khor ni 'og nas ston par 'gyur bas de'i skabs
T02D2626:116a-22: su 'dir bshad pa rnams shes par bya zhing /
T02D2626:116a-23: 'di ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi las bshad pa ste /
T02D2626:116a-24: 'dir gsungs pa'i bris sku'ang 'og tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:116a-25: de la mi gang dag tshe bsgrub par 'dod pa
T02D2626:116a-26: la dang por rtsa ba'i yan lag bzhi dgos te
T02D2626:116a-27: / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2626:116a-28: dam tshig dang sngom pa ma nyams pa dang /
T02D2626:116a-29: bla na med pa'i 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la
T02D2626:116a-30: gus shing phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dang yid mthun pa
T02D2626:116a-31: dang / rnam par rtog pa shas chung ba'o //
T02D2626:116a-32: de dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams kyis bcom ldan
T02D2626:116a-33: 'das tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes dpag tu
T02D2626:116a-34: med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs la rim pa ji
T02D2626:116a-35: lta ba bzhin du dbang mnos nas /
T02D2626:116a-36: bla ma yongs su mnyes par byas la sbyin pa la sogs pa rgya chen por bya ste /
T02D2626:116b-0: smon lam btab nas @116b ras bal gsar pa la
T02D2626:116b-1: ga bur la sogs pa'i dris yongs su bsgos la
T02D2626:116b-2: tha ga mo bsnyen gnas la gnas pas dkyus su
T02D2626:116b-3: khru do pa zheng du khru phyed dang do btags
T02D2626:116b-4: te / ri mo mkhan bsnyen gnas la gnas par
T02D2626:116b-5: bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i
T02D2626:116b-6: tshe ster bar byed pa tshe dang bsod nams dang
T02D2626:116b-7: ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zla
T02D2626:116b-8: ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing zla ba'i 'od dang
T02D2626:116b-9: ldan pa sku mdog dmar skya gsal zhing 'tsher ba
T02D2626:116b-10: te / dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs
T02D2626:116b-11: su bzhugs ba phyag g-yas ba skyabs mdzad kyi phyag
T02D2626:116b-12: te / dang / rgya mdzad pa / g-yon pa
T02D2626:116b-13: mchog sbyin du brkyang ba'i rtse mo las ye shes
T02D2626:116b-14: kyi bdud rtsi 'o ma lta bu 'dzag pas sgrub
T02D2626:116b-15: pa po'i lag mthil du 'bab pa bri zhing /
T02D2626:116b-16: de'i g-yon phyogs su sgrub pa po'i lag pa g-yas brkyang ba g-yon pa phyag 'tshal ba bri'o ;
T02D2626:116b-17: / de'i mdun du me tog dang spos la sogs
T02D2626:116b-18: pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs ci rigs pa bri bar bya'o
T02D2626:116b-19: // de nas ri mo'i gzugs de rab tu gnas
T02D2626:116b-20: pa dang spyan dbye ba la sogs pa byas nas
T02D2626:116b-21: // / de mchod pa rgya chen po rnams kyis mchod nas de'i spyan sngar gong du gsungs pa'am /
T02D2626:116b-22: 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2626:116b-23: de nas gnas dben par 'og nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris te /
T02D2626:116b-24: mchod pa la sogs pas mchod cing gsang sngags khri bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2626:116b-25: de nas bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med
T02D2626:116b-26: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas bskyed la
T02D2626:116b-27: / gsang sngags stong bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2626:116b-28: de nas yang dkyil 'khor bzhengs la sbyin sreg 'bum
T02D2626:116b-29: dang gtor ma rgya chen po sbyin pa la sogs
T02D2626:116b-30: pa byas nas dkyil 'khor dang bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2626:116b-31: spyan sngar yi ge brgya pa'i snying po khri'am stong
T02D2626:116b-32: du bzlas shing sdig pa ma lus pa bshags par
T02D2626:116b-34: de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen
T02D2626:116b-35: po byas la ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sar
T02D2626:117a-0: par bcug la / rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yon @117a * //
T02D2626:117a-2: bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems zhing mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2626:117a-3: de nas dri ma nam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i
T02D2626:117a-4: dri'i ngad ldang la rlangs pa'am du ba'am me byung
T02D2626:117a-5: ngam 'od zer ram me sgron nam 'od byung ngam
T02D2626:117a-6: / de lta bu la sogs pa'i mchan ma byung
T02D2626:117a-7: na mar me'am mar sar pa'am til mar ram chu'am
T02D2626:117a-8: 'o ma'am chang ngam khrag gam zhag gam klad pa'am
T02D2626:117a-9: sha'am gang yang rung ba la rab tu bsgrubs te
T02D2626:117a-10: / / nang par sngar bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2626:117a-11: bdag nyid kyis sbyang ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2626:117a-12: btung ngam bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di
T02D2626:117a-13: ltar gong du smos pa'i cho ga rnams kyi mthar
T02D2626:117a-14: ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du gnas shin tu dben
T02D2626:117a-16: mdun rol du bris sku bkram la ston zla ra
T02D2626:117a-17: ba'i nya la gza' phur bu skar ma rgyal gyi
T02D2626:117a-18: nyi ma nas brtsams nas ston zla 'bring bo'i nya'i
T02D2626:117a-20: de la gser ram dngul lam zangs sam lcags la
T02D2626:117a-21: sogs pa'i snod gtsang ma lnga dkyil 'khor gyi zur
T02D2626:117a-22: bzhir dbus dang lngar gzhag go //
T02D2626:117a-23: bum pa'o ma dang dri'i chus bkang zhing kha rgyan
T02D2626:117a-24: dang mgul chings su bcas pa lnga phyogs bzhi dbus
T02D2626:117a-25: su gzhag go // de bzhin du sa gzhi ba'i rnam lnga la sogs pas legs par byugs te /
T02D2626:117a-26: me tog dri zhim pos bkram la gdugs dang bla re dang /
T02D2626:117a-28: ba dan la sogs pa'ang yongs su bris la /
T02D2626:117a-29: bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2626:117a-30: de la dbus kyi snod du ni ba dmar ser
T02D2626:117a-31: gyi mar bzhu ba dri ma dang ngar ba med
T02D2626:117a-33: shar phyogs kyi snod du ni mu tig dang dngul dang byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2626:117a-35: aa ru ra rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02D2626:117a-37: aa ren da'i sa bon dang /
T02D2626:117a-40: ga phur la sogs pa srang re bar cha bsnyams la phya mar byas pas dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2626:117a-41: lho phyogs kyi snod du ni gser dang /
T02D2626:117b-1: tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D2626:117b-5: gze ma btsos pa'i khu ba dang /
T02D2626:117b-8: sbrang rtsi rnams srang re bar cha bsnyams la phye mar byas pas dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2626:117b-9: nub phyogs kyi snod du 'od dpag med dang /
T02D2626:117b-11: aa ru ra stobs chen dang /
T02D2626:117b-18: shi lanydza du rnams srang re bar cha bsnyams la phye mar byas pas snod bkang bar bya'o //
T02D2626:117b-19: byang phyogs kyi snod du ni rdo'i snying po dang /
T02D2626:117b-24: aa ru ra rnam par 'dren byed dang /
T02D2626:117b-28: nim pa'i 'bras bu rnams srang re bar cha bsnyams la phye mar byas pas snod dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2626:117b-29: de la mar ni bre gang ngo //
T02D2626:117b-30: de yang chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol ba ste /
T02D2626:117b-31: de ni mar gyi nying gu zhes brjod do //
T02D2626:117b-32: de la sman de dag 'thag pa ni bu mo
T02D2626:117b-33: lo brgyad lon pa rigs dang gzugs byad du ldan
T02D2626:117b-34: pa skyes pa dang ma phrad pas khrus legs par
T02D2626:117b-35: byas te / dbang bskur ba nyi ma rtse shar
T02D2626:117b-36: ba dang kha shar phyogs su bltas nas gos dkar
T02D2626:117b-37: po bgos pas btags par bya'o //
T02D2626:117b-38: de nas phye mar gyur pa dang dar la sogs pas tshags nas btsags nas dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2626:117b-39: de nas mchod pa la sogs pa rgya chen por byas te /
T02D2626:117b-40: sman rnams dang mar la ras dkar pos kha bcad
T02D2626:117b-41: nas me dang ma phrad par sha dang chang dang
T02D2626:117b-42: sgog pa dang bud med la sogs pa spangs te
T02D2626:117b-43: / zas dkar gsum bza' zhing bcom ldan 'das tshe
T02D2626:117b-44: dang bsod nams dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
T02D2626:117b-45: snying po bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems zhing bzlas
T02D2626:117b-46: / par bya'o // de bzhin du mchod pa rnam
T02D2626:117b-47: pa lngas ni nang nub thams cad du mchod cing
T02D2626:117b-48: rang nyid khrus la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du bya
T02D2626:117b-49: / par bya'o // ba nyid do // de nas
T02D2626:117b-50: dri mnam pa sngar nyams su ma myong ba'i dri
T02D2626:117b-51: ngad ldang pa'am rlangs pa'am du ba'am /
T02D2626:118a-2: snod 'gul ba'am mar 'khol lam sa g-yo 'am gzhan
T02D2626:118a-3: yang de dag la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bdag nyid
T02D2626:118a-4: kyis mngon sum du mthong ba ni shin tu khyad
T02D2626:118a-7: shin tu 'jigs pa bag tsha ba spu ldad ba dang /
T02D2626:118a-8: gnas kyi phyi rol rnams su sgra khyad par can
T02D2626:118a-9: drag pa la sogs pa'ang rtags 'bring du bshad pa
T02D2626:118a-10: yin pas 'jigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs
T02D2626:118a-11: pa mi bya bar bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems
T02D2626:118a-12: pas dga' ba dang bcas pa'i spro ba chen po
T02D2626:118a-13: bskyed par bya'o // gzhan yang bdag gi rmi lam du //
T02D2626:118a-14: ma 'am sring mo'am sru mo'am bram ze'am khye'u gtsang ma'am rgyal rigs sa ma /
T02D2626:118a-17: bla ma la sogs pas mar ram /
T02D2626:118a-19: chang ngam 'o ma 'am zho 'am kha zas kyi
T02D2626:118a-20: rnam pa ro dang ldan pa byin pa bdag gis
T02D2626:118a-21: zos sam / 'thungs pa rmi na ni mtshan ma tha mar shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:118a-22: de nas ston zla bring po'i zla ba nya ba'i
T02D2626:118a-23: skabs su bab pa dang bdag nyid khrus legs par
T02D2626:118a-24: byas te mchod pas yongs su mchod nas bsrung ba
T02D2626:118a-25: la sogs pa byas la mtshan thog thag de bzhin
T02D2626:118a-26: gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i snying po lag
T02D2626:118a-27: pa g-yon pas mar gyi steng du rdo rje dang
T02D2626:118a-28: bcas pas mnan la nam langs kyi bar du ba
T02D2626:118a-29: zlas la nam langs pa dang bdag gis mar de
T02D2626:118a-31: 'thungs nas kyang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su mchod
T02D2626:118a-32: la bde bar gshegs pa rnams gshegs su gsol bar
T02D2626:118a-34: de nas mtshan ma ji ltar bzhin du byung ba na /
T02D2626:118a-35: nam nyi ma dang zla ba gnas kyi bar du
T02D2626:118a-36: tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro
T02D2626:118a-37: // tha mas ni tha ma 'grub par 'gyur bas 'di la the tshom med do //
T02D2626:118a-38: mtshan ma ma byung na'ang 'jig rten na nad med
T02D2626:118a-39: lob skyen lus la skra dkar dang gnyer ma med
T02D2626:118a-40: par 'gyur / lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:118b-0: rgyas pa dang dbang la sogs @118b pa'i las rnams
T02D2626:118b-1: brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te 'di la the tshom
T02D2626:118b-2: med do zhes gsungs pa ni /
T02D2626:118b-3: de'i phan yon yongs su gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:118b-4: de la gong du gsungs pa'i mtshan ma me 'bar ba dang /
T02D2626:118b-5: 'od byung ba dang du ba byung ba na mar
T02D2626:118b-6: de nyid 'thungs la gzhan sman gyi phye ma rnams
T02D2626:118b-7: ni bsod nams chung ba dang /
T02D2626:118b-9: tshe thung ba la sogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2626:118b-10: de nas ni nges par 'jig rten na zla ba
T02D2626:118b-11: dang nyi ma gnas kyi bar du de srid du
T02D2626:118b-12: gnas par 'gyur ba ni nges pa'o //
T02D2626:118b-13: tha mas ni tham 'grub po zhes pa ni me
T02D2626:118b-14: 'bar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma mngon sum du
T02D2626:118b-15: ma byung na ba spu ldan ba dang /

T02D2626:118b-17: du gnas kyi bar du dus ma yin par mi
T02D2626:118b-18: 'chi ba dang / mthu dang stobs dang dbang phyug
T02D2626:118b-19: la sogs pa snga na med pa skyed par byed
T02D2626:118b-20: 'chi ba dang / pa nyid do ; / de
T02D2626:118b-21: nas rmi lam gyi mtshan ma rnams byung bas kyang
T02D2626:118b-22: 'jig rten du gnas kyi bar du rims dang nad
T02D2626:118b-23: dang dug dang mtshon la sogs pas mi tshugs pa
T02D2626:118b-24: 'chi ba dang / pa nyid do ; dang / mdog bzhin mdangs dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2626:118b-25: skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa dang /
T02D2626:118b-29: mi rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
T02D2626:118b-33: mngon spyod la sogs pa'ang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:118b-34: de'i rnam par dbye ba ni 'di ltar rtags dang
T02D2626:118b-35: mtshan ma de rab kyi tshad du byung na ni
T02D2626:118b-36: mar gcig pu tsam btung bar bya zhing /
T02D2626:118b-37: gal te rtags 'bring po dang tha ma byung ba
T02D2626:118b-38: na ni mar de'i sum cha dang bsnyams pa'i 'bras
T02D2626:118b-39: bu gsum dang / mar de'i sum cha dang bsnyams pa'i bu ram dang /
T02D2626:118b-40: mar de'i sum cha dang bsnyams pa'i tsha ba gsum dang /
T02D2626:118b-41: sngar gyi sman gyi phye ma rnams yongs su bsres
T02D2626:118b-42: nas ri lu aa shva ka'i 'bras bu tsam byas
T02D2626:118b-43: te / lo gcig gi bar du nang re lto
T02D2626:118b-44: stong la zos na tshe lo brgya bdun cu thub
T02D2626:118b-45: bcings bon rab tu 'phel lus kyi sha rnams byis
T02D2626:118b-46: pa gzhon pa dang 'dra bar rgyas zhing 'jam par
T02D2626:119a-0: te / 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang bud med @119a * //
T02D2626:119a-1: la grangs dpag tu med pa nus pa dang /

T02D2626:119a-4: dngos grub la sogs pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ba ni the tshom mi za ste /
T02D2626:119a-5: bdag gis mngon sum mthong ba'i phyir ro //

T02D2626:119a-9: rkang mgyogs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba dang mi ma yin pa dang /
T02D2626:119a-15: srin po rnams kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta
T02D2626:119a-16: bur mthong zhing de la dngos grub la sogs pa

T02D2626:119a-25: chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
T02D2626:119a-26: la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //

T02D2626:119a-30: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol /

T02D2626:119a-33: ngas kyang rjes su yi rang bzhing byin gyis brlab
T02D2626:119a-34: par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir rnam pa gsum
T02D2626:119a-36: de la gcig ni rgyal po chen po bzhi la
T02D2626:119a-37: sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyis dam pa'i
T02D2626:119a-38: chos la bsnyen bkug bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi
T02D2626:119a-40: gcig ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i byin
T02D2626:119a-41: gyi rlabs kyis rnal 'byor pa la 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2626:119a-42: dngos grub phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir de
T02D2626:119a-43: dag gis snying po phul nas de dag gi dkyil
T02D2626:119b-0: 'khor gsungs pa'o // gcig ni dam pa'i @119b chos
T02D2626:119b-1: 'di spyod pa dang bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa
T02D2626:119b-2: rab tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir srung ma'i tshogs
T02D2626:119b-3: su yang dag par bkod pa yin par shes par
T02D2626:119b-4: 'khor gsungs pa'o // bya ste / de nyid 'dir
T02D2626:119b-5: tshe bsgrub pa la bgegs kyi tshogs bar gcod byed
T02D2626:119b-6: pas na de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten
T02D2626:119b-7: pa'i dkyil 'khor skabs 'dir gsungs pa nyid do //
T02D2626:119b-8: de la bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can
T02D2626:119b-9: thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du
T02D2626:119b-10: zhes pa ni 'jig rten na de dag gi 'khor
T02D2626:119b-11: rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa rnams la dkyil 'khor
T02D2626:119b-12: 'dir zhugs pa dpon po'am rje bo lta bur mthong
T02D2626:119b-13: ba'i phyir 'tshe ba la sogs pa med par 'gyur
T02D2626:119b-14: ba ni phan pa dang bde ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:119b-15: rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis bcom ldan
T02D2626:119b-16: 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes pa ni rnam
T02D2626:119b-17: pa gnyis te / de la gcig ni spobs pa bskyed du gsol zhes pa'o//
T02D2626:119b-18: gcig ni bdag cag gi snying bo la bcom ldan
T02D2626:119b-19: 'das kyis byin gyis brlab cing dkyil 'khor gsung du
T02D2626:119b-21: de la gang dag 'di skad du rgyal po chen
T02D2626:119b-22: po rnams kyi snying po byin gyis brlabs pa la
T02D2626:119b-23: dgongs pa ji lta bu zhig yod ce na /

T02D2626:119b-26: snying po dang rnal 'byor thabs cig tu byar mi
T02D2626:119b-27: rung ste / dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
T02D2626:119b-28: de'i phyir de dag gi snying po bcom ldan 'das
T02D2626:119b-29: phyag na rdo rjes yang dag par byin gyis brlabs
T02D2626:119b-30: pa dang de dag gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gsungs
T02D2626:119b-31: pa ste / dper na chu ma bskol ba dang /
T02D2626:119b-32: mar khu 'drer mi btub pa bzhin no //
T02D2626:119b-33: rgyal po dag shod cig dang ngas kyang rjes su
T02D2626:119b-34: yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D2626:119b-35: pa ni de bzhin du mdzad pa yin par shes

T02D2626:120a-5: de nas klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di phyung ngo //
T02D2626:120a-6: aom ksha zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di ltar
T02D2626:120a-7: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rgyal po bzhi'i
T02D2626:120a-8: snying po yongs su dag par byin gyis brlabs shing
T02D2626:120a-9: gnang ba byin pas rgyal po bzhis snying po phul

T02D2626:120a-12: 'das phyag na rdo rje ni gnod sbyin rnams 'dul
T02D2626:120a-13: ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs su bzhugs pas
T02D2626:120a-14: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lus ngan po rang nyid
T02D2626:120a-15: gtso bo la spobs pa bskyed nas ngang por zhugs
T02D2626:120a-16: pa yin pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lus
T02D2626:120a-17: ngan po zhes dang la smos pa'o //
T02D2626:120a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gong ma la bsnyegs so //
T02D2626:120a-19: rang gi snying po ni rang skyed par byed pa
T02D2626:120a-20: dang rang gi ming dang mthun pa'i phyir rang gi
T02D2626:120a-22: de la snying po ni skabs 'dir srog la bya ste /

T02D2626:120a-27: rang rang gi ming dang mthun pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2626:120a-28: rang rang gi srog gi snying po rnams phul ba ni dhi dang /

T02D2626:120a-32: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2626:120a-33: dkyil 'khor lnga ni brgyan pa ste //

T02D2626:120a-39: sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs //

T02D2626:120b-16: su stegs bu khru bcu drug pa brtsigs la thig

T02D2626:138a-21: bar bya'o // lha de dag thams cad kyang thod pa lnga yis mgo la brgyan pa /
T02D2626:138a-22: mi mgo'i phreng bas lus la brgyan pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis kun du brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:138a-23: sgo rnams su ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2626:138a-24: pa'i sgo ba shin tu khros pa'i bzhin dang ldan
T02D2626:138a-25: pa bri bar bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:138a-26: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas //
T02D2626:138a-27: bkug ste mgo yi thod pa ni //
T02D2626:138a-28: khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kyang //
T02D2626:138a-29: sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang //
T02D2626:138a-30: snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang //
T02D2626:138a-31: mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang //
T02D2626:138a-32: khrag gam chang ngam bum pa brgyad //
T02D2626:138a-33: dkyil 'khor der ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:138a-34: de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal ba'i //
T02D2626:138a-35: gzugs kyis slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02D2626:138a-36: bum pa'am mgo yi thod pa ni //
T02D2626:138a-37: de ltar brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2626:138a-38: zhes gsungs pa ni 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du slob ma dbang bskur bar gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:138a-39: de la dkyil 'khor mtha' mar bum pa kha dog
T02D2626:138a-40: nag po dgu dang dang por bsnyen pa byas pa'i
T02D2626:138b-0: rnam par @138b rgyal ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa'i bum
T02D2626:138b-1: pa dang bcu gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2626:138b-2: de la 'jigs byed rnams kyis bum pa ni khrag
T02D2626:138b-3: dang chang dang sha la sogs pas bkang bar bya'o
T02D2626:138b-4: // de'i steng du mi'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2626:138b-5: mgul chings ni mi'i pags pas dkri zhing kha rgyan
T02D2626:138b-6: ni mi'i skra la sogs pas bya ba nyid do
T02D2626:138b-7: // rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni ras dmar
T02D2626:138b-8: pos dkri zhing nang dug gi chus dgang bar bya
T02D2626:138b-9: // ste / kha rgyan ni shing tsher ma can la sogs pas bya'o //
T02D2626:138b-10: de nas mchod pa'i tshogs ni mi'am glang po che
T02D2626:138b-11: la sogs pa'i sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang
T02D2626:138b-12: tshil gyi zhu na mar dang 'bras chan dang chang
T02D2626:138b-14: pags pa la sogs pas yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:138b-15: bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba mchod
T02D2626:138b-16: pa'i phyir thun mong gi mchod pa'i yo byad lngas
T02D2626:138b-17: nye bar gnas par byas la rang gi sa bon
T02D2626:138b-18: las 'od zer spros pas bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs
T02D2626:138b-19: la gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02D2626:138b-20: de bzhin du 'jigs byed 'khor dang bcas pa'ang bkug
T02D2626:138b-21: la lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gnyis
T02D2626:138b-22: su med par byas la mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yongs
T02D2626:138b-24: de nas mgo bo'i thod pa'i phyag rgyas rang nyid
T02D2626:138b-25: zhugs la bcom ldan 'das la rim gro ji lta
T02D2626:138b-26: ba bzhin du dbang mnos te /
T02D2626:138b-27: gnang ba legs par thob pa dang slob ma dkyil
T02D2626:138b-28: 'khor du gzhug par bya ba ni rang nyid bcom
T02D2626:138b-29: ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su
T02D2626:138b-30: bsams te rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu
T02D2626:138b-31: blangs pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2626:138b-32: de nas slob ma des sha chen la sogs pa thogs pas gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2626:138b-33: aom badzra bhe ra ba sa ma ye h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2626:138b-34: de nas aom badzra ma h'a bhee ra ba pra t'i tstsha ho zhes pas dor bar bya'o //
T02D2626:138b-35: de nas gdong g-yogs bsal te bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2626:138b-36: sogs pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan
T02D2626:138b-37: te / dang por 'jigs byed chen po'i sngags /
T02D2626:139a-1: h'a bhee ra ba ka p'a la ka la sha
T02D2626:139a-2: aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes pa gtso bo'i bum pas
T02D2626:139a-4: de bzhin du aom aa tam ge bhee ra ba
T02D2626:139a-5: ka p'a la ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa h'um
T02D2626:139a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis rim pa ji
T02D2626:139a-7: lta ba bzhin du 'jigs byed brgyad po'i bum pas
T02D2626:139a-9: de nas de dag gi dam tshig gi rdzas sha
T02D2626:139a-10: chen dang tshil chen dang khrag la sogs pa la
T02D2626:139a-11: 'jigs byed chen po'i sngags stong ngam brgya bzlas pas
T02D2626:139a-12: btab la zar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2626:139a-13: de nas mtshon rtse gsum po la srid pa gsum
T02D2626:139a-14: po 'bigs par byed par bsams nas sngags dang bcas
T02D2626:139a-15: pas lag pa g-yas pas gtang bar bya'o //
T02D2626:139a-16: de nas thod pa khrag gis bkang ba gcig lag
T02D2626:139a-17: pa g-yon par gtad de srid pa gsum pa'i srog
T02D2626:139a-18: gi khrag thams cad 'thung bar bsams la sngags dang
T02D2626:139a-19: bcas pas dbang bskur bar bya'o//
T02D2626:139a-20: de nas de nyid 'jigs byed chen po dang gnyis su med par dbang bskur te /
T02D2626:139a-21: de'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par
T02D2626:139a-22: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis dbang bskur bar
T02D2626:139a-23: bya ste / de ni dam tshig brtan par bya ba'i phyir bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:139a-24: de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste //
T02D2626:139a-25: ma mo'i khyim mam shing gcig gam //
T02D2626:139a-26: dur khrod kyi ni gnas dag tu //
T02D2626:139a-27: 'jigs rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog / tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang //
T02D2626:139a-28: 'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya //
T02D2626:139a-29: zhes gsungs pa ni de'i bsgrub pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:139a-30: de la ma mo'i khyim zhes pa ni khang stong la sogs pa'o //
T02D2626:139a-31: shing gcig pa ni skye shing zla med par gcig pu gnas pa dang /
T02D2626:139a-32: dur khrod la sogs pa gnas mi bzad pa rnams
T02D2626:139a-33: su gong du smos pa'i tshul gyis 'jigs byed 'khor
T02D2626:139a-34: dang bcas pa bsams nas mi rus kyi phreng ba
T02D2626:139a-35: la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum phrag bzhis gtor ma dang
T02D2626:139a-36: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mchod
T02D2626:139a-37: cing bzlas par bya ste de ni bsnyen pa zhes
T02D2626:139a-38: bya'o // de nas dngos grub tu gyur ba dang thabs ji lta bus bya snyams pa la /
T02D2626:139a-39: de nas 'jigs par byed pa yi //
T02D2626:139b-0: bdag nyid chen po'i sgra @139b thos nas //
T02D2626:139b-1: mi 'jigs par ni mgo thod pa //
T02D2626:139b-2: khrag gis bkang ste aargha dbul //
T02D2626:139b-3: de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa //
T02D2626:139b-4: ma rungs yid can bud med kyi //
T02D2626:139b-5: tshogs kyis bskor zhing 'jigs byed pa //
T02D2626:139b-6: brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2626:139b-7: de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la //
T02D2626:139b-8: h'um zhes bya ba dran byed cing //
T02D2626:139b-9: sha'am yang na chang mchog gis //
T02D2626:139b-10: thod pa bkang ste sbyin par bya //
T02D2626:139b-12: mgu nas rab tu grub gyur nas //
T02D2626:139b-13: ci 'dod ces ni smras nas kyang //
T02D2626:139b-14: mgu ba'i yid kyis de ster te //
T02D2626:139b-15: sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs pa //
T02D2626:139b-16: bde chen h'um gi gsol ba gdab //
T02D2626:139b-18: de la sngags kyi bzlas pa grangs su thim pa
T02D2626:139b-19: dang 'jigs byed chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dngos
T02D2626:139b-21: de la dang po rtags ni shin tu 'jigs pa'i
T02D2626:139b-22: sgra drag po stong gsum thams cad g-yos pa'i sgra
T02D2626:139b-24: de la bdag gis 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba'i
T02D2626:139b-25: sems mi bskyed par dga' ba dang bcas pa'i sems
T02D2626:139b-26: kyis de dag drung du 'ongs par bsams la thod
T02D2626:139b-27: pa'i phyag rgyas khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pas zhabs
T02D2626:139b-29: / de nas de'i skad cig gis mthar 'jigs byed
T02D2626:139b-30: chen po 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu 'jigs shing
T02D2626:139b-31: skrag par byed pa bdag la srog gcod pa dang
T02D2626:139b-33: de ni de'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa yin par
T02D2626:139b-34: bsams la bdag nyid de'i skad cig de nyid la
T02D2626:139b-35: bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs
T02D2626:139b-36: su bsgoms te / h'um zhes bya ba brjod nas
T02D2626:139b-37: sha dang chang dang khrag la sogs pas thod pa
T02D2626:139b-38: bkang la dbul bar bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:139b-39: de nas de rab tu mgu bar gyur pa las
T02D2626:139b-40: khyod dngos grub ci 'dod ces smra bar 'gyur te
T02D2626:139b-41: gang 'dod pa ster zhing 'grub par nges la byang
T02D2626:139b-42: chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya ba la
T02D2626:139b-43: sogs pa ni rnam par dag pa'i lha ma yin
T02D2626:139b-44: pa'i phyir mi nus la 'jig rten 'di'i dngos grub
T02D2626:139b-45: sna tshogs pa ster ba yin pas de la bdag
T02D2626:140a-0: nyid bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal @140a

T02D2626:140a-36: gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub ni 'tsho bde bar byed pa'o //
T02D2626:140a-37: dbang phyug gi dngos grub ni phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2626:140a-38: srin po'i dngos grub ni dgra'i tshogs thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //
T02D2626:140a-39: rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub ni drang srong gi tshogs kun gyis bsnyen bkur byed pa'o //
T02D2626:140a-40: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni gser la sogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'o //

T02D2626:152a-18: gsungs pa ste / gzhag par bya'o // de'i mtha'
T02D2626:152a-19: ma rnams su ni bum pa kha dog dkar po
T02D2626:152a-20: lnga la padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa 'od dang
T02D2626:152a-22: de'i lte ba la lha so so'i phyag rgya bris
T02D2626:152a-23: nas padma'i 'dab ma la yig 'bru'i rnam pa bhr'um
T02D2626:152a-24: dang dz+hi la sogs pa bcu drug tu 'khor bar
T02D2626:152a-25: bri bar bya'o // de'i phyi rol gyi 'od la
T02D2626:152a-26: ni khyab par 'byung ba rdo rje'i skabs su gsungs
T02D2626:152a-27: pa'i gsang sngags rnams rang rang gi rig pa ji
T02D2626:152a-28: lta ba bzhin pas bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:152a-29: gzhan yang 'dir ni mchod pa'i tshogs bsag pa ni bum pa de dag gi nang du dri dang /
T02D2626:152a-31: sman gyi rnam pa 'byor tshad dang /
T02D2626:152a-32: 'bras thug dang snying po la sogs pas rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:152a-33: ras la sogs pa kha dog dkar po rnams kyis mgul bcings pa dang /
T02D2626:152a-34: padma la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D2626:152a-35: me tog dang lo mar ldan pa rnams kyis kha rgyan legs par byas pa dang /
T02D2626:152a-36: me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang zhal zas dang snang ba dang /
T02D2626:152a-38: bca' ba'i rnam pa rnams ni brgya rtsa brgyad du
T02D2626:152a-39: yang dag par bsngags pas rgyud gzhan nas yongs su
T02D2626:152b-0: gsungs pa'o // mtha' 'khob la sogs par shin @152b
T02D2626:152b-1: tu dka' bar gyur na'ang lnga'am bcu las nyung du
T02D2626:152b-2: mi rung pas kho nas mi bya ba nyid do
T02D2626:152b-3: gsungs pa'o // // de la bdug pa la sogs
T02D2626:152b-4: pa la ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags
T02D2626:152b-5: kyis btab la gzhag par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:152b-6: bum pa rnams la ni gong du gsungs pa'i rtsa
T02D2626:152b-7: ba'i rigs brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs par bsngags la
T02D2626:152b-8: gzhag par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:152b-9: de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la /
T02D2626:152b-10: bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas shing rig pa
T02D2626:152b-11: dang lhan cig spyan drangs la bdag nyid dbang bskur
T02D2626:152b-12: bar bya'o // de nas skyil mo krung bcas la
T02D2626:152b-13: 'dug la mnyam par bzhag la stong ngam brgya bzlas
T02D2626:152b-14: bar bya'o // par bya ste / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
T02D2626:152b-16: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa
T02D2626:152b-17: mngon sum du mthong ba na ci 'dod pa'i mchog
T02D2626:152b-19: ci ste mnyam par ma bzhag na'ang de'i tshe yid
T02D2626:152b-20: kyi las nus pa dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur
T02D2626:152b-21: ro zhes gsungs pa ni nye ba'i sgrub pa gsungs
T02D2626:152b-22: pa ste / de la dang po bdag nyid dri dang /
T02D2626:152b-24: ba'i rnam lnga la sogs pas khrus legs par byas la ga bur la sogs pas lus byugs te /
T02D2626:152b-25: gos dkar po kha dog gtsang ma gyon nas /
T02D2626:152b-26: dbu rgyan dang rna cha dang /
T02D2626:152b-29: sor gdub rnams kyis legs par brgyan te /
T02D2626:152b-30: sems can thams cad kyi don du blo bskyed nas
T02D2626:152b-31: rang gi sa bon las 'od zer spros nas bde
T02D2626:152b-32: bar gshegs pa sras dang rig par bcas pa spyan
T02D2626:152b-33: drangs la / aargha la sogs pas zhabs bsil te /
T02D2626:152b-34: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas dgug pa dang /
T02D2626:152b-35: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dgye ba rnams byas la /
T02D2626:152b-36: gnyis su med par byas nas /
T02D2626:152b-37: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su mchod de /
T02D2626:152b-38: gong du gsungs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas zhugs la /
T02D2626:152b-39: bcom ldan 'das la dbang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du nod par bya'o //
T02D2626:152b-40: de nas gnang ba legs par thob pa dang /
T02D2626:153a-1: snying po'i bar du dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dang /
T02D2626:153a-2: mthar gnas kyi dang po la dbyangs kyi yi ge
T02D2626:153a-3: lnga pa btags pas 'bum phrag gcig gam khri phrag
T02D2626:153a-4: gcig gi bar du dag gi spyod yul las 'das
T02D2626:153a-5: shing / padma'i dkyil 'khor nas padma'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2626:153a-6: bzlas par bya ste de ni rdo rje bzlas pa
T02D2626:153a-7: shing / zhes bya'o // de nyid 'od zer kha
T02D2626:153a-8: dog dkar po shin tu gsal shing 'tsher ba stong
T02D2626:153a-9: gsum gyi stong thams cad du rab tu khyab pa'i
T02D2626:153a-10: 'od dang ldan pas rin po che'i phreng ba'i tshul
T02D2626:153a-12: de nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa snang ba'i cha'am /
T02D2626:153a-13: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
T02D2626:153a-14: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'am /
T02D2626:153a-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gam sman gyi
T02D2626:153a-16: bla beed'urya 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa snang
T02D2626:153a-17: bar gyur pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma
T02D2626:153a-18: lus par grub pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par
T02D2626:153a-19: 'gyur ba ni nges pa nyid do //
T02D2626:153a-20: de nyid las gzhan pa gzugs g-yo ba'am sems kyi
T02D2626:153a-21: bde ba la sogs pa rang gis yang dag par
T02D2626:153a-22: rig par gyur ba na'ang dngos grub la sogs pa
T02D2626:153a-23: nye bar gyur pa dang byin gyi rlabs chen por
T02D2626:153a-24: gyur pa'o // ci ste mnyam par ma bzhag pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2626:153a-25: phyi rol du dmigs pa'i bzlas pa bya ba ste /
T02D2626:153a-26: des kyang grangs su them par 'gyur ba ni phyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2626:153a-27: bsam pa'i khyad par thams cad gus pa dang ldan /
T02D2626:153a-28: stobs dang ldan byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2626:153a-29: de ni sngags kyi mthu las byung bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:153a-30: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2626:153a-35: ta th'a ga tas ma ya ma ti kra ma
T02D2626:153a-36: ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya a'atma ko& ham
T02D2626:153a-37: zhes nga rgyal bskyed la slob ma rnams gzhug par
T02D2626:153a-38: bya'o zhes pa ni sgrub pa'i rim pa gsungs pa
T02D2626:153a-39: ste / de la rang gi snying gar padma dmar
T02D2626:153a-40: po 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i steng du sngags gnyis
T02D2626:153a-42: de gyur pa las rdo rje rtse gsum par gyur te /
T02D2626:153b-0: de dag @153b yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2626:153b-1: aom badzra dha ra sa ma ya a'atma ko& ham zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:153b-2: de bzhin du dpral bar snying po lnga pa las
T02D2626:153b-3: rin po che bsams la de dag gyur pa las
T02D2626:153b-4: nam mkha'i snying po'i nga rgyal bskyed pa dang /
T02D2626:153b-5: lkog mar snying po drug pa las padma bsams pa
T02D2626:153b-6: las de gyur pa las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
T02D2626:153b-7: tu nga rgyal bskyed pa dang /
T02D2626:153b-8: lte bar snying po bzhi pa las ral grir bsams
T02D2626:153b-9: la de gyur pa las khams gsum rnam par rgyal
T02D2626:153b-11: yan lag thams cad la snying po gsum pa rtsa'i
T02D2626:153b-12: sbubs su zhugs pa las 'khor lo bsams la de
T02D2626:153b-13: gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i
T02D2626:153b-14: rgyal por nga rgyal bskyed par bya ba nyid dang
T02D2626:153b-15: / rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya ni gong du
T02D2626:153b-16: gsungs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas
T02D2626:153b-17: la bsam pa dang mthun par sngags rnams kyis byin
T02D2626:153b-18: gyis brlab par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:153b-19: de nas 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o /
T02D2626:153b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra t'itstsha ho sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2626:153b-21: de nas phreng ba nyid kyis mgo la bcings te /
T02D2626:153b-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya h'um bhr'um /
T02D2626:153b-24: aom badzra badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um badzram /
T02D2626:153b-25: aom ratna ratna aa bhi shinytsa h'um tram /
T02D2626:153b-26: aom padma padma aa bhi shinytsa h'um hram /
T02D2626:153b-27: aom karma karma aa bhi shinytsa h'um krum /
T02D2626:153b-28: zhes pa la sogs pa ni dbang bskur ba'i rim pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:153b-29: de ni sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'o//
T02D2626:153b-30: de la dang po slob ma de khrus la sogs pa legs par byas la /
T02D2626:153b-31: rgyan gyis brgyan nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2626:153b-32: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2626:153b-33: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams byas nas /
T02D2626:153b-34: ras la sogs pas mig bkab ste /
T02D2626:153b-35: rin po che'am me tog rnams //
T02D2626:153b-36: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra t'itstsha ho sa ma ya stvam zhes me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2626:153b-37: de nas pra'i mtshan ma legs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2626:153b-38: gong du gsungs pa'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs bkrol la /
T02D2626:154a-0: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du @154a * //
T02D2626:154a-2: sdom pa gzung ba dang rdo rje theg pa la khas yang dag par 'ches par byas nas /
T02D2626:154a-3: me tog gi phreng ba de nyid mgo la bcings te /
T02D2626:154a-4: chu la sogs pa'i dbang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2626:154a-5: de'i rjes la gong du gsungs pa'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2626:154a-6: de'i rjes thogs su bdag nyid gong du gsungs pa'i lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan par byas pa las /
T02D2626:154a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa badzra
T02D2626:154a-8: dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya h'um bhr'um zhes pa
T02D2626:154a-9: la sogs rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbang
T02D2626:154a-10: bskur bar bya'o // de nas khyad par 'byung ba'i
T02D2626:154a-11: rdo rjer gsungs pa'i dbang phreng ba dang phyag rgya
T02D2626:154a-12: bskur bar bya'o // dang las dang / gzungs dang gsang ba dang thabs dang shes rab dang /
T02D2626:154a-13: 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa'i dbang bcu rdzogs par bskur bar bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:154a-14: de yang 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
T02D2626:154a-15: la rigs kyi mtshan lan gnyis smos pa ni sprul
T02D2626:154a-16: pa la dgongs nas gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:154a-17: sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang chos kyi sku'i sprul pa yin du zin kyang /
T02D2626:154a-18: 'bras bu'i sa la gnas pa dang /
T02D2626:154a-19: lam gyi sa la gnas pa la dgongs nas byang
T02D2626:154a-20: chub sems dpa' rnams sprul pa'i sprul par 'dod do
T02D2626:154a-21: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang la rdo rje'i rigs
T02D2626:154a-22: kyi mtshan smos pa ni 'dir tshe dpag med kyi
T02D2626:154a-23: sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir tshe rdo rje dang 'dra
T02D2626:154a-24: bar byed pas na rdo rje'i tshig smos pa nyid
T02D2626:154a-26: de nas dam tshig dang bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2626:154a-28: dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems //
T02D2626:154a-29: bla ma dam pa mi spang zhing //
T02D2626:154a-30: srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya //
T02D2626:154a-31: ma byin par yang mi blang zhing //
T02D2626:154a-32: brdzun du smra bar bya ba min //
T02D2626:154a-33: pha rol bud med spyad mi bya //
T02D2626:154a-34: nyes pa kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i //
T02D2626:154a-35: chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing //
T02D2626:154a-36: bla ma smad par mi bya ste //
T02D2626:154a-37: de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom zhing //
T02D2626:154a-38: slob dpon ma yin mi gzung la //
T02D2626:154a-39: rdo rje slob dpon mtshan mi brjod //
T02D2626:154a-40: sngags dang phyag rgya'ang mi smad na //
T02D2626:154a-41: lha rnams la lta smos ci dgos //
T02D2626:154b-0: gal te glen @154b pas smad na ni //
T02D2626:154b-2: pha rol mnar med mi bzad pa'i //
T02D2626:154b-3: dmyal bar skye bar the tshom med //
T02D2626:154b-4: snying dang lha yi grib ma dang //
T02D2626:154b-6: phyag rgya yi ge mtshan ma rnams //
T02D2626:154b-8: mkhas pas dkon mchog gsum sogs dang //
T02D2626:154b-9: sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang //
T02D2626:154b-10: bla ma smod brtson la sogs rnams //
T02D2626:154b-11: snying rjes bsgral te gsad par bya //
T02D2626:154b-12: chos mi ldan dang sdig spyod dang //
T02D2626:154b-13: rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang //
T02D2626:154b-14: dam tshig nyams rnams mkhas pas ni //
T02D2626:154b-15: sngags dang mthu dang sbyor bas bsad //
T02D2626:154b-16: rdzas dang ldan zhing ser sna can //
T02D2626:154b-17: shin tu 'chums pa'i nor blangs la //
T02D2626:154b-18: sems can phongs la sbyin pa bya //
T02D2626:154b-19: bla ma la ni mchod pa dang //
T02D2626:154b-20: de ltar dam tshig bsgrub pa dag //
T02D2626:154b-21: dkyil 'khor phyir dang spun rnams dang //
T02D2626:154b-22: de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras rnams la //
T02D2626:154b-23: mchod phyir mi yi bdag po'am //
T02D2626:154b-24: phyug po rnams kyi nor phrog go //
T02D2626:154b-25: sems can rnams la phan spyod dang //
T02D2626:154b-26: de bzhin bla ma'i nor rnams dang //
T02D2626:154b-27: srog chags srog ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D2626:154b-28: brdzun gyi tshig ni smra bar bya //
T02D2626:154b-29: sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang //
T02D2626:154b-30: dam tshig yongs su bsrung ba dang //
T02D2626:154b-31: sngags mkhan gyis ni sgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2626:154b-32: gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya //
T02D2626:154b-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas //
T02D2626:154b-34: thams cad spyad cing kun zos kyang //
T02D2626:154b-36: / snying rje ldan la smos ci dgos //
T02D2626:154b-37: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ni dam tshig gi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:154b-38: de la de dag las dkon mchog mi spang ba dang /
T02D2626:154b-39: byang chub kyi sems mi spang ba dang /
T02D2626:154b-40: bla ma dam pa mi spang ba dang /
T02D2626:154b-41: srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa dang /
T02D2626:154b-42: ma byin par len pa las slar ldog pa dang /
T02D2626:154b-43: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa las slar ldog pa dang /
T02D2626:154b-44: brdzun du smra ba las slar ldog pa dag ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig bdun zhes bya ste /
T02D2626:155a-0: de dag nyams par gyur pa ni theg pa chen po'i lam las ltung @155a * //
T02D2626:155a-2: mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar nges pas na /
T02D2626:155a-3: de la gso bar bya ba'i thabs ni de bzhin
T02D2626:155a-4: gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i
T02D2626:155a-5: dkyil 'khor du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar
T02D2626:155a-6: du zhugs shing dbang mnos nas sbyin sreg 'bum dang
T02D2626:155a-7: / gtor ma dang yi ge brgya pa'i snying po 'bum dang /
T02D2626:155a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su
T02D2626:155a-9: sbyong ba'i snying po la sogs pas yongs su dag
T02D2626:155a-11: des ni sdig pa'i rgyud las rnam par thar bar 'gyur to /
T02D2626:155a-12: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D2626:155a-13: de la dkon mchog gsum mi spang ba ni de dag la ma gus pa dang /
T02D2626:155a-14: rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:155a-15: byang chub sems mi spang ba ni gong du smos
T02D2626:155a-16: pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gsum mi spang
T02D2626:155a-17: pa'o // bla ma mi spang ba ni bla ma dam pa rnams la ma gus pa dang /
T02D2626:155a-18: khyad du gsod pa la sogs pa mi bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:155a-19: srog gcod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2626:155a-20: bsams bzhin du gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pas mi'i 'gro ba bsang na ltung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2626:155a-21: dud 'gro'am sprul pa la sogs pa ni nyes pa sbom po yin te /
T02D2626:155a-22: de ni gtor mas 'dag par gsungs so //
T02D2626:155a-23: ma byin par len pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2626:155a-25: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas dang /
T02D2626:155a-26: 'phags pa'i dkor dang sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams kyi rdzas te /
T02D2626:155a-27: de dag gi nyes pas ni gong du smos pa rnam par sbyang ngo //
T02D2626:155a-28: sems can gzhan dang dud 'gro la sogs pa'i rdzas ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:155a-29: pha rol gyi bud med mi spyad pa ni gnyis te /
T02D2626:155a-30: 'khor ba'i longs spyod reg bya'i bde ba la chags pa dang /
T02D2626:155a-31: gzugs la chags pas bdag po dang bcas pa'i bud med la spyod pa dang /
T02D2626:155a-32: rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir bdag po dang bcas ba'i bud med la spyod pa ste /
T02D2626:155a-33: gzhan gyis bdag gir ma byas pa'i bud med la
T02D2626:155a-34: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i ched du
T02D2626:155a-35: spyod pa ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:155b-0: brdzun du smra ba @155b ni gnyis te /
T02D2626:155b-1: dam pa'i chos log par ston pa dang /
T02D2626:155b-2: bdag nyid yon tan gyi tshogs dang mi ldan par
T02D2626:155b-3: gzhan gyi rnyed pa bsdu ba'i phyir rang gi yon
T02D2626:155b-4: tan gyi tshogs dang ldan par smra zhing gzhan bslu
T02D2626:155b-5: ba ste / de las gzhan pa'i brdzun ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:155b-6: rtsa ba'i dam tshig ni gong du smos pa las
T02D2626:155b-7: shes par bya ba nyes pa sbom po ni gtor
T02D2626:155b-8: ma dang yi ge brgya pa dang /
T02D2626:155b-9: sbyin sreg la sogs pa gang yang rung bas bshags par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:155b-10: chang ni nyes pa sbom po rnams kyi nang na lci ba ste /
T02D2626:155b-11: de ni rnam pa gsum mo /
T02D2626:155b-12: nyes pa sbom po rnams shor ba dang /
T02D2626:155b-13: gzhan gyi sems 'khrugs par byas pa dang ji srid

T02D2626:170a-40: brgya phrag stong du bsregs byas na //

T02D2626:173b-2: bgegs dang bdud la sogs pa'i tshogs gzhom pa'i phyir
T02D2626:173b-3: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
T02D2626:173b-4: de la gdon rnams gzhom bya'i phyir //
T02D2626:173b-5: mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ste //
T02D2626:173b-6: phyed dang gsum las khru gsum mam ;
T02D2626:173b-7: / de ltar rab ni khru dgur bya //
T02D2626:173b-8: grva gsum dang ni ldan pa la //
T02D2626:173b-9: dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa //
T02D2626:173b-10: kha dog nag po 'bar ba bri //
T02D2626:173b-11: mu ran gyi ni nang dag tu //
T02D2626:173b-12: rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa'i //
T02D2626:173b-13: rdo rje rnams ni bskor bar bya //
T02D2626:173b-14: de yi phyi rol mu khyud ni //
T02D2626:173b-15: dbyug pa rdo rje rtse gsum dang ;
T02D2626:173b-16: / dgra sta dang ni ral gris bskor //
T02D2626:173b-17: phyi rol du ni rim gsum dang //
T02D2626:173b-18: snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya //
T02D2626:173b-19: bya dang gtor ma'i bum pa dang //
T02D2626:173b-20: bshos cha rnam pa mang du gzhag / sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi //
T02D2626:173b-21: mgo bo'i thod pa kun du gzhag / lus can de yi sdig sogs pa //
T02D2626:173b-22: bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2626:173b-23: gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang //
T02D2626:173b-24: 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid can //
T02D2626:173b-25: ting nge 'dzin du snyoms zhugs nas //
T02D2626:173b-26: de nas sdig bcom lus de ni //
T02D2626:173b-27: bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar //
T02D2626:173b-28: mtho ris 'jig rten mi yi nang //
T02D2626:173b-29: khams gsum po na ci dgar spyod //
T02D2626:173b-31: de la mngon spyod kyi thab khung tha ma ni khru phyed dang gsum pa'o //
T02D2626:173b-32: bar ma ni khru gsum pa'o //
T02D2626:173b-33: rab ni khru dgu par bya ste /
T02D2626:173b-34: dbyibs ni gru gsum du bya'o //
T02D2626:173b-35: de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa kha
T02D2626:173b-36: dog nag po 'od zer nag po dang ldan pa
T02D2626:173b-37: bri bar bya'o // de'i grva gsum du ni mtshon
T02D2626:173b-38: rtse gsum pa 'bar ba gsum nang du kha bltas
T02D2626:173b-40: de'i mu ran du ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D2626:173b-41: rdo rje rgya gram gyi phreng bas bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:173b-42: de'i steng du ni dbyug pa dang dgra sta'i phreng bas bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:173b-43: ral gri dang rdo rje ni mtshon rtse gsum pa'i bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:173b-44: mu ran gyi steng du dbyug pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2626:173b-45: phyi rol du ni me 'od 'bar ba dmar nag
T02D2626:174a-1: tshogs ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:174a-2: bya dang bum pa dang bshos la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i 'byor pa thams cad gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2626:174a-3: mu ran gyi phyi rol rim pa gsum pa la
T02D2626:174a-4: ni gong du gsungs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs
T02D2626:174a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
T02D2626:174a-7: phyogs skyong la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:174a-8: de nas gtor ma'i tshogs dang /
T02D2626:174a-9: me tog nag po'am sngon po'i phreng bas brgyan par bya'o //
T02D2626:174a-10: de nas bdag nyid rdo rde rtse gcig pa'am /
T02D2626:174a-11: ral gri'i skyil mo krung bcas la gos nag po gyon te /
T02D2626:174a-12: mi rus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan nas /
T02D2626:174a-13: bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la /
T02D2626:174a-14: mig bgrad pas bgegs la bltas te /
T02D2626:174a-16: rngub pa bgegs la byas la lcags sam mi rus
T02D2626:174a-17: kyi gzar bu zur gsum pa khru gang pa thogs
T02D2626:174a-18: te bsreg par bya ba ni /
T02D2626:174a-20: lcags phye dang rus phye dang /
T02D2626:174a-21: seng ldeng gi tshor ma dang /
T02D2626:174a-22: dug dang ske tshe dang yungs kar gyi rgyal po dang /
T02D2626:174a-26: mi'i mar khu'i bdug pa dang /
T02D2626:174a-27: shing tsher ma can la sogs pa'i yam shing gis
T02D2626:174a-28: lan grangs stong ngam 'bum phrag gcig gi bar du
T02D2626:174a-29: bsreg par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:174a-30: de bzhin du drag po'i las kyi sngags mthar btags
T02D2626:174a-31: ba grangs ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa las
T02D2626:174a-32: ni mtho ri sa na gnas pa'i gang zag de
T02D2626:174a-33: bgegs dang gnod pa'i tshogs dang bral nas bde 'gro'i
T02D2626:174a-34: gnas na bde ba dang ldan par spyod pa nyid
T02D2626:174a-35: do // go rims 'di dag nyid kyis ni //
T02D2626:174a-36: de yi gnas la bya ba ste //
T02D2626:174a-37: de nas gang gi phyir bya ba //
T02D2626:174a-38: de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur //
T02D2626:174a-39: gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams ni //
T02D2626:174a-40: snga ma de bzhin de ltar bya //
T02D2626:174a-41: des ni sems can rnams la yang //
T02D2626:174b-0: zhes gsungs pa ni phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i las spyir khyab par gsungs @174b te ;
T02D2626:174b-1: de la go rims 'di dag nyid kyis ni //
T02D2626:174b-2: zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i thab khung dang /
T02D2626:174b-3: mchod rdzas dang phyag rgyal sogs pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D2626:174b-4: de dag gis tshe 'das pa'i don du yang bya la /
T02D2626:174b-5: gang gzhan dag tu 'tsho ba dang ldan pa'i phyir
T02D2626:174b-6: yang de bzhin du las kyi rim pa rnams bya
T02D2626:174b-7: bar gsungs so // de la sogs pa'i las dang
T02D2626:174b-8: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad snga ma
T02D2626:174b-9: bzhin du sems can gang dang gang gi don du
T02D2626:174b-10: bar gsungs so // byas pa las / sems can
T02D2626:174b-11: thams cad bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
T02D2626:174b-13: gzhan yang de dag gis rnam par dbye ba ni sangs rgyas rol pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2626:174b-14: phyogs dang ting 'dzin kha dog dang //
T02D2626:174b-15: grangs dang phreng ba bzlas pa yi //
T02D2626:174b-18: zhes gsungs pa ni zhi ba'i las kyi skabs su
T02D2626:174b-19: mchod rdzas dang yo byad thams cad dkar por byas
T02D2626:174b-20: la / kha shar phyogs su bltas la brgya rtsa
T02D2626:174b-21: brgyad pa'i phreng bas mdzub mo la bzlas shing zhi
T02D2626:174b-23: rgyas pa ni yo byad thams cad ser por byas la kha byang phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2626:174b-24: brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i phreng ba gung mo la bzlas
T02D2626:174b-25: shing dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis rgyas par bya'o
T02D2626:174b-26: // dbang la ni yo byang thams cad dmar por byas la /
T02D2626:174b-27: nub phyogs su kha bltas te nyi shu pa'i grangs
T02D2626:174b-28: kyi phreng ba srin lag la bzlas shing chags pa
T02D2626:174b-29: chen po'i sems kyis dbang du bya'o //
T02D2626:174b-30: mngon spyod la ni yong byang rnams nag por byas
T02D2626:174b-31: la lho phyogs su kha bltas te drug cu pa'i
T02D2626:174b-32: phreng ba mthe'u chung la bzlas shing zhe sdang chen
T02D2626:174b-33: po'i sems kyis mngon spyod bya'o //
T02D2626:174b-34: phreng ba'i rnam par dbye ba ni zhi ba la
T02D2626:174b-35: ni shel lam dngul gyi ri lu la sogs pas
T02D2626:174b-36: bya'o // rgyas pa la ni gser ram gur gum gyi ri lu la sogs pas bya'o //
T02D2626:174b-37: dbang la ni tsandan dmar po'i 'bras bu'am /
T02D2626:174b-38: padma'i sa bon gyi ri lu la sogs pas bya'o //
T02D2626:174b-39: mngon spyod la ni mi rus kyi phreng ba nag po'am /
T02D2626:174b-41: dug gi ri lu la sogs pas bya'o //
T02D2626:175a-1: dbye ba ni 'og nas ston pa 'gyur la /
T02D2626:175a-2: 'dir yang rgyud gzhan nas ni zhi ba la ni snga dro dang po shis so //
T02D2626:175a-3: rgyas pa la ni bza' ba longs spyod pa'i thun tshod gnyis pa la shis so //
T02D2626:175a-4: dbang la ni thun tshod gsum pa nas nub kyi bar du shis so //
T02D2626:175a-5: mngon spyod la ni srod 'khor nas nam phyed kyi bar du shis par gsungs so //
T02D2626:175a-6: de bas na de ltar yan lag thams cad yongs
T02D2626:175a-7: su mthun zhing tshang bas las rnam par 'grub par
T02D2626:175a-8: 'gyur gyi // gzhan du ni rang nyid dam tshig nyams pa dang /
T02D2626:175a-10: dper na nad pa gang zhig la nad 'tsho bar
T02D2626:175a-11: byed pa'i sman dag gtong na sman rnams kyi thun
T02D2626:175a-12: dang / drod tshad dang sna grangs 'dzom pa las nad zhi bar 'gyur gyi /
T02D2626:175a-13: phan tshun du sna grangs ma 'dzom pa dang /
T02D2626:175a-14: thun che chung gyur pa las ni nad pa de'i 'chi ba dang 'brel par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2626:175a-15: nad slar thu ba la sogs par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T02D2626:175a-16: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bde bar gshegs
T02D2626:175a-17: pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du gsang sngags kyi
T02D2626:175a-18: sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa las thams cad bya
T02D2626:175a-19: ba nyid do // de yan chad kyis ni dkyil
T02D2626:175a-20: 'khor chen po rnams kyi yan lag phrin las bzhi'i
T02D2626:175a-22: da ni tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid tshim par gyur te /
T02D2626:175a-23: dga' ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
T02D2626:175a-24: rje'i spyan sngar dam pa'i chos dang de'i spyod pa'i
T02D2626:175a-25: gang zag rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya
T02D2626:175a-27: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yid mgu nas /
T02D2626:175a-28: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2626:175a-29: bcom ldan 'das ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang /
T02D2626:175a-30: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02D2626:175a-31: bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di 'dri ba dang /
T02D2626:175a-34: gzhan la rgya chen po ston pa dang /
T02D2626:175a-36: rig pa chen po zlos pa dang nyan pa dang /
T02D2626:175b-0: bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams kyis rigs @175b kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni /
T02D2626:175b-1: bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2626:175b-2: lha dang bcas pa'i 'khor rnams kyi bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi /
T02D2626:175b-3: gang rgyal po'am rgyal po'i bu'am /
T02D2626:175b-4: rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa ji ltar gsungs
T02D2626:175b-5: pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar
T02D2626:175b-6: bgyi / yul phyogs dang rang gi skye bo dang yongs kyi skye bo dang /
T02D2626:175b-7: bran la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:175b-8: nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi /
T02D2626:175b-12: bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi'o //
T02D2626:175b-15: zhi ba rnams su bgyid na /
T02D2626:175b-16: ji ltar bshad pa'i bsgrub pa la mngon par zhugs
T02D2626:175b-17: pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal gang gis brtag
T02D2626:175b-18: pa'i rgyal po 'di dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
T02D2626:175b-20: grong dang grong khyer du btsugs la /
T02D2626:175b-21: bdag nyid kyis bsu ba dang /
T02D2626:175b-22: glang po che'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D2626:175b-23: grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor na /
T02D2626:175b-24: nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la /
T02D2626:175b-25: sems can chen po de'i drung du bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam bu'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o//
T02D2626:175b-26: gang du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rab tu spyod
T02D2626:175b-27: pa de ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
T02D2626:175b-28: nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'am rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2626:175b-29: skur bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba dang /
T02D2626:175b-30: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun du bzang
T02D2626:175b-31: po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de
T02D2626:175b-32: nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal
T02D2626:175b-33: bar bgyi'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:175b-34: sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:175b-35: mchod par bgyi ste phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:175b-37: bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi
T02D2626:175b-38: brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di kun la rgyas par 'chad
T02D2626:175b-39: pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i
T02D2626:175b-40: g-yog bgyi / bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o //
T02D2626:175b-41: bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o//
T02D2626:176a-0: @176a * // bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-1: phan pa dang bde ba thams cad bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-2: dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi ste /
T02D2626:176a-3: bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul bdag gi spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-4: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-5: bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-6: bdag cag de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D2626:176a-8: dbang bskur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad
T02D2626:176a-9: kyang bdag cag gi dpon po lags par 'tshal bar
T02D2626:176a-10: bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje legs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' legs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-12: bde ba chen po kun du bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
T02D2626:176a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes pa la sogs pa rtsol ba ni /
T02D2626:176a-14: dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur ba dang /
T02D2626:176a-15: rim gror yongs su mchod par dam bcas pa yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2626:176a-16: de dag ni dgongs pa ma yin zhing nges pa
T02D2626:176a-17: nyid du ji skad rtsol ba bzhin du byed pa
T02D2626:176a-18: kho na'o // de la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'am /
T02D2626:176a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs par bgyi ste /
T02D2626:176a-20: bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rdo rje sems
T02D2626:176a-21: dpa'i re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de
T02D2626:176a-22: nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su 'tshal bar bgyi'o
T02D2626:176a-23: // zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i bdag nyid rgyu las
T02D2626:176a-24: yongs su tshang bar 'dod pas rim gror byed pa
T02D2626:176a-25: // ste / de la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2626:176a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'gro don rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste /
T02D2626:176a-28: kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi sku ste /
T02D2626:176a-29: de ltar brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di sku gsum yongs
T02D2626:176a-30: su 'grub par byed pa'i phyir tshangs pa la sogs
T02D2626:176a-31: pa rnams kyi sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du bltas
T02D2626:176a-32: nas rim gror bgyi'o zhes gsol bar shes par bya'o
T02D2626:176a-33: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhes pa dang /
T02D2626:176b-0: @176b mchod rten du 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes pa brtag
T02D2626:176b-1: pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid la dus gsum gyi de
T02D2626:176b-2: bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bzhugs
T02D2626:176b-3: pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bzhugs
T02D2626:176b-4: par 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes pa dang /
T02D2626:176b-5: mchod rten ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten yin la /
T02D2626:176b-6: brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2626:176b-7: gdung nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di gang na bzhugs pa
T02D2626:176b-8: de nyid gdung dang ldan pas mchod rten du 'tshal
T02D2626:176b-10: de ltar gong du bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2626:176b-11: na rdo rje lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes pa

T02D2626:176b-13: bya ste / lhag ma ni de bzhin du byed

T02D2626:176b-15: bya ste / // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2626:176b-16: na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams
T02D2626:176b-17: la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D2626:176b-18: tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams chos la rim gro bya ba dang /
T02D2626:176b-19: de ltar dam bcas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni legs so legs so //
T02D2626:176b-20: legs kyis ji skad du smras pa bzhin du brtag
T02D2626:176b-21: pa'i rgyal po 'di la mngon par sbyor ba'i sems
T02D2626:176b-22: can chen po de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa
T02D2626:176b-23: la sogs pa gyis shig dang /
T02D2626:176b-24: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen
T02D2626:176b-25: bkur byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs pa
T02D2626:176b-26: ni 'di ltar tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs
T02D2626:176b-27: pa'i 'khor thams cad la brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di
T02D2626:176b-28: la mngon par sbyor ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams la
T02D2626:176b-29: rim gror byed pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis nan
T02D2626:176b-31: de la legs pa'i tshig gsum po ni rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D2626:176b-32: ji skad du smras pa bzhin du'o zhes pa nas //
T02D2626:176b-33: bskyab pa la sogs pa gyis shig dang zhes pa'i bar ni cher gdams pa'o //
T02D2626:176b-34: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni /
T02D2626:176b-35: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i rim gro dang bsnyen bkur
T02D2626:176b-36: byed pa la spro ba yang dag par bskyed pa
