T02D2626:177a-1: mngon par sbyor ba'i sems can des ni /
T02D2626:177a-2: sems can rnams rnam par grol ba'i lam la gnas par byed cing /
T02D2626:177a-3: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:177a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang thugs kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de /
T02D2626:177a-5: de dag mngon par dgyes pa nyid las de bzhin
T02D2626:177a-6: gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ba ni
T02D2626:177a-7: nges pa nyid du shes par bya ste /
T02D2626:177a-8: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen
T02D2626:177a-9: bkur byas par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes gsungs pa
T02D2626:177a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang rig pa dang /
T02D2626:177a-12: snying po thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi snying po 'di bshad do //
T02D2626:177a-14: badzra p'a ni hri da tishtha aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2626:177a-16: aom hri da badzra h'um tram h'um /
T02D2626:177a-19: zhes pa la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2626:177a-20: na rdo rje nyid kyi snying po rnam pa gsum
T02D2626:177a-21: ste / de la sngags dang rig pa dang /
T02D2626:177a-22: snying po thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni 'di ltar gong du gsungs pa dang /
T02D2626:177a-23: 'og nas gsungs par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2626:177a-24: du ni phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor ma gsungs
T02D2626:177a-25: la / de thams cad la ni phyag rgya chen
T02D2626:177a-26: po'i rnal 'byor ni gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang
T02D2626:177a-27: la / / gzungs sngags thams cad skyed par byed
T02D2626:177a-28: pa'i ma dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir brtan par
T02D2626:177a-30: sngags ni rtsa ba dang nye ba'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2626:177a-31: rig pa ni lha'i tshogs rnams so //
T02D2626:177a-32: snying po ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes te /
T02D2626:177a-33: de dag yongs su bskyed cing don thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir bstan par bya zhes sbyor ro //
T02D2626:177a-34: ji ltar na bstan pa yin zhe na nges pa
T02D2626:177a-35: nyid kyis bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir bstan pa zhes
T02D2626:177a-36: bya'o ; ji ltar na bya ba sgrub ce na /
T02D2626:177a-37: phyag rgya chen po'i stobs kyis 'gro ba'i don byed
T02D2626:177a-38: nus pa las de dang bral ba las ni ma
T02D2626:177a-39: yin te / de yang sangs rgyas thams cad pa'i rgyud chen po las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D2626:177a-40: phyag rgya chen po rnams bral bas //
T02D2626:177b-0: gsang sngags bsgrub @177b par 'dod pa dang //
T02D2626:177b-2: rten med mkha' yi bar snang la //
T02D2626:177b-4: des ni nam du'ang ye shes ni //
T02D2626:177b-5: rnyed par mi 'gyur ram sdug bsngal //
T02D2626:177b-7: sngags kyi don ni 'di ltar sku rnams bskyed pa'i sa bon te /
T02D2626:177b-8: de la dang po yig 'bru gcig ni bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med kyi sa bon no //
T02D2626:177b-9: gnyis pa ni go cha bsrung bar bya ba'o //
T02D2626:177b-10: sngags gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
T02D2626:177b-11: rje'i snying pos dkyil 'khor rnams byin gyis brlabs pa'o
T02D2626:177b-12: // de'i mtha'i yig 'bru ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'i snying po'o //
T02D2626:177b-13: gsum pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i'o //
T02D2626:177b-14: bzhi pa ni khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i'o //
T02D2626:177b-15: lnga pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02D2626:177b-16: drug pa ni 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02D2626:177b-17: bdun pa rnams ni don yod grub pa'i snying po rnams te /
T02D2626:177b-18: sku bskyed pa'i sa bon yang de dag nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:177b-19: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de /
T02D2626:177b-20: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la //
T02D2626:177b-21: dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya //
T02D2626:177b-22: yang na rdo rje sems dpa'am //
T02D2626:177b-23: kun du bzang po bde chen bris //
T02D2626:177b-24: spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje la //
T02D2626:177b-25: g-yas phyogs su ni rin chen bsnams //
T02D2626:177b-26: nub phyogs 'od dpag med pa ste //
T02D2626:177b-27: byang phyogs su ni rgya gram bsnams //
T02D2626:177b-28: phyi rol du ni kun bskor bas //
T02D2626:177b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'i gzugs //
T02D2626:177b-30: sku bzhi po ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:177b-31: de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2626:177b-32: go rims bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02D2626:177b-33: sgo sgor sgo ba de bzhin te //
T02D2626:177b-34: de yi phyi rol byams pa sogs //
T02D2626:177b-35: bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' bri /
T02D2626:177b-36: de ltar dge slong kun dga' sogs //
T02D2626:177b-37: thub rnams de yi phyi rol bri //
T02D2626:177b-38: rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i //
T02D2626:177b-39: tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri //
T02D2626:177b-40: de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang //
T02D2626:177b-41: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang ni //
T02D2626:177b-42: drang srong rgyal po rgyas la sogs //
T02D2626:177b-43: rig pa 'dzin pa bri bar bya //
T02D2626:177b-44: de yi phyi rol gza' dang ni //
T02D2626:177b-45: skar ma la sogs lha rnams bri //
T02D2626:177b-46: de yi phyi rol dmyal ba dang //
T02D2626:178a-2: de bzhin lha dang lha min sogs //
T02D2626:178a-3: 'gro ba drug po bris nas ni //
T02D2626:178a-4: dri rnams lnga yi chus bkang pa'i //
T02D2626:178a-5: gser gyi bum pa 'od can dang //
T02D2626:178a-6: gtor ma dang ni zhal zas dang //
T02D2626:178a-7: me tog bdug pa rab mdzes dang //
T02D2626:178a-8: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams dang //
T02D2626:178a-9: bla re dang ni rnga yab mchog / dril bu rdo rje nor bu dang //
T02D2626:178a-10: do shal nyi zla la sogs brgyan //
T02D2626:178a-11: 'jig rten pa yi mchog gyur pa //
T02D2626:178a-12: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas //
T02D2626:178a-13: dkyil 'khor mchog ni brgyan par bya //
T02D2626:178a-14: zhes gsungs pa ni dkyil 'khor dang mchod pa'i yo byad bsags par gsungs te /
T02D2626:178a-15: de la dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la //
T02D2626:178a-16: zhes pa ni gong du thog mar gsungs pa'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la bsnyags pa ste /
T02D2626:178a-17: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor
T02D2626:178a-18: lo rim pa gsum pa la rtsibs nyis 'gyur du
T02D2626:178a-19: byas pa dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo cha drug pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:178a-20: dbus su rdo rje bri ba'am //
T02D2626:178a-21: yang na rdo rje sems dpa'am //
T02D2626:178a-22: kun du bzang po bde chen bri //
T02D2626:178a-23: zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2626:178a-24: na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'khor los sgyur
T02D2626:178a-25: ba'i gtso bo chos kyi sku'i rtags su bri bar
T02D2626:178a-26: bya ba ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na snyam pa la /
T02D2626:178a-27: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid longs spyod
T02D2626:178a-28: rdzogs pa'i sku'i cha lugs su zhugs pa'i phyir mchog
T02D2626:178a-29: tu gyur pa chos kyi sku yin pa na 'khor
T02D2626:178a-30: los sgyur ba'i de dag kho na nges pa nyid
T02D2626:178a-31: do // de dag 'di skad du ci kun du bzang po dang /
T02D2626:178a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i cha lugs su bzhugs pa la /
T02D2626:178a-33: phyag na rdo rje dang gnyis 'dra ba'i snang ba'i
T02D2626:178a-34: phyir khyad par med do zhe na ma yin te
T02D2626:178a-35: / 'dir gzugs kyi sku ru bzhugs par 'dra'ang /
T02D2626:178a-36: phyag rgya'i dbye bas chos kyi sku mtshon pa yin
T02D2626:178a-37: pa'i phyir na rdo rje'am rdo rje sems dpa' 'am
T02D2626:178a-38: bde ba chen po kun du bzang po zhes gsungs
T02D2626:178a-39: so // de la phyag rgya ji lta bus mtshon snyam pa la /
T02D2626:178b-0: phyag rgya ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par @178b rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing /
T02D2626:178b-1: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:178b-2: de'i dbus su phyogs cha dang bral ba'i rdo rje kha dog dkar pos mtshon pa dang /
T02D2626:178b-3: yang chos kyi sku de thabs dang shes rab gnyis
T02D2626:178b-4: su med pa las sku rnam pa gnyis kyi rten
T02D2626:178b-6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje dang dril bur
T02D2626:178b-7: ldan pa zhi ba chen po'i skus mtshon pa dang
T02D2626:178b-8: / yang chos kyi sku de chos kyi dbyings la
T02D2626:178b-9: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis reg par byas
T02D2626:178b-10: / shing / bde ba chen po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:178b-11: bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po thabs dang shes
T02D2626:178b-12: rab kyi phyag rgya bde ba chen po gnyis su
T02D2626:178b-13: med par mdzad pas mtshon pa'o //
T02D2626:178b-14: gzhan du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa'i
T02D2626:178b-15: phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gzugs kyi gtso bor bzhugs
T02D2626:178b-16: pa la ni 'gal ba med pa nyid do //
T02D2626:178b-17: de la dkyil 'khor ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'i phyir ma bshad de //
T02D2626:178b-18: 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2626:178b-21: don yod grub pa bzhi ste /
T02D2626:178b-22: phyag rgya ni ting nge 'dzin du bzhag nas /
T02D2626:178b-23: g-yas pa rnams na rdo rje dang /
T02D2626:178b-26: sna tshogs rdo rje rnams kyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D2626:178b-27: gdan ni 'dir yang seng ge la sogs pa nyid do //
T02D2626:178b-28: grva rnams su ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2626:178b-29: lhag ma ni gong du gsungs pa ji lta ba
T02D2626:178b-30: bzhin du yin zhing yang yang smra ba'i nyes par
T02D2626:178b-32: dri rnams lnga yis bkang ba yi //
T02D2626:178b-34: dkyil 'khor mchog ni brgyan par bya //
T02D2626:178b-35: zhes pa'i bar du ni mchod pa'i tshogs yang dag par brgyan pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:178b-36: de la dkyil 'khor chen po'i mtha' stegs bu la
T02D2626:178b-37: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du me tog dang
T02D2626:178b-45: btung ba'i bye brag sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2626:178b-46: gzhan yang gser ram dngul las rin po che'i bum pa dang /
T02D2626:179a-0: @179a * // gtor ma'i tshogs sna tshogs pa'ang gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2626:179a-1: de bzhin du me long dang /
T02D2626:179a-9: rol mo'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa brdung bar bya ba dang /
T02D2626:179a-18: dngul gyi zla ba dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi
T02D2626:179a-19: do shal gyis yol ba'i nang du bre ba dang
T02D2626:179a-20: / na bza'i rnam pa dar la sogs pa 'phyang ba dang /
T02D2626:179a-21: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor
T02D2626:179a-22: dang mchod pa'i rdzas thams cad yongs su brgyan par
T02D2626:179a-23: bya'o // 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas //
T02D2626:179a-24: dkyil 'khor mchog ni brgyan par bya //
T02D2626:179a-25: zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i rim pa thams
T02D2626:179a-26: cad la khyab par 'jug pa nyid du shes par
T02D2626:179a-28: de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2626:179a-29: spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D2626:179a-30: bdag nyid kyis ni dbang bskur bya //
T02D2626:179a-31: zhes pa ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i phyir bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa gsungs te /
T02D2626:179a-32: de la gong du gsungs pa'i rim pa rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02D2626:179a-33: gos dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas me tog gi phreng ba thogs te /
T02D2626:179a-34: dkyil 'khor du zhugs la dbang ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2626:179a-35: du mnos nas gnang ba legs par thob pa dang
T02D2626:179a-36: / slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ba nyid do ;
T02D2626:179a-37: / sngom gnas dam tshig ldan pa la //
T02D2626:179a-38: bla mar mos shing dad par bcas //
T02D2626:179a-39: rigs skyes skyon dang bral ba dang //
T02D2626:179a-40: ser sna ma lus spangs gyur cing //
T02D2626:179a-41: yon tan mang por ldan gyur dang //
T02D2626:179a-42: gtong dang tshul khrims mang du thos //
T02D2626:179a-43: byams pa dang ni snying rjer ldan //
T02D2626:179a-44: dga' dang btang snyoms gnas pa dang //
T02D2626:179a-45: stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sems //
T02D2626:179a-46: smon pa med par yid ldan zhing //
T02D2626:179a-47: slob ma dam pa sngags 'di yis //
T02D2626:179a-48: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la //
T02D2626:179a-49: sngags mkhan gyis ni gzud par bya //
T02D2626:179b-0: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ni slob ma'i @179b snod brtag pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:179b-1: de la thos pa chung ba ni dam pa'i chos
T02D2626:179b-2: go bar ma gyur pa las bla ma gus par
T02D2626:179b-4: ser sna dang bcas pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2626:179b-5: so sor thar pa la sogs pa'i sdom pa dang bral ba dang /
T02D2626:179b-6: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig nyams pa la ni gsang
T02D2626:179b-7: sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang
T02D2626:179b-8: / bla ma la ma gus pa dang /
T02D2626:179b-9: dad pa dang mi ldan pa las ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2626:179b-10: yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ni /
T02D2626:179b-11: lus kyi spyod pa kun nas bsdams pa dang /
T02D2626:179b-14: bzo la sogs pa'i rnam pa mang po shes pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2626:179b-15: de dag dang mi ldan pas ni dkyil 'khor dam
T02D2626:179b-16: pa bzhengs par mi nus shing shes par mi 'gyur
T02D2626:179b-17: ba dang gtong ba dang mi ldan pa las ni
T02D2626:179b-18: sems can rnams la phan par mi 'gyur ba dang
T02D2626:179b-19: / tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa las ni theg pa chen po'i snod du mi rung ba dang /
T02D2626:179b-20: de bzhin du tshad med pa rnam pa bzhi dang
T02D2626:179b-21: mi ldan pa las ni gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2626:179b-23: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mi ldan pas ni ;
T02D2626:179b-24: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa las lha'i dngos
T02D2626:179b-25: grub tu mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na sngom gnas dam
T02D2626:179b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis slob ma'i snod brtag par gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:179b-28: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang rnyed pa
T02D2626:179b-29: dang bkur sti la mi lta bar sems can thams
T02D2626:179b-30: cad kyi don du bla na med pa'i sems kyis
T02D2626:179b-32: dbang la sogs pa bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2626:179b-33: gzhan du na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi bya ba kho na'o //
T02D2626:179b-34: de la gong du rigs skyes gsungs pas ni theg
T02D2626:179b-35: pa chen po'i rigs can du go bar bya ste
T02D2626:179b-36: / 'jig rten pa'i rigs la dgongs nas ni sems
T02D2626:179b-37: can thams cad la phan par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D2626:179b-38: / / de ma yin pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:179b-39: slob ma dam pa ni rab tu gyur pa ste /
T02D2626:180a-1: las rin po che lta bu zhes bya ba'i gang zag go //
T02D2626:180a-2: de ltar gong du gsungs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs
T02D2626:180a-3: mang po dang ldan pa'i slob ma ni gong du
T02D2626:180a-4: smos pa'i rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du sdig
T02D2626:180a-6: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2626:180a-7: rdo rje theg pa la khas yang dag par 'ches par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:180a-8: sngom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byed du bcug / me tog gam rin po che thogs te /
T02D2626:180a-9: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i phyir zhugs par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:180a-11: badzra sa ma ya pra be sha h'um /
T02D2626:180a-12: aom badzra p'a ni pra t'i tstsha badzra satva ma h'a su kha h'um /
T02D2626:180a-13: ha ha hos ma ya stvam /
T02D2626:180a-14: me tog gi phreng ba dor nas /
T02D2626:180a-15: gang la bab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo la
T02D2626:180a-16: bcing bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni dkyil 'khor du
T02D2626:180a-18: de la dang por bsnyen pa byas pa'i bum pa
T02D2626:180a-19: nas chu blangs nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2626:180a-20: sngags kyis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2626:180a-21: de nas rdo rje thal mo nas bzung ste /
T02D2626:180a-22: sngags dang pos gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2626:180a-23: de nas sngags gnyis pas me tog la sogs pa'i phreng ba dor te /
T02D2626:180a-24: rigs kyi rjes su mchon pa las de'i phyag rgya
T02D2626:180a-25: dang sngags kyi me tog gi phreng ba mgo la
T02D2626:180a-26: bcing bar bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:180a-27: de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2626:180a-28: aom rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkyil 'khor 'di ma mthong ba'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02D2626:180a-29: gal te khyod kyis su dag la smras par gyur
T02D2626:180a-30: na ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid
T02D2626:180a-31: kyi rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'bar bas khyed
T02D2626:180a-33: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um phat tri ta h'um aa /
T02D2626:180a-34: 'dis dam tshig gi chu blud la gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2626:180a-35: aom badzra tsakshu dri shya ho //
T02D2626:180a-36: a'a dzny'a na pa ta le mo ksh'a ya mi h'um /
T02D2626:180a-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2626:180a-38: sangs rgyas thams cad bstan par bya zhing /
T02D2626:180a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2626:180a-40: zhes gsungs pa ni las kyi rim pa ji lta
T02D2626:180a-41: ba bzhin du gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:180b-0: de la dang por dam tshig gis mna' bsgag pa'i phyir tsandan la sogs pa'i @180b dri chu la /

T02D2626:187a-30: sems ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas //

T02D2626:187b-0: / ston ka'i zla ba ltar @187b gnas pa ste /

T02D2626:187b-31: bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing //

T02D2626:190b-2: kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' yongs su brtags pa'i
T02D2626:190b-4: gzhan du ni 'grub par mi 'gyur pas ni mi bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:190b-5: de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa
T02D2626:190b-6: thams cad yid mgu rangs par gyur nas bcom ldan
T02D2626:190b-7: 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to
T02D2626:190b-8: // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos
T02D2626:190b-9: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir the tshom
T02D2626:190b-10: thams cad rnam par gcod pa /
T02D2626:190b-11: don thams cad rgyas par ston pa'i ngan song thams
T02D2626:190b-12: cad yongs su sbyong ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po dam
T02D2626:190b-13: pa phyi ma 'di bshad pa legs so //
T02D2626:190b-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po legs so legs so //
T02D2626:190b-15: gang gi phyir de dag gi mtshon par gyur pa'i
T02D2626:190b-16: phyag rgya rnams bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba ni
T02D2626:190b-17: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dam pa'i chos
T02D2626:190b-18: kyis yang dag par mgu bar gyur pa'i tshig snyan
T02D2626:190b-19: pa lan bzhir brjod pa ste /
T02D2626:190b-20: de la sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir
T02D2626:190b-21: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams
T02D2626:190b-22: cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal pos sems can rnams
T02D2626:190b-23: ngan song rnam pa gsum gyi 'dam nas yang dag
T02D2626:190b-25: de nyid rgyud rnam pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor las byung zhing /
T02D2626:190b-26: rgyud rnam pa gnyis ba'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i dbang dang /
T02D2626:190b-27: sbyin sreg dang cho ga la sogs pa'i las su
T02D2626:190b-28: bya ba'i rim pa rnams rgyud rnam pa gnyis por
T02D2626:190b-29: gsal bar ma gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2626:190b-30: na rdo rje de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i bshad
T02D2626:190b-31: pa'i rgyud 'di bshad pas sems can rnams la phan
T02D2626:190b-33: the tshom thams cad rnam par gcod pa ni dbang
T02D2626:190b-34: la sogs pa ji lta ba mi shes pa gsal
T02D2626:190b-36: de nyid rgyud gnyis kyi don thams cad rgyas par
T02D2626:190b-37: bstan pa yin pa'i phyir na don thams cad rgyas
T02D2626:190b-38: par ston pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2626:190b-39: brtag pa'i rgyal po don rgyas par ston pa nyid la yon tan gyi sgo nas mtshan btags pa'o //
T02D2626:191a-2: snyan pa'i tshig ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2626:191a-3: gang gi phyir de dag gi mtshon pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2626:191a-4: sems can thams cad kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D2626:191a-5: de dag gi mtshon pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i
T02D2626:191a-6: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya
T02D2626:191a-7: dang / 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mtshon
T02D2626:191a-8: pa ste de nyid phyag rgya yin par bshad do
T02D2626:191a-9: dang / // de dag sngar ma bshad pa'i phyir bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa nyid do //
T02D2626:191a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad do //
T02D2626:191a-11: lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2626:191a-12: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2626:191a-13: de'i steng du h'um dang aa las rigs kyi bdag po rigs ltar bsams nas /
T02D2626:191a-14: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid las aa la sogs
T02D2626:191a-15: pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gis kun nas
T02D2626:191a-16: 'khor zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba bsgoms te
T02D2626:191a-17: ; mthe bong gnyis la aom zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2626:191a-18: mdzub mo gnyis la h'um zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2626:191a-19: gung mo gnyis la tr'am zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2626:191a-20: srin lag gnyis la hri zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2626:191a-21: mthe'u chung gnyis la aa zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2626:191a-22: de ltar yi ge rnams bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par mos pa bskyed de /
T02D2626:191a-23: chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres par gyur pa dang /
T02D2626:191a-24: bdag dang rjes su mthun par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni /
T02D2626:191a-25: 'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D2626:191a-26: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin la /
T02D2626:191a-27: phyag rgya'i le'u zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor phyi ma
T02D2626:191a-28: rnams kyi phyag rgya'i le'u ste de yang dag par
T02D2626:191a-30: de la lag pa gnyis mdun du gzhag pa ni
T02D2626:191a-31: phyag rgya bcings ba'i las kyi dus su bab par
T02D2626:191a-32: gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don
T02D2626:191a-33: du blo bskyed pa las rang gi mdun du dus
T02D2626:191a-34: mo'i khar lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo gan rgyal
T02D2626:191a-35: gyur pa dang / du gzhag ste / de gnyis
T02D2626:191a-36: kyi mthil du aa dkar po 'od dang ldan pa
T02D2626:191a-37: gyur pa dang / du gzhag ste / gnyis bsams
T02D2626:191a-38: la / de gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2626:191a-40: yang de'i steng du h'um dang aa gnyis bsams pa
T02D2626:191b-0: las @191b lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2626:191b-2: g-yon pa ni dril bu rtse lnga par gyur par
T02D2626:191b-3: bsams te der thim pas rdo rje'i lag pa dang
T02D2626:191b-4: / rdo rje dril bu'i lag par byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2626:191b-5: der zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bsams pa ni de
T02D2626:191b-6: dag thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rol
T02D2626:191b-7: pa'i phyag rgya'o // de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2626:191b-8: gnyis kyi steng na'ang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2626:191b-9: du aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu
T02D2626:191b-10: drug gis kun nas 'khor bar 'gyur pa las 'od
T02D2626:191b-11: zer chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2626:191b-12: de nas lag pa'i sor mo bcu rdo rje dang
T02D2626:191b-13: rdo rje dril bu rtse lnga pa re re bsams
T02D2626:191b-14: pa'i rtse mo la yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2626:191b-16: de dag gi steng du rim pa ji lta ba
T02D2626:191b-17: bzhin du mthe bong la bcom ldan 'das rnams par
T02D2626:191b-18: snang mdzad dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D2626:191b-19: ma'i ngo bo aom dkar po 'od dang ldan pa
T02D2626:191b-20: snang mdzad dang / bsams par bya'o // de bzhin
T02D2626:191b-21: du mdzub mo la bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams
T02D2626:191b-22: cad yongs su sbyong ba dang /
T02D2626:191b-23: m'a ma k'i'i ngo bo h'um dkar po bsam par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:191b-24: gung mo la bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog dang /
T02D2626:191b-25: sangs rgyas spyan gyi ngo bor tr'am ser po bsam par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:191b-26: srin lag la bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang
T02D2626:191b-27: gos dkar mo'i ngo bo hri dmar po bsam par
T02D2626:191b-28: bya ba dang / mthe'u chung gnyis la bcom ldan 'das me tog chen po rgyas pa dang /
T02D2626:191b-29: sgrol ma'i ngo bo aa ljang gu bsams te /
T02D2626:191b-30: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa las thabs dang shes
T02D2626:191b-31: rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las 'jig rten
T02D2626:191b-32: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya rnams skye
T02D2626:191b-33: zhing lha de dag ngo bo nyid gcig par mos
T02D2626:191b-34: par bya'o // chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres
T02D2626:191b-35: pa ni 'di ltar snang ba'i chos spyi dang rang
T02D2626:191b-36: gi mtshan nyid thams cad thabs dang shes rab gnyis
T02D2626:191b-37: su med par bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid lha
T02D2626:191b-38: dang lha mo'i ngo bo nyid du thams cad bsams
T02D2626:191b-39: par bya'o // te / de nyid bdag dang rjes
T02D2626:191b-40: su mthun pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang rjes su
T02D2626:191b-41: par bya'o // te / mthun pa'o // de la
T02D2626:191b-42: 'dir chos kyi dbyings bdag med pa la bdag ces
T02D2626:191b-43: ji ltar bya snyam pa la /
T02D2626:192a-1: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen
T02D2626:192a-2: po'i bdag nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir chos kyi
T02D2626:192a-4: de la chos thams cad de'i bdag nyid yin pa dang /
T02D2626:192a-5: de las byung ba'i bdag nyid yin pa dang /
T02D2626:192a-6: de'i bdag nyid du shes par byed pa'i phyir bdag ces bya'o //
T02D2626:192a-7: yang na de nyid rnal 'byor pa nyid dang /
T02D2626:192a-8: rjes su mthun zhing dbyer med pa'i phyir na bdag dang yang mthun par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2626:192a-9: de ni rig pa'i tshogs kyis bla na med pa'i
T02D2626:192a-10: mchod pa dang rjes su mthun pa las de'i bdag
T02D2626:192a-11: nyid la de'i bdag nyid kyis mchod pa byed par
T02D2626:192a-12: 'gyur pa ste / mchod pa dang mchod par byed
T02D2626:192a-13: pa dang mchod par bya ba ni gzhan du med
T02D2626:192a-14: 'gyur pa ste / pa kho na'o // de la
T02D2626:192a-15: 'dir gzugs kyi mchod pa bla na med pa nyid
T02D2626:192a-16: 'gyur pa ste / pa kho na'o // yin zhing / de'i mchod pa'i las byed pa dang /
T02D2626:192a-17: de dag nyid las 'da' bar dka' zhing lha'i tshogs
T02D2626:192a-18: 'byin pa'i phyir na dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes
T02D2626:192a-20: phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje dang dril bur ldan pa'i sku ru bsams pa nyid yin la /
T02D2626:192a-21: las kyi phyag rgyan ni ting nge 'dzin dang sa gnon la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:192a-22: tshes kyi phyag rgya ni lha rnams kyi ljags la badzra dzny'a na la sogs pas bsams pa'o //
T02D2626:192a-23: de dag nyid ji lta bur bya snyam pa la /
T02D2626:192a-24: lag pa gnyis padma lta bur sbyar nas /
T02D2626:192a-25: aom zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang nas a'a:zhes bya ba
T02D2626:192a-26: gnyis bkug la de bzhin du h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2626:192a-27: dang tri zhes bya ba gnyis padma'i 'dab ma 'dra
T02D2626:192a-28: bar byas la / tram zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs
T02D2626:192a-29: te brkyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i
T02D2626:192a-30: phyag rgya las thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig
T02D2626:192a-32: de la 'dir dang por lag pa gnyis padma kha 'bus pa ltar byas la /
T02D2626:192a-33: de nas gung mo gnyis gshibs te lto sbyar la
T02D2626:192a-34: brkyang nas srin lag dang mdzub mo gnyis so sor
T02D2626:192a-35: rtse sprad de / tshigs gnyis bkug la mthe bong brkyang pa byas nas mthe'u chung bkug pa'o //
T02D2626:192a-36: gzhan du ni mthe'u chung brkyang bar gsungs te gang yang mi 'gal ba gnyid do //
T02D2626:192a-37: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2626:192b-0: las @192b thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i dam
T02D2626:192b-1: tshig go zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i dkyil
T02D2626:192b-2: 'khor thams cad kyi skabs su rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
T02D2626:192b-3: phyag rgya zhes gsungs pa de nyid yin te /
T02D2626:192b-4: de nyid dang por 'jug pa'i phyir na rtsa ba zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2626:192b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi las thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2626:192b-6: de nyid rnal 'byor pa dam tshig rnam par bcu
T02D2626:192b-7: dang lnga 'dzin pa'i phyir na las thams cad dang
T02D2626:192b-8: ldan pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba
T02D2626:192b-9: kho na'o // 'di dag phyag rgya'i tshogs yin te //
T02D2626:192b-10: de nas rnon por byas pa dang //
T02D2626:192b-12: de nyid khar gzhag sgra gcan gyi'o //
T02D2626:192b-13: de nyid gsum byas las kyi'o //
T02D2626:192b-15: 'dir lha dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa bzhi'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02D2626:192b-16: de la dang po gung mo lto sbyar la brkyang ste /
T02D2626:192b-17: mdzub mo gnyis so sor brkyang la rtse mo gsum
T02D2626:192b-18: rnon por byas pa ste 'di ni drag po'i phyag
T02D2626:192b-19: rgya'o // gnyis pa ni bram ze'i rig byed kyi
T02D2626:192b-20: tshig smra ba ltar srin lag gi rtsa bar mthe
T02D2626:192b-21: bong bzhag ste lhag ma rnam brkyang bar bya ste
T02D2626:192b-22: de ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:192b-23: gsum pa ni lag pa gnyis phan tshun du bsnol
T02D2626:192b-24: ba las gung mo gnyis rtse sprad la mtshon cha'i
T02D2626:192b-25: 'khor lo 'dra ba byas pa ste de ni khyab
T02D2626:192b-27: bzhi pa ni gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de bsgreng
T02D2626:192b-28: la mdzub mo dgu bor byas shing rdo rje 'dra
T02D2626:192b-30: de ni brgya byin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:192b-31: de dag ni gzhan du grags pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2626:192b-32: po bzhi zhes bya bas na phyag rgya'i tshogs zhes
T02D2626:192b-33: gsungs so // g-yon pa mgo thod thogs 'dra dang //
T02D2626:192b-34: g-yas pa mdung rtse rtse gsum pa //
T02D2626:192b-36: g-yas pa aom zhes bya bar gzhag / g-yon pa 'khor lo dbyug thog gsum //
T02D2626:192b-37: aa dang aom gnyis rtse sprad nas //
T02D2626:192b-38: lhag ma gsum ni rdo rje can //
T02D2626:192b-39: h'um dang aom gnyis gzhur byas la //
T02D2626:192b-40: lhag ma mda' byas mda' can gyi'o //
T02D2626:192b-41: zhes gsungs pa ni 'jigs byed chen po dgu'i phyag rgya gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:193a-0: de la lag pa g-yon pa thod pa khrag gis bkang ba thogs pa @193a * //
T02D2626:193a-1: dang 'dra bar sor mo rnams dgu bor byas la snying gar bzung ste /
T02D2626:193a-2: g-yas pa mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse sprad
T02D2626:193a-3: de lhag ma gsum mtshon rtse gsum pa ltar byas
T02D2626:193a-4: te 'di ni 'jigs byed chen po dang /
T02D2626:193a-5: 'jigs byed thod pa can gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193a-6: gnyis pa ni lag pa g-yon pa padma kha 'bus
T02D2626:193a-7: pa ltar rtse mo bsdus la nu ma'i khar bzung
T02D2626:193a-8: la / g-yas pa tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ltar byas pa ni 'jigs byed gtum po dang /
T02D2626:193a-9: 'jigs byed lag pa brgyad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193a-10: gsum pa ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong dang
T02D2626:193a-11: mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad la mtshon cha'i 'khor lo
T02D2626:193a-13: lhag ma gsum dbyug to lta bur byas pa ni 'jigs byed srog 'phrog dang /
T02D2626:193a-14: 'jigs byed smyo byed kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193a-15: bzhi pa ni rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ltar byas
T02D2626:193a-16: pa yid dbu bor byas te de ni 'jigs byed
T02D2626:193a-18: lnga pa ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang
T02D2626:193a-19: mthe bong gnyis gzhu lta bur byas la g-yas pa'i
T02D2626:193a-20: sor mo rnams mda' lta bur brkyang ste /
T02D2626:193a-21: de ni 'jigs byed lag brkyang gi phyag rgyar shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:193a-22: lag pa g-yas g-yon 'khor lo bya //
T02D2626:193a-23: thal mo dam sbyar sor mo 'phro //
T02D2626:193a-24: 'di ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal //
T02D2626:193a-25: gza' lhag rtag tu se gol gtogs //
T02D2626:193a-26: de nyid tshig dbyung gsum pa ste /
T02D2626:193a-27: mchu la tshig dbyung 'dra bar gzhag / pa bsangs ni gnyis mnyam sbyar //
T02D2626:193a-28: sben pa dbyug pa 'dzin par bya //
T02D2626:193a-29: ba lang sna ni chu srin 'dra //
T02D2626:193a-30: shes bya rgyud shes me stag 'dra //
T02D2626:193a-31: de nyid bskor ba glog phreng ste //
T02D2626:193a-32: bla 'og lto sbyar sprin phyag rgya //
T02D2626:193a-33: de dag snying po'i phyag rgya ste //
T02D2626:193a-34: las kyi phyag rgya'ang de dag go //
T02D2626:193a-36: gza' brgyad kyi phyag rgya yongs su gsung spa ste /
T02D2626:193a-37: de la lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sor mo
T02D2626:193a-38: rnams phan tshun lto sbyar nas 'khor lo 'dra bar
T02D2626:193a-39: byas pa ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193a-40: thal mo dam por sbyar nas sor mo rnams 'od
T02D2626:193a-41: zer 'dra bar byas pa ni zla ba'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2626:193a-42: // lag pa g-yon pa'i gung mo dang mthe bong rtse sprad de phyir bstan la /
T02D2626:193b-0: g-yas @193b pa'i gung mo'i tshigs dang mthe bong gnyis
T02D2626:193b-1: kyi bar du mdzub mo bcug la mchu'i thabs kar
T02D2626:193b-2: tshigs dbyung ba ltar byed pa ste de ni gza'
T02D2626:193b-4: lag pa gnyis mnyam par sbyar ba las dpung ba
T02D2626:193b-5: g-yon pa'i khar bzhag pa ni pa ba sangs kyi
T02D2626:193b-6: bkra shis kyi thal mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193b-7: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs la sdigs mdzub
T02D2626:193b-8: snying gar bsgreng ste g-yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba
T02D2626:193b-9: gzhan rnams bu gur byas la steng du phyar ba
T02D2626:193b-10: ni spen pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193b-11: lag pa gnyis par ba bzed pas chu srin gyi
T02D2626:193b-12: sna 'dra bar byas nas phrag pa gnyis kyi steng
T02D2626:193b-13: du phyar ba ni sgra gcan 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2626:193b-14: // lag pa gnyis sor mo phan tshun du bsnol
T02D2626:193b-15: te lag pa'i zur gnyis sbyar nas mthe bong dang
T02D2626:193b-16: sor mo thams cad me stag byas nas thal mo
T02D2626:193b-17: nang phye la g-yas pas g-yon du bskor ba ni
T02D2626:193b-19: lag pa gnyis lto sbyar nas mthe bong dang mthe'u
T02D2626:193b-20: chung gnyis phan tshun du rtse sprad de spyi gtsug
T02D2626:193b-21: gi nor bu ltar byas nas gzhan rnams so sor
T02D2626:193b-22: brkyang ba ni phur bu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193b-23: snying po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni dam tshig
T02D2626:193b-24: gi phyag rgya ste de nyid 'jig rten pa'i lha
T02D2626:193b-25: rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba
T02D2626:193b-26: kho na'o // de nyid las srin lag dang mdzub
T02D2626:193b-27: mo gnyis bcings pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag
T02D2626:193b-28: kho na'o // rgya'o // de nyid las h'um zhes
T02D2626:193b-29: bya ba'i tshigs par ma bcag pa ni dbang bskur
T02D2626:193b-30: ba sbyin par byed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2626:193b-31: de nyid nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02D2626:193b-32: de nyid las h'um zhes bya ba bsdams pa la'ang
T02D2626:193b-33: srin lag padma 'dra par byas pa 'di ni padma
T02D2626:193b-35: / dhri zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje bdams pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193b-36: de nyid las padma 'dra bar byas pa ni bde ba chen po'i phyag rya'o //
T02D2626:193b-37: de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:193b-38: de nyid las de gnyis nang du bkug pa ni
T02D2626:193b-39: khro bo sna tshogs gzi brjid chen po'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2626:193b-40: zhes gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
T02D2626:193b-41: rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:194a-0: de la dang po sor mo rnams rdo rje bsdams pa las @194a * //
T02D2626:194a-1: gung mo gnyis gshibs nas bsgreng ste rdo rje ltar byas pa ste /
T02D2626:194a-2: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:194a-3: gnyis pa ni gung mo snga ma ltar byas la
T02D2626:194a-4: de'i ngos la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che ltar
T02D2626:194a-5: byas pa ste / de ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil
T02D2626:194a-6: 'khor la phyag rgya 'debs pa'i skabs su shes par
T02D2626:194a-7: bya ste de nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
T02D2626:194a-8: rje'i phyag rgyar shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:194a-9: de nyid tshe dpag med kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2626:194a-10: gyi skabs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgyar
T02D2626:194a-11: shes par bya'o // gsum pa ni gung mo snga
T02D2626:194a-12: ma ltar byas pa srin lag gnyis rtse sprad de
T02D2626:194a-13: dgu por byas shing padma'i 'dab ma lta bur byas
T02D2626:194a-14: te de ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag
T02D2626:194a-15: shes par bya'o // rgya'o // bzhi pa ni sor
T02D2626:194a-16: mo rnams bsngags pa las srin lag gnyis rdo rje
T02D2626:194a-17: shes par bya'o // rgya'o // ltar bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2626:194a-18: lnga pa ni gung mo snga ma lta bu las
T02D2626:194a-19: srin lag padma ltar rtse sprad de bkug pa de
T02D2626:194a-20: dag ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil
T02D2626:194a-21: 'khor gyi skabs su shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:194a-22: drug pa ni sor mo rnams phan tshun du bsnol
T02D2626:194a-23: nas brkyang ste 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ste
T02D2626:194a-24: / de ni bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o ;
T02D2626:194a-25: / bdun pa ni de nyid nang du bkug nas
T02D2626:194a-26: mthe bong gnyis mche ba lta bur bsgreng ba ste
T02D2626:194a-27: de ni khro bo khams gsum rnams par rgyal ba'i
T02D2626:194a-28: phyag rgya'o // de nyid las shin tu bsngags pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'o //
T02D2626:194a-30: h'um zhes bya ba'i so ni gnod sbyin gyi'o ;
T02D2626:194a-31: / h'um zhes bya ba gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas pa ni rgyal po'i'o //
T02D2626:194a-32: de nyid mda' ltar byas pa ni 'dod pa'o //
T02D2626:194a-33: aom zhes bya ba gnyis sbyor ba ni legs pa'i'o //
T02D2626:194a-34: de nyid dkyil 'khor du byas pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o //
T02D2626:194a-35: de nyid nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o ;
T02D2626:194a-36: / de nyid rgya gram du byas pa ni las kyi'o //
T02D2626:194a-37: de nyid rin po che ltar bskor ba ni rin chen gyi'o //
T02D2626:194a-38: gung mo sbyar la sor mo bzhi brkyang ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i'o //
T02D2626:194a-39: de nyid khar gzhag pa ni dgyes pa'i'o //
T02D2626:194a-40: thal mo padma ltar bkug pa ni padma'i'o //
T02D2626:194b-0: aa @194b zhes bya ba dang aom zhes bya ba
T02D2626:194b-1: gnyis nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2626:194b-2: // gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:194b-3: snga ma las aom zhes bya ba ni gnyis khar gzhag pa ni tshig dbyung ba ste /
T02D2626:194b-4: mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni las thams cad
T02D2626:194b-5: sbyin par byed pa'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir ye
T02D2626:194b-6: shes kyi sems dpa' bcu drug gi las kyi phyag
T02D2626:194b-7: rgya rnams te / de la dang po ni khro
T02D2626:194b-8: bo'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis phan tshun du
T02D2626:194b-9: bsnol nas khu tshur du bsdams pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-10: gnyis pa ni go cha'i tshul du sor mo rnams brkyang ba'o //
T02D2626:194b-11: gsum pa ni mdzub mo gnyis mche ba ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-12: bzhi pa ni mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas ba'o //
T02D2626:194b-13: lnga pa ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis gzhu ltar byas la /
T02D2626:194b-14: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo de'i steng du mda' gtong ba ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-15: drug pa ni mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo dang mdzum mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D2626:194b-16: bdun pa ni gung mo gnyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-17: brgyad pa ni mdzub mo gnyis spyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-18: dgu pa ni mthe'u chung gnyis rgya gram du byas pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-19: bcu pa ni gung mo gnyis rin po che'i rtse mo ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-20: bcu gcig pa ni mthe bong gnyis dang sor mo
T02D2626:194b-21: rnams phan tshun du bsnol ba las so sor brkyang
T02D2626:194b-23: bcu gnyis pa ni srin lag gnyis rtse sprad de padma'i 'dab ma ltar bkug pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-24: bcu gsum pa ni mthe bong dang dang mthe'u chung
T02D2626:194b-25: gnyis nang du bkug nas sor mo gsum lto sbyar
T02D2626:194b-26: te brkyang ba'o // bcu bzhi pa ni lag pa
T02D2626:194b-27: gnyis rgyab sbyar nas sor mo rnams rtse sprad pa'o
T02D2626:194b-28: te brkyang ba'o // // bcom lnga pa ni mthe bong gnyis gshibs nas bsgrengs nas khar gzhag pa'o //
T02D2626:194b-29: bcu drug pa ni gung mo gnyis gshibs nas mthe bong gnyis so sor brkyang ba'o //
T02D2626:194b-30: de dag ni zhi ba la sogs pa las kyi
T02D2626:194b-31: bye brag las 'da' bar dka' ba'i phyir dang lha
T02D2626:194b-32: rnams kyi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir dam tshig gi
T02D2626:194b-33: phyag rgya zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:194b-34: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
T02D2626:195a-0: @195a * // de nyid bsdus mdung sprul mgor gyur //
T02D2626:195a-1: dbang po sor gsum rdo rje ste //
T02D2626:195a-2: gshin rje gung mo dbyug pa 'dra //
T02D2626:195a-3: mthe'u chung bkug la mdzub zhags pa //
T02D2626:195a-4: chu lha'i phyag rgya yin par 'dod //
T02D2626:195a-5: dbyug to ldan pa gnod sbyin te //
T02D2626:195a-6: rtse gsum bde byed yin par 'dod //
T02D2626:195a-7: bhridgi ri ti lag brkyang ste //
T02D2626:195a-8: srin po yin ni khrag 'phrog pa //
T02D2626:195a-9: lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste //
T02D2626:195a-10: bum pa gzhag pa nor gyi'o //
T02D2626:195a-12: pi wang g-yon thogs dri za'i'o //
T02D2626:195a-13: de ltar mthe'u chung ral gri 'dra ;
T02D2626:195a-14: / gung mo zhags par rnam par ldan //
T02D2626:195a-15: mthe bong ne'u le'i rna 'dra byas //
T02D2626:195a-16: mgo bo thod pa nag po ste //
T02D2626:195a-18: rno la khro ba dbang dang ldan //
T02D2626:195a-19: rlung gi phyag rgya mtshan ldan yin //
T02D2626:195a-20: de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams /
T02D2626:195a-21: lag pas dgyes pas kun du spyod //
T02D2626:195a-22: ces gsungs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi phyag rgya gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:195a-23: dang po ni lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gnyis mdud la /
T02D2626:195a-24: mdzub mo gnyis rtse spangs pa gcig tu byas te
T02D2626:195a-25: lhag ma rnams so sor sprul mgo bzhin du byas
T02D2626:195a-26: pa ste / de ni klu chen po brgyad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2626:195a-27: gnyis pa ni phyogs skyong bcu'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2626:195a-28: de la dang po ni mthe bong gis mthe'u chung
T02D2626:195a-29: mnan la lhag ma gsum rdo rje ltar byas pa'o
T02D2626:195a-30: // gnyis pa ni gung mo gnyis thod dbyug ltar byas pa'o//
T02D2626:195a-31: gsum pa ni mthe bong dang gung mo zhags mig ltar byas la mdzub mo brkyang ba'o //
T02D2626:195a-32: bzhi pa ni mdzub mo dbyug to ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:195a-33: lnga pa ni gung mo gnyis bsgreng ste mdzub mo gnyis so sor brkyang pa'o //
T02D2626:195a-34: drug pa ni sor mo rnams dgu par 'phyar ba'o //
T02D2626:195a-35: bdun pa ni sor mo rnams dgu por byas pas 'phyar ba'o //
T02D2626:195a-36: brgyad pa ni lag pa'i thal mo gnyis rtse sbyar nas yang nas yang du bskor ba'o //
T02D2626:195a-37: dgu pa ni lag pa gcig gi steng du gcig
T02D2626:195a-38: gzhag pa bum pa 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas pa'o
T02D2626:195b-0: // bcu pa ni sor mo rnams phan tshun du bsnol ba @195b las 'od zer ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:195b-1: gsum pa ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2626:195b-2: de la dang po ni lag pa g-yon pa rna
T02D2626:195b-3: ba'i rtsar bzung la g-yas pa'i gung mo dang mthe
T02D2626:195b-4: bong sbyar bas dkur gzung ba'o //
T02D2626:195b-5: gnyis pa ni mthe'u chung rtse sprad de ral gri ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:195b-6: gsum pa ni gung mo brkyang ba zhags pa ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:195b-7: bzhi pa ni mthe bong gnyis tshigs par ma bcag pas phral te so sor phyar ba'o //
T02D2626:195b-8: lhag ma bzhi ni gshin rje dang /
T02D2626:195b-11: rlung gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2626:195b-12: de la dang po ni lag pa'i sor mo rnams yongs su bsdus shing bskor ba'o //
T02D2626:195b-13: gnyis pa ni lag pa'i sor mo rnams bsnol zhing brkyang pa las me stag 'dra bar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:195b-14: gsum pa ni gung mo dang srin lag dang mdzub mo rnams rtse gsum pa ltar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:195b-15: bzhi pa ni lag pa gnyis kyi srin lag gi
T02D2626:195b-16: rtse sprad la gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis so
T02D2626:195b-17: sor gshibs pas brkyang ste mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin
T02D2626:195b-18: du rtse sprad nas ba dan 'phyar ba ltar byas
T02D2626:195b-19: pa'o // de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2626:195b-20: lag pa skyes pas kun du spyod //
T02D2626:195b-22: gzhan yang gang dang gang du phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis
T02D2626:195b-23: mngon par sbyong ba de nyid dang rjes su mthun
T02D2626:195b-24: pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa dang dgyes par bya ba
T02D2626:195b-25: nyid do // lha rnams kun gyi thun mong du //
T02D2626:195b-26: padma'i phyag rgya bkra shis te //
T02D2626:195b-27: klu rnams phyag rgya autpala la //
T02D2626:195b-28: de ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams //
T02D2626:195b-29: srin po rnams kyi mgo tshal ba //
T02D2626:195b-30: bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol //
T02D2626:195b-31: gza' rnams kyi ni dbyug pa ste //
T02D2626:195b-32: aargha dbul ba rgyu skar rnams //
T02D2626:195b-33: mgo bo'i thod pa khar gzhag pa'i //
T02D2626:195b-34: phyag rgya 'di ni phra men ma'o //
T02D2626:195b-35: mgo thod lce yi phyag rgya ni //
T02D2626:195b-36: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi rab bshad //
T02D2626:195b-37: ces gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten
T02D2626:195b-38: pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag rgya bsdus nas gsungs pa
T02D2626:195b-39: ste / de la dang po ni lag pa gnyis
T02D2626:195b-40: phan tshun du sor mo rnams rtse sprad pa blas
T02D2626:195b-41: padma dkar po'i tshul du byas pa ste de ni
T02D2626:196a-0: bkra shis kyi rdzas dang lha @196a * //
T02D2626:196a-1: dang lha'i bu mo thams cad kun rtse zhing rol
T02D2626:196a-2: pa na bdud rtsi padma las longs spyod pa'i phyir
T02D2626:196a-3: na lha thams cad kyi thun mong du padma'i phyag
T02D2626:196a-4: rgya bshad pa'o // gnyis pa ni lag pa gnyis
T02D2626:196a-5: kyi gung mo dang srin lag rtse sprad pa sbyar
T02D2626:196a-6: te bsgreng nas mthe'u chung phyir sbyar te /
T02D2626:196a-7: mdzub mo gnyis gong ma'i tshigs dang po sbyar nas
T02D2626:196a-8: bkug pa ste de ni klu rnams thams cad nam
T02D2626:196a-9: mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal
T02D2626:196a-10: la klu'i rgyal po dga' bos autpala'i phreng ba phul
T02D2626:196a-11: nas slar zhus te byin gyis brlabs pa las klu
T02D2626:196a-12: rnams kun du bsrung ba'i phyir klu dang klu'i bu
T02D2626:196a-13: mo rnams dus thams cad du autpala 'dzin pa'i phyir
T02D2626:196a-14: / klu thams cad kyi thun mong du autpala'i phyag rgyar bshad pa'o //
T02D2626:196a-15: gsum pa ni mdzub mo gnyis bsnol te kha'i thad
T02D2626:196a-16: kar mche ba ltar bya ba dang mthe'u chung gnyis
T02D2626:196a-17: 'og tu mche ba ltar byas pa ste /
T02D2626:196a-18: de ni gnod sbyin rnams sems can rnams kyi srog
T02D2626:196a-19: gcod cing sha rnams za ba'i mche ba gdug pa
T02D2626:196a-20: dang ldan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin thams cad kyi thun
T02D2626:196a-21: mong du mche ba'i phyag rgyar bshad do //
T02D2626:196a-22: bzhi pa ni lag pa phan tshun sor mo rnams
T02D2626:196a-23: legs par mdud cing mthe bong gnyis ni mig ltar
T02D2626:196a-24: byas pa ste / de ni srin mo rnams rtag tu mi'i thod pa la longs spyod pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:196a-25: srin po thams cad kyi thun mong du mgo bo'i thod pa dum bu'i phyag rgyar bshad pa'o //
T02D2626:196a-26: lnga pa ni ma mo rnams kyi sta lag pa
T02D2626:196a-27: rnams kyi sor mo bcu phan tshun du bsnol ba
T02D2626:196a-28: ste / de ni ma mo rnams kyi 'khrig pa'i
T02D2626:196a-29: chos la nye bar brten pa'i phyir na bud med
T02D2626:196a-30: thams cad kyi thun mong du sor mo bcu phan
T02D2626:196a-31: tshun du bsnol nas brang du bzung ba'o //
T02D2626:196a-32: drug pa ni lag pa'i sor mo rnams bsdams pa
T02D2626:196a-33: las mdzub mo g-yas pa dbyug pa ltar phyar ba
T02D2626:196a-34: ste / de ni gza' rnams lha ma yin gyi
T02D2626:196a-35: 'jigs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i ched du rin po
T02D2626:196a-36: che'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i phyir gza' rnams kyi thun
T02D2626:196a-37: mong du dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar bshad pa'o //
T02D2626:196a-38: bdun pa ni lag pa gnyis zur sbyar la sor
T02D2626:196b-0: mo rnams rtse @196b sprad de mthe bong gnyis mdzub
T02D2626:196b-1: mo'i ngos la sbyar ba ste /
T02D2626:196b-2: de ni rgyu skar rnams rang rang gi bdag po
T02D2626:196b-3: la zhabs bsil gyi dus kun du bsnyen bkur byed
T02D2626:196b-4: ba'i phyir skar ma'i lha mo thams cad kyi thun
T02D2626:196b-5: mong du aargha dbul ba'i phyag rgyar bshad pa'o //
T02D2626:196b-6: brgyad pa ni sor mo rnams bsnol ba las gung
T02D2626:196b-7: mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis tshigs bkug la mthe bong
T02D2626:196b-8: gis mdzub mo mnan la khar bzhag pa ste /
T02D2626:196b-9: de ni 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma thod pa khrag gis bkang ba 'thung ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:196b-10: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thun mong du mgo
T02D2626:196b-11: bo'i thod pa khar gzhag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad pa'o
T02D2626:196b-12: // dgu pa ni de nyid las srin lag gnyis
T02D2626:196b-13: rtse sprad nas lce 'dra bar byas pa ste de
T02D2626:196b-14: ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma thams cad mgo rlon
T02D2626:196b-15: pa la longs spyod pa'i phyir mgo rlon pa lce
T02D2626:196b-16: dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bshad pa'o //
T02D2626:196b-17: de nas kun gyi thun mong du //
T02D2626:196b-18: phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya //
T02D2626:196b-19: thal mo brkyang ba byas pa'am //
T02D2626:196b-20: yang na thal mo padmor bya //
T02D2626:196b-21: rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings nas kyang //
T02D2626:196b-22: aa:zhes bya ba lu gu rgyud //
T02D2626:196b-23: h'um zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la //
T02D2626:196b-24: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin //
T02D2626:196b-25: rdo rje bcings pas bsdams nas kyang //
T02D2626:196b-26: h'um dang aa:gnyis gshibs nas bsgrod //
T02D2626:196b-27: aom zhes bya bas ngos sbyar ba'i //
T02D2626:196b-28: phyag rgya snang bar byed par dgongs //
T02D2626:196b-29: de la aa:zhes bya bas bcing //
T02D2626:196b-30: aom zhes bya bas nang du gzhug / h'um zhes bya bas sngon bzhin bya //
T02D2626:196b-31: tram yang h'um dang 'dra bar bya //
T02D2626:196b-32: gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgya yin //
T02D2626:196b-33: tram zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni //
T02D2626:196b-34: aa dang aom gnyis lu gu rgyud //
T02D2626:196b-35: lhag ma gshibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2626:196b-36: bdud rtsi 'khyil par shes par bya //
T02D2626:196b-37: tram zhes bya bar gshibs nas ni //
T02D2626:196b-38: h'um zhes bya ba'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2626:196b-39: de ltar aa:zhes bya ba gshibs //
T02D2626:196b-41: de ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste //
T02D2626:196b-42: de dag las rnams kun la gsungs //
T02D2626:196b-43: zhes gsungs pa ni phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang
T02D2626:196b-44: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya gsungs
T02D2626:197a-0: pa ste / de la dang po ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la @197a * //
T02D2626:197a-1: phyag rgya chen po med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
T02D2626:197a-2: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgyas 'jig rten pa'i lha
T02D2626:197a-3: rnams kyi phyag rgya chen por bsgyur ba ni de
T02D2626:197a-4: dag thams cad kyi lus kyi skabs su lag pa
T02D2626:197a-5: gnyis kyi thal mo brkyang ba'am /
T02D2626:197a-7: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lha rnams gus pa
T02D2626:197a-8: dang bcas pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas kyis bsnyen bkur byed
T02D2626:197a-9: pa'i phyir lag pa brkyang ba dang padma 'dra bar
T02D2626:197a-10: byas pa'o // de las mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu
T02D2626:197a-11: rgyud du byas pa las lag pa rgyab sbyar te
T02D2626:197a-12: mthe bong gnyis rtse sprad nas gzhan rnams bkug cing
T02D2626:197a-13: mdzub mo gnyis rgyab sbrad nas bsgreng la snying gar
T02D2626:197a-14: byas pa'o // bzung ba'o // gnyis pa ni rdo
T02D2626:197a-15: rje bsdams pa la mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bong
T02D2626:197a-16: gnyis gshibs la bsgreng ste mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i
T02D2626:197a-18: thal mo kha bye bar byas pa'o //
T02D2626:197a-19: gsum pa ni sor mo rnams bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug ste /
T02D2626:197a-20: mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis gshibs la bsgrengs nas ral gri'i tshul du byas pa'o //
T02D2626:197a-21: bzhi pa ni lag pa gnyis rgyab sbyar la /
T02D2626:197a-22: mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du
T02D2626:197a-23: byas nas gung mo gnyis gshibs la bsgreng ba ste
T02D2626:197a-24: / lhag ma rnams tshigs bar ma bcag la bkug pas snying gar gzung ba'o //
T02D2626:197a-25: lnga pa ni gung mo dang mdzub mo gshibs la bsgreng ba ste /
T02D2626:197a-26: mthe'u chung yang de bzhin du gshibs la bsgrengs nas
T02D2626:197a-27: srin lag dang mthe bo gnyis 'od zer 'dra bar
T02D2626:197a-28: byas la rta'i kha gdangs pa ltar byas pas spyi
T02D2626:197a-29: bor gzung ba'o // de dag ni 'dir gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bzhi zhes par 'dod de /
T02D2626:197a-30: 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams yang dag par 'dul bar byed pa'o //
T02D2626:197a-31: de dag las rnams kun las gsungs //

T02D2626:197a-33: su ni phyag rgya chen po bzhis ston par byed
T02D2626:197a-34: pa'i phyir ro // dkyil 'khor rgyas 'debs par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:197a-35: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su
T02D2626:197a-36: ni phrin las rnam bzhi'i pho nya'i tshogs kyi las
T02D2626:197b-0: @197b de dag las rnams kun las gsungs //
T02D2626:197b-2: sbyan gyi mig dang 'dra par bshad //
T02D2626:197b-3: m'a ma k'i ni rdo rje 'dra //
T02D2626:197b-4: dkar mo padma nyid du bshad //
T02D2626:197b-6: zhes pa ni rigs kyi yum bzhi'i phyag rgya gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:197b-7: de la de dag gi mdzub mo dang gung mo
T02D2626:197b-8: so sor brkyang zhing srin lag mdud pas mig 'dra
T02D2626:197b-10: gung mo rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa dang de
T02D2626:197b-11: nyid padma 'dra bar byas pa dang sor mo rnams
T02D2626:197b-12: bsdus nas brkyang bas autpala 'dra bar byas pa'o //

T02D2626:197b-14: can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir las thams cad
T02D2626:197b-15: 'grub par byed pa'i sngags kyi yig 'bru rnams nyid
T02D2626:197b-16: kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
T02D2626:197b-17: sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa /
T02D2626:197b-18: ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba /
T02D2626:197b-19: dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza /
T02D2626:197b-20: tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva tva /
T02D2626:197b-25: aom buddha lo ts'a ni h'um /
T02D2626:197b-27: aom padma banda da ba si ni hrim /
T02D2626:197b-31: lo ka auta rim ma sv'a h'a /
T02D2626:197b-32: aom t'a re tutt'a re h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um
T02D2626:197b-33: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba gsungs pa ni 'dir bcom
T02D2626:197b-34: ldan 'das kyis las kyi tshogs thams cad khyab par
T02D2626:197b-35: 'jug pa'i yig 'bru rnams gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:197b-36: de sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhes
T02D2626:197b-37: pa ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2626:197b-38: dan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po

T02D2626:197b-40: dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams ni gong du gsungs pa
T02D2626:197b-41: de'i skyed par byed pa'i yig 'bru dang /
T02D2626:197b-42: las so so'i sngags rnams ma gsungs pa'i phyir gsungs la /
T02D2626:197b-43: de nyid gang dag la yang dag par rdzogs par
T02D2626:197b-44: byang chub thob par byed pa'i thabs bla na med

T02D2626:198a-0: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las dang @198a *
T02D2626:198a-1: // dngos grub thams cad ma lus par rdzogs par byed pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2626:198a-2: sngags kyi yig 'bru ni 'brur bkod pa'i tshogs te /
T02D2626:198a-3: de dag nyid kyi thugs ka nas zhal du phyung ba nyid do //
T02D2626:198a-4: de nyid gang yin snyam pa la yig 'bru drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2626:198a-5: de la yig 'bru la sogs pa'i drug cu rtsa
T02D2626:198a-6: bzhi po ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2626:198a-7: chos kyi sku spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
T02D2626:198a-8: ngo bo ste / de nyid me long lta bu'i
T02D2626:198a-9: ye shes la mtshon nas yig 'bru dang po gsungs
T02D2626:198a-10: ngo bo ste / pa dang / mnyam pa nyid
T02D2626:198a-11: kyi ye shes la mtshon nas yig 'bru gsum pa
T02D2626:198a-12: ngo bo ste / pa dang / gsungs pa dang
T02D2626:198a-13: / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la mtshon nas
T02D2626:198a-14: yig 'bru bzhi pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D2626:198a-15: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la mtshon nas yig 'bru gnyis pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D2626:198a-16: de nyid chos kyi tshul gyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2626:198a-17: ji lta bur 'gyur snyam pa la /
T02D2626:198a-18: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D2626:198a-19: rgyu rkyen lam dang 'bras bu yis //
T02D2626:198a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' bzhir 'gyur zhing //
T02D2626:198a-21: rtog dang bral zhing 'od gsal dang //
T02D2626:198a-22: gzhig par mi nus kun 'joms phyir //
T02D2626:198a-23: rdo rje sems zhes brjod pa yin //
T02D2626:198a-25: de la tshigs su bcad pa des ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mtha' dag gsungs so //
T02D2626:198a-26: de la de dag ni ji lta bu zhig snyam pa la /
T02D2626:198a-27: de ni 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ni ngo bo gsungs so //
T02D2626:198a-28: phyed kyis ni nges pa'i tshig gsungs te /
T02D2626:198a-29: de yang 'di ltar rgyu rdo rje sems dpa' ni
T02D2626:198a-30: sems can thams cad la phan pa thog ma nas
T02D2626:198a-31: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi sa bon yod
T02D2626:198a-32: pa nyid de / de la thog ma med pa
T02D2626:198a-33: nas log par rtog pa'i dbang gis log par brtags
T02D2626:198a-34: pa'i dri ma de bzhig dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje
T02D2626:198a-35: zhes bya zhing de nyid sems kyi cha las byung
T02D2626:198a-36: ba'i phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:198a-37: rkyen rdo rje sems dpa' ni gang du byang chub
T02D2626:198a-38: kyi sems bla na med pa bskyed pa de ste
T02D2626:198a-39: / yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid bsgoms pa
T02D2626:198a-40: las log par rtog pa'i bag chags thams cad 'joms
T02D2626:198b-0: pa'i phyir @198b rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2626:198b-1: de nyid byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:198b-2: lam rdo rje sems dpa' ni gang du lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa de ste /
T02D2626:198b-3: de nyid las rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i shes pa skye ba'i phyir na /
T02D2626:198b-4: rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2626:198b-5: de nyid sems kyi khyad par las byung ba'i phyir sems dpa' zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:198b-6: 'bras bu rdo rje sems dpa' ni chos kyi sku ste /
T02D2626:198b-7: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing sems can thams cad
T02D2626:198b-8: kyi don du sku rnam pa gnyis la khyab pa'i
T02D2626:198b-9: phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2626:198b-10: de nyid las sprul pa sna tshogs byung ba'i phyir sems dpa' zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2626:198b-11: de dag gis ni bdud kyi sgyu ma'i tshogs ma
T02D2626:198b-12: lus par 'dul ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' chen
T02D2626:198b-13: po zhes bya ba kho na'o //
T02D2626:198b-14: de nyid las phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i phyir yig 'bru bzhi gsungs la /
T02D2626:198b-15: de dag bcu drug tu gsungs pa ni ye shes
T02D2626:198b-16: kyi sems dpa' bcu drug la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i
T02D2626:198b-17: dkyil 'khor dang ldan par gsungs pa'o //
T02D2626:198b-18: de la h'um la sogs pa'i yig 'bru bcu drug
T02D2626:198b-19: po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying
T02D2626:198b-20: po ste / de nyid kyi mtshan la yig 'bru
T02D2626:198b-21: btags pa'i phyir sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ste
T02D2626:198b-22: po ste / / de dag kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du h'um ni sems dpa'o //
T02D2626:198b-37: sam ni dam tshig gi snying por shes par bya ste /
T02D2626:198b-38: de dag kyang so so la phrin las rnam pa
T02D2626:198b-39: bzhi dang ldan par gsungs pa ni rgyal po dang
T02D2626:198b-42: gnod sbyin rnams kyis ni mngon spyod kyi las mdzad pa nyid de /
T02D2626:198b-46: dam tshig rnams kyis ni dbang gi phrin las mdzad do //
T02D2626:199a-0: @199a * // las rnams kyis ni rgyas pa'i phrin las mdzad do //
T02D2626:199a-4: srung ba rnams kyis ni zhi ba'i las mdzad pa nyid do //
T02D2626:199a-5: de dag gi mtshan dang sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
T02D2626:199a-6: la sogs pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
T02D2626:199a-7: 'od gsal ba las 'gro ba sems can thams cad
T02D2626:199a-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par bya
T02D2626:199a-9: ba'i phyir sprul pa'i sku rnams yongs su spros pa
T02D2626:199a-10: ste / de yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyud le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa las /
T02D2626:199a-11: mi bskyod rdo rje bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2626:199a-12: rang gi 'khor lo rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T02D2626:199a-13: nyi zla kha sbyor 'od ldan pas //
T02D2626:199a-14: phyogs bzhi ru ni rnam par spro //
T02D2626:199a-15: de steng yig 'bru dkar ldan bzhi //
T02D2626:199a-16: de las gyur pa'i mtshan ma bzhis //
T02D2626:199a-17: sems dpa' bzhi ni yongs su rdzogs //
T02D2626:199a-18: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs te /
T02D2626:199a-19: de la dang por bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i
T02D2626:199a-20: phyogs bzhir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi byung bar gyur
T02D2626:199a-21: to // de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhi byung bar gyur to //
T02D2626:199a-22: de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi dkyil
T02D2626:199a-23: 'khor nas h'um la sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi spros
T02D2626:199a-24: pa ste / de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma bzhir gyur to //
T02D2626:199a-25: de'i skad cig la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2626:199a-26: pa'i sems dpa' bzhi yongs su rdzogs par gyur te
T02D2626:199a-27: / de dag rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2626:199a-28: zla ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes
T02D2626:199a-29: / bya'o // nyi ma la ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya'o ;
T02D2626:199a-30: / yig 'bru dang mtshan ma la ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2626:199a-31: de dag gcig tu gyur pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:199a-32: sku yongs su rdzogs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ste /
T02D2626:199a-33: de dag ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid las byung ba'o ;
T02D2626:199a-34: / de dag ni drod gsher las skyes pa'i tshul dang sbyar ba ste /
T02D2626:199a-35: dper na gang du rlan dang drod dang /
T02D2626:199a-36: de'i gnas dang dus tshod dang /
T02D2626:199a-37: de'i rgyu las grub pa'i sems can bzhin no //
T02D2626:199a-38: de dag gi kha dog ni rdo re'i rigs la brten pa'i phyir kha dog dkar por nges so //
T02D2626:199b-0: mtshan @199b ni de'i skad cig de nyid las sems
T02D2626:199b-1: dpa' rnams kyi rang rang gi tshigs su bcad pa
T02D2626:199b-2: dang snying po rnams gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:199b-3: de yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyud las /
T02D2626:199b-4: ae ma ho bdag nyid sems dpa' ste //
T02D2626:199b-5: mi bskyod rdo rjer byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-6: sems can don la mngon sems phyir //
T02D2626:199b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-8: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams gsungs pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D2626:199b-10: ae ma ho bdag ni rgyal po ste //
T02D2626:199b-11: rdo rje rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-12: 'gro kun bdud las rgyal byed phyir//
T02D2626:199b-13: rdo rje rgyal po zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-14: ae ma ho bdag ni chags pa ste //
T02D2626:199b-15: rdo rje 'dod par byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-16: 'gro ba'i chags pa rjes chags phyir //
T02D2626:199b-17: rdo rje chags pa zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-18: ae ma ho bdag ni legs pa ste //
T02D2626:199b-19: mdzes pa'i rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-21: rdo rje legs pa zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-22: ae ma ho bdag nyid rin chen che //
T02D2626:199b-23: rin chen rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-24: 'gro kun re ba bskang ba'i phyir //
T02D2626:199b-25: rdo rje rin chen zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-26: ae ma ho bdag ni nyi ma ste //
T02D2626:199b-27: gzi brjid rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-28: 'gro kun nyon mongs sel ba'i phyir //
T02D2626:199b-29: rdo rje nyi ma zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-30: ae ma ho bdag ni rgyal mtshan te //
T02D2626:199b-31: seng ge rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-32: 'gro kun spyi gtsug ldan byed phyir //
T02D2626:199b-33: rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-34: ae ma ho bdag ni bzhad pa ste//
T02D2626:199b-35: dgyes pa'i rgyal por byin brlabs te //
T02D2626:199b-36: 'gro kun dga' bar byed pa'i phyir //
T02D2626:199b-37: rdo rje bzhad pa zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-38: ae ma ho bdag ni chos mchog ste //
T02D2626:199b-39: dam chos rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-40: 'gro kun dam chos lam bgrod phyir //
T02D2626:199b-41: rdo rje chos zhes bya bar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-42: ae ma ho bdag ni rnon pa ste //
T02D2626:199b-43: mtshon cha'i rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-44: 'gro kun rtog pa'i dra gcod phyir //
T02D2626:199b-45: rdo rje rnon po zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:199b-46: ae ma ho bdag ni 'khor lo ste //
T02D2626:199b-47: gtum po'i rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:199b-48: 'gro kun thar pa'i grong bskyod phyir //
T02D2626:200a-0: @200a * // rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:200a-1: ae ma ho bdag ni tshig yin te //
T02D2626:200a-2: tshig gi rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:200a-3: 'gro kun legs pa'i lam ston phyir //
T02D2626:200a-4: rdo rje gsungs ba zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:200a-5: ae ma ho bdag ni las yin te //
T02D2626:200a-6: kun mdzad rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:200a-7: 'gro ba'i las rnams rdzogs byed phyir //
T02D2626:200a-8: rdo rje las zhes bya bar brjod //
T02D2626:200a-9: ae ma ho bdag ni srung ba ste //
T02D2626:200a-10: mi 'jigs rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:200a-11: 'gro kun bdud las bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D2626:200a-12: rdo rje srung ba zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:200a-13: ae ma ho bdag ni gnod sbyin te //
T02D2626:200a-14: mche ba'i rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:200a-15: 'gro kun sgrib pa gcod byed cing //
T02D2626:200a-16: rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes byar brjod //
T02D2626:200a-17: ae ma ho bdag ni dam tshig ste //
T02D2626:200a-18: mi 'gyur rgyal por byin brlabs shing //
T02D2626:200a-19: 'gro kun sdig pa'i tshogs sngom phyir //
T02D2626:200a-20: rdo rje dam tshig ces byar brjod //
T02D2626:200a-21: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis rang rang gi las su bya ba dang /
T02D2626:200a-22: nges pa'i tshig gis mtshan yongs su btags pa'o //
T02D2626:200a-23: kha dog ni 'dir rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa rigs bzhi'i bye brag dang /
T02D2626:200a-24: phrin las rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200a-25: ye shes rnam pa bzhi'i bye brag la sogs pa'i dbye bas dkar po dang /
T02D2626:200a-29: phyag mtshan yang gong gi rjes su mtshon pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:200a-30: de la sems can rnams gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D2626:200a-31: shes bskyed pa'i phyir dang ngan song gsum nas 'dren
T02D2626:200a-32: pa dang / bdud kyi tshogs 'bigs par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-33: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jog par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-34: ji ltar bsam pa'i re ba skong bar byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-35: ma rig pa'i mun pa'i tshogs bsal bar byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-36: yang dag pa'i bka' dang ldan par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-37: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam nas 'don par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-38: tshul khrims kyi dris 'god par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-39: rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba gcod par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200a-40: chos kyi dbyings su skyod par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i @200b sa la gnas par byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200b-1: dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ster bar byed pa dang /
T02D2626:200b-2: bdud kyi tshogs las skyob pa dang /
T02D2626:200b-3: 'khor ba'i dra ba gcod pa dang /
T02D2626:200b-4: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams sdom par byed
T02D2626:200b-5: pa'i phyir rang rang gi phyag mtshan rdo rje lcags
T02D2626:200b-6: kyu la sogs pa 'dzin pa nyid de //
T02D2626:200b-7: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su ni
T02D2626:200b-8: sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug gi rim pas
T02D2626:200b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug gi
T02D2626:200b-11: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems
T02D2626:200b-12: dpa' la rdo rje zhi ba la sogs pa'i 'khor
T02D2626:200b-13: bzhi dang / rgyal po la kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-14: chags pa la kun nas 'od zer la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-15: legs pa la zhi ba'i blo gros la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-16: rin chen la bzang po dpal la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-17: nyi ma la bzang skyong la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-18: rgyal mtshan la stobs chen la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-19: bzhad pa la 'od bzang la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-20: rdo rje chos la rgyal ba'i tog la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-21: rnon po la rgyal ba'i blo gros la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-22: 'khor lo la dri med rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-23: gsung ba la chos kyi rgyal ba la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-24: las la de nyid snang ba la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-25: srung ba la spyod pa'i blo gros la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-26: gnod sbyin la rdo rje snang ba la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi dang /
T02D2626:200b-27: dam tshig la 'khor lo la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhis bsrung zhing mchod pa dang /
T02D2626:200b-28: sgo skyong bas yang dag par ldan pa ni phyag
T02D2626:200b-29: rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba kho na
T02D2626:200b-30: ste / de'i phyir yig 'bru drug cu rtsa bzhi po gsungs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:200b-31: sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i snying po rnams ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsdus pa yin la /
T02D2626:201a-0: 'og tu gsungs pa'i sngags ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yum bzhi'i dngos grub @201a * //
T02D2626:201a-1: dam pa byang chub kyi dngos grub tu yang dag par gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D2626:201a-2: de dag kyang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyud lha 'byung ba'i le'u las /
T02D2626:201a-3: kun du sgeg cing mdzes pa'i gzugs //
T02D2626:201a-4: dkyil 'khor gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2626:201a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gyur pa //
T02D2626:201a-6: bde bar gshegs kyis mngon spros pas //
T02D2626:201a-7: yongs su rdzogs la rang rang gi //
T02D2626:201a-8: mtshan dang sngags su yang dag gsungs //
T02D2626:201a-10: rim pa'i rnam pa cha byad can //
T02D2626:201a-11: mchod pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02D2626:201a-12: ye shes lnga yi ngo bo las//
T02D2626:201a-13: gzugs dang ldan par tshig brjod pas //
T02D2626:201a-14: sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa brgyad //
T02D2626:201a-15: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su //
T02D2626:201a-16: de ltar gzugs dang rjes mthun pas //
T02D2626:201a-17: rang rang sngags ni gsungs pa yi //
T02D2626:201a-18: lcags kyu la sogs phyag rgya bzhis //
T02D2626:201a-20: de dag kyang dang pos sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul
T02D2626:201a-21: ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi mtha'
T02D2626:201a-22: logs su nyi ma dang zla ba bcu drug byung
T02D2626:201a-24: de dag gi steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
T02D2626:201a-25: kyi dkyil 'khor nas lam la sogs pa'i yig 'bru
T02D2626:201a-26: rnams spros pa las rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2626:201a-28: de'i skad cig la sku yongs su rdzogs pas rang rang gi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2626:201a-29: sngags rnams gsungs shing dgyes pa yang dag par phul ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:201a-30: sangs rgyas spyan zhes pa la sogs pa mtshan du btags pas shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:201a-31: phyag mtshan ni rigs kyi yum yin pa'i phyir rigs
T02D2626:201a-32: bzhi'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa dang gzugs la sogs pa
T02D2626:201a-33: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mngon par mchod pa'i phyir
T02D2626:201a-34: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa dang
T02D2626:201a-35: ; dgug pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig dang ye
T02D2626:201a-36: shes 'dra bar byed pa'i las bzhi byed pa'i phyir
T02D2626:201a-37: ; / lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D2626:201a-38: kha dog ni de'i rigs kyi rjes su mthun pa las byung ba'o //
T02D2626:201b-0: de la rigs kha dog gi rjes su 'brang ba @201b ni rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
T02D2626:201b-1: de ni gzhal yas khang gi 'og gzhi rin po
T02D2626:201b-2: che mu tig la sogs pa las grub pa'i phyir
T02D2626:201b-3: de'i 'od dang ldan pa nyid do //
T02D2626:201b-4: gzhan du kha dog gi nges pa med pa ni yon tan gyi sgo nas shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:201b-5: de la lha las rin po che'i 'od gsal bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
T02D2626:201b-6: de ni 'di ltar lha las ni don dam par
T02D2626:201b-7: na kha dog dag dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa med
T02D2626:201b-8: cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin la /
T02D2626:201b-9: 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa la dgongs nas de'i rnam par 'gyur ba bstan pa ste /
T02D2626:201b-10: dper na ri rab kyis nam mkha'i kha dog bsgyur ba bzhin no //
T02D2626:201b-11: zhi ba'i brdung ba'i sngags nas mngon spyod kyi brdung
T02D2626:201b-12: ba'i sngags kyi bar du ni gang dang gang du
T02D2626:201b-13: las byed pa'i skad cig la rigs dang rjes su
T02D2626:201b-14: mthun pa'i phur bus las su bya'i /
T02D2626:201b-15: spyi bor btab na zhi ba la sogs pa'i lha
T02D2626:201b-16: bsams te rigs dang rdzes su mthun pa'i tho bas
T02D2626:201b-18: lan bcu drug ni sems dpa' bcu drug gi rnal 'byor gyis bya ba'o //
T02D2626:201b-19: de nyid zhi bar byed pa'i phyir sham pa ta zhes brjod pa dang /
T02D2626:201b-20: chos dang longs spyod gong nas gong du 'phel bar
T02D2626:201b-21: byed pa'i phyir ghum zhes bya ba brjod pa dang
T02D2626:201b-22: / khyod bdag gir shog ces dbang du byed pa'i phyir ho tum zhes brjod pa dang /
T02D2626:201b-23: tshe dang srog rnams gcod par byed pa'i phyir kha tam zhes brjod par shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:201b-24: de nas brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis
T02D2626:201b-25: bcom ldan 'das 'phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol
T02D2626:201b-26: to // bcom ldan 'das gang gi phyir gdug pa thams cad gzhig par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:201b-27: ma rungs pa'i tshogs thams cad ma lus par gzhom
T02D2626:201b-28: par bgyi ba'i slad du khro bo chen po rnams
T02D2626:201b-31: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol zhes pa ni
T02D2626:201b-32: 'dir brgya byin la sogs pas dkyil 'khor bshad par
T02D2626:201b-33: zhus pa ste / de la phyag btsal ba ni gus pa dang bcas par zhu pa'o //
T02D2626:201b-34: gang gi phyir zhes pa ni /
T02D2626:202a-2: gdug pa thams cad gzhig par bgyi ba dang /
T02D2626:202a-3: ma rungs pa thams cad gzhom par bgyi ba ni srin po 'am gnod sbyin nam /
T02D2626:202a-5: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems
T02D2626:202a-6: dang ldan pa gdug pa'i las kyis sems can la
T02D2626:202a-7: gnod pa byed pa ste de dag gzhig pa ni
T02D2626:202a-8: gdul bar bya ba ste de'i phyir bshad du gsol
T02D2626:202a-10: lan gsum ni ched du bya ba'i tshig tu shes par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:202a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid
T02D2626:202a-12: kyi sku bor nas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs
T02D2626:202a-13: te gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa zhes
T02D2626:202a-14: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
T02D2626:202a-15: / rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo me'i nyi ma
T02D2626:202a-16: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka
T02D2626:202a-17: nas phyung ngo zhes gsungs pa ni khro bo'i dkyil
T02D2626:202a-18: 'khor gsungs pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
T02D2626:202a-19: de la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i sku
T02D2626:202a-20: bor nas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs pa ni
T02D2626:202a-21: bdag po dang rjes su mthun pa khro bo'i dkyil
T02D2626:202a-23: gcig tu na rdo rje sems dpa' dang phyag na
T02D2626:202a-24: rdo rje ngo bo gcig la sems can rnams kyi
T02D2626:202a-25: bsam pa dang sbyar nas sku bor bar shes par
T02D2626:202a-26: bya'o // gnyis su med par mnyam par gzhag pa
T02D2626:202a-27: ni 'bras bu'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang gnyis su
T02D2626:202a-28: med pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa ste de nyid dang
T02D2626:202a-29: khro bo ngo bo gcig par gsungs pa la thugs
T02D2626:202a-31: / rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2626:202a-32: de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi rtags sku me'i phung po ltar 'dug pa dang /
T02D2626:202a-33: gsung nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bus mun pa sel bar byed pa dang /
T02D2626:202a-34: thugs rdo rje ltar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na rdo rje me'i nyi ma'i zhes bya ba kho na'o //
T02D2626:202a-35: snying po ni sngags te de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs nas zhal du phyung bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2626:202a-36: aom badzra satva kro dh'a na l'arka /
T02D2626:202a-37: badzra kro dha dra ba dra ba /
T02D2626:202a-38: bi dra ba bi dra ba /
T02D2626:202a-39: sarba aa bha ya n'a sha ya /

T02D2626:202b-1: aom tree lo kya n'a sha h'um phat /
