T02D2626:202b-14: aom aom k'a la ya kshi h'um phat ces pa
T02D2626:202b-15: la sogs pa'i sngags ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D2626:202b-17: de la dang po ni me'i rdo rje nyi ma'i
T02D2626:202b-18: sngags yin pas na de ni 'di ltar rdo rje
T02D2626:202b-19: sems dpa' khro bo me'i rdo rje nyi mas sreg
T02D2626:202b-21: rnam par sreg par gyis shig pa dang /
T02D2626:202b-22: sngags lan bzhi gsungs pa dang /
T02D2626:202b-23: 'jigs pa thams cad choms shig phrogs shig rab tu phrogs shig pa'i sngags gsungs pa'o //
T02D2626:202b-24: gnyis ba ni khams gsum snang byed kyi'o //
T02D2626:202b-25: gsum pa ni srid gsum gnod byed kyi'o //
T02D2626:202b-26: bzhi pa ni khams gsum 'jig byed kyi'o //
T02D2626:202b-27: lnga pa ni srid gsum 'ching byed kyi'o //
T02D2626:202b-28: drug pa ni bdud rtsi'i gtsug tor gyi'o //
T02D2626:202b-29: bdun pa ni dus kyi mche ba'i'o //
T02D2626:202b-30: brgyad pa ni dus kyi pho nya'i'o //
T02D2626:202b-31: dgu pa ni rnam pa gsum rig gi'o //
T02D2626:202b-32: bcu pa ni dus kyi lcags kyu'i'o //
T02D2626:202b-33: bcu gcig pa ni dus kyi zhags pa'i'o //
T02D2626:202b-34: bcu gnyis pa ni dus kyi 'ching byed kyi'o //
T02D2626:202b-35: bcu gsum pa ni dus kyi chags pa'i'o //
T02D2626:202b-36: bcu bzhi pa ni dus kyi srin mo'i'o //
T02D2626:202b-37: bco lnga pa ni dus kyi so can gyi'o ;
T02D2626:202b-38: / bcu drug pa ni dus kyi mtshan ma'i'o //
T02D2626:202b-39: bcu bdun pa ni dus kyi gnod sbyin mo yir
T02D2626:202b-40: shes par bya ste bskyed pa'i sa bon yang de
T02D2626:202b-41: dag gi dbus kyi yig 'bru las shes par bya'o
T02D2626:202b-42: // de nas dkyil 'khor mi bzad pa //
T02D2626:202b-43: che ba'i che mchog rtsibs bcu gnyis //
T02D2626:202b-44: lha rdzas 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkris //
T02D2626:202b-46: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang //
T02D2626:202b-47: rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:202b-48: 'jig rten gsum snang la sogs khro bo kun //
T02D2626:202b-49: ma rungs snying gar mnan cing sdigs byed cing //
T02D2626:203a-2: phyag ni brgya phrag du mar ldan //
T02D2626:203a-3: sbrul dang mi mgos dbu brgyan cing //
T02D2626:203a-4: stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing //
T02D2626:203a-5: rgyu ma thogs shing dbu mtha' yas //
T02D2626:203a-6: mgo thod khrag bkang phyag na bsnams //
T02D2626:203a-7: de ltar byin nas phyi rol du //
T02D2626:203a-8: srin mo'i tshogs rnams gzhag bya ste //
T02D2626:203a-9: sgo rnams su ni sgo ba rnams //
T02D2626:203a-10: rang rang phyag rgyas rnam par gnas //
T02D2626:203a-11: zhes gsungs ba ni de dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:203a-12: de la dur khrod dam ma mo'i gnas sam shan
T02D2626:203a-13: pa'i khyim la sogs par stegs bu khru nyi shu
T02D2626:203a-14: rtsa bzhi pa brtsigs te bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga
T02D2626:203a-15: sa byugs la thig legs par btab la bri bar
T02D2626:203a-16: bya ba ni dbus su 'khor lo sngon po me'i
T02D2626:203a-17: 'od dang bcas pa rtsibs bcu gnyis pa gcig bri
T02D2626:203a-18: bar bya'o // de'i grva bzhir ni me ri bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:203a-19: de'i phyi rol du sgo dang rta babs dang /
T02D2626:203a-20: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa la sogs pas
T02D2626:203a-21: brgyan cing kun nas mdzes par byas pa nyid do
T02D2626:203a-22: // de la 'khor lo'i dbus su ni khro bo
T02D2626:203a-23: chen po me'i rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar
T02D2626:203a-24: po zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D2626:203a-25: phyag g-yas pa gsum gyis rdo rje dang ral gri
T02D2626:203a-26: dang 'khor lo 'dzin cing g-yon pa gsum gyis dril
T02D2626:203a-27: bu dang zhags pa dang thod ba bsnams pa /
T02D2626:203a-28: zhal dang po dmar po g-yas dkar ba la g-yon nag po rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D2626:203a-29: lha drag po dkar po snying gar mnan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:203a-30: de'i mdun gyi rtsibs la khro bo khams gsum snang
T02D2626:203a-31: byed sku mdog nag po zhal gsum pa la zhal
T02D2626:203a-33: g-yas dkar ba g-yon dmar ba /
T02D2626:203a-34: phyag drug pa la g-yas pa gsum gyis mdung dang ral gri dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
T02D2626:203a-35: g-yon pa gsum gyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i tho ba dang rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2626:203a-36: ma he'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D2626:203a-37: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:203b-0: de'i rtsibs @203b gnyis pa la khro bo khams gsum
T02D2626:203b-1: gnon byed sku mdog dkar ser la zhal gsum pa
T02D2626:203b-2: dang po dkar ser la g-yas pa nag po g-yon
T02D2626:203b-3: pa dmar po // phyag g-yas pa gsum gyis lcags kyu dang 'khor lo dang ral gri 'dzin pa /
T02D2626:203b-4: g-yon pa gsum gyis thod pa dang rin po che
T02D2626:203b-5: dang padma 'dzin pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dbu
T02D2626:203b-6: rgyan can seng ge'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2626:203b-8: de'i 'khor lo gsum pa la ni khro bo khams
T02D2626:203b-9: gsum 'jig byed kha dog dmar po la zhal gsum
T02D2626:203b-11: g-yas nag po la g-yon dkar po //
T02D2626:203b-12: phyag drug pa g-yas pa gsum gyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang dgra sta 'dzin pa /
T02D2626:203b-13: g-yon pa gsum gyis rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya dang padma dang tho ba 'dzin pa /
T02D2626:203b-14: 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can stag gi steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa bri'o ;
T02D2626:203b-15: / de'i 'khor lo rtsibs gsum pa la ni khro
T02D2626:203b-16: bo srid gsum 'ching byed kha dog sngon po la
T02D2626:203b-17: zhal gsum pa'i dang po sngon po //
T02D2626:203b-18: g-yas pa dkar ba la g-yon pa dmar po phyag

T02D2626:207a-30: ha yis 'khor lo go cha bya//
T02D2626:207a-31: 'od zer chu yi dbang bskur na //
T02D2626:207a-32: de ni nges par bde bar 'gyur //
T02D2626:207a-33: zhes gsungs pa ni zhi bar bya ba'i las gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:207a-34: de la dang por bdag nyid khro bo khams gsum
T02D2626:207a-35: snang byed kha dog dkar po la bzhin rgyas pa'i
T02D2626:207a-37: de'i snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D2626:207a-38: h'um las 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba spros la
T02D2626:207a-39: de'i rtse mo la h'um bltas te /
T02D2626:207a-40: des gang la bya ba'i phyir lus la khyab bar dgab par bya'o //
T02D2626:207a-41: de nas 'od zer des nad dang gdon la sogs
T02D2626:207b-0: pa blangs nas dpag tshad la @207b sogs pa'i sar
T02D2626:207b-2: de'i ming nas smos la sngags kyi snying po zhi
T02D2626:207b-3: ba'i tshig dang ldan pa 'bum la sogs par byas
T02D2626:207b-4: pa na de'i lus la gnod pa dang bral zhing
T02D2626:207b-5: bde ba'i lus su 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2626:207b-6: de nas phyis mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:207b-7: de'i snying gar h'um rab tu gnas par byas la
T02D2626:207b-8: de las de'i lus rdo rje lta bur bsam par
T02D2626:207b-9: bya zhing / ha na ha na zhes pa'i yi
T02D2626:207b-10: ge'i phreng ba la yang dang yang du btags pas
T02D2626:207b-11: de'i lus la bskon par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:207b-12: de nas h'um las spros pa'i khro bo'i bum pa
T02D2626:207b-13: bdud rtsis gang ba lngas khro bo'i gzugs su dbang
T02D2626:207b-15: des ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2626:207b-16: dbang du bya ba ni khro bo khams gsum gnod
T02D2626:207b-17: byed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi lcags kyu lta bu'i
T02D2626:207b-18: 'od zer dmar pos bsgrub bya'i snying la spros pas
T02D2626:207b-20: rgyas pa la ni khro bo khams gsum 'jig byed
T02D2626:207b-21: kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'od zer ser po rin
T02D2626:207b-22: po che lta bu spros pas /
T02D2626:207b-23: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'byor pa thams cad blangs
T02D2626:207b-24: te de'i longs spyod du thim par bya ba nyid
T02D2626:207b-25: de de dag gis ni khro bo'i phrin las rdzogs
T02D2626:207b-26: par 'gyur ro // de nas rdo rdze 'dzin rgyal pos //
T02D2626:207b-27: sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T02D2626:207b-28: las rnams bzhi yi sbyin sreg bshad //
T02D2626:207b-29: zhi ba'i thab khung gsum ni legs byas la //
T02D2626:207b-30: zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od zer 'phro 'dra la //
T02D2626:207b-31: khru gang tsam mam yang na khru do pa ;
T02D2626:207b-32: / mi yi rgyal mchog rnams kyi nyis 'gyur tshad //
T02D2626:207b-33: de dag rim par legs shing mdzes byas la //
T02D2626:207b-34: zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:207b-35: de la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gong
T02D2626:207b-36: du gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg ni tshe 'das pa'i ched
T02D2626:207b-37: du gsungs la / 'di ni 'tsho ba da lta
T02D2626:207b-38: ba la thun mong du gsungs par shes par bya'o
T02D2626:207b-39: du gsungs la / // de la dang por zhi
T02D2626:207b-40: ba'i thab khung rab 'bring tha ma gsum ni khru
T02D2626:207b-41: gang ba dang do pa dang bzhi par bya ba
T02D2626:207b-42: du gsungs la / // ste / de yang rigs
T02D2626:207b-43: kyi bye brag gis mtshon pa ni rgyal rigs la
T02D2626:208a-0: du gsungs la / // ste / @208a * // sogs pa la sbyar ro //
T02D2626:208a-1: de shin tu legs shing mdzes par bya ba ni
T02D2626:208a-2: zur la sogs pa kha dog gi khyad par gyis
T02D2626:208a-3: legs par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:208a-4: 'khor lo'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2626:208a-5: dbus su rdo rje rtse lngar gyur ba cig /'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba'i gzi can la //
T02D2626:208a-6: phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams thams cad bri bya ste //
T02D2626:208a-7: byams pa la sogs phyag mtshan zur bzhir bri //
T02D2626:208a-8: rgyal po bzhi yi ji bzhin phyag mtshan dang //
T02D2626:208a-9: phyogs kyi bdag po de bzhin phyogs bri //
T02D2626:208a-10: khyab 'jug la sogs lha chen phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2626:208a-11: 'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya //
T02D2626:208a-12: zhes gsungs pa ni phyag rgya'i tshogs bri ba gsungs te /
T02D2626:208a-13: de la thab khung gi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa dkar po bris nas /
T02D2626:208a-14: de'i dbus su rdo rje la sogs pa de bzhin
T02D2626:208a-15: gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya zla ba'i steng du bri
T02D2626:208a-16: bar bya'o // de bzhin du 'khor lo'i rtsibs la
T02D2626:208a-17: ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2626:208a-18: bar bya'o // dang / de'i mu ran gyi phyi
T02D2626:208a-19: rol du 'khor lo rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa
T02D2626:208a-20: la byams pa la sogs pa bcu drug dang /
T02D2626:208a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa lha mo bcu drug gi phyag rgya bri'o //
T02D2626:208a-22: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo drug cu rtsa bzhi
T02D2626:208a-23: pa la rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha chen
T02D2626:208a-24: po bzhi chung ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2626:208a-28: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams bri bar bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:208a-29: dri zhim chus bkang kha dog dkar bsgyur la //
T02D2626:208a-30: dkar pos legs par dkris pa'i bum pa brgyad //
T02D2626:208a-31: dkar gsum gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang //
T02D2626:208a-32: bdug pa mar me me tog rnams kyang gzhag / mchod par bya ba'i phyir ni bla re dang //
T02D2626:208a-33: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga yab la sogs gzhag /
T02D2626:208a-34: ces gsungs pa ni mchod pa'i yo byad gsungs pa
T02D2626:208a-35: ste de la bum pa kha dog dkar po la
T02D2626:208a-36: gos dkar pos dkris pa brgyad gzhag pa dang /
T02D2626:208b-0: zho dang mar dang 'o ma la @208b sogs pas sbyar ba'i lha bshos dang /
T02D2626:208b-1: gtor ma 'byor tshad du gzhag pa dang /
T02D2626:208b-2: gdugs dang bla re la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo
T02D2626:208b-3: byad sna tshogs pa dang spos dang me tog la
T02D2626:208b-4: sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i longs spyod ci 'byor pa
T02D2626:208b-5: gzhag par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:208b-6: nang re ga bur dri zhim sna tshogs dang //
T02D2626:208b-7: tsandan la sogs byug pas lus byugs la //
T02D2626:208b-8: kha ni shar phyogs bltas te sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2626:208b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug bya'am //
T02D2626:208b-10: yang na rnal 'byor ldan pas sems dpa'i gdan 'dug ste //
T02D2626:208b-11: gos dang phreng mchog dkar pos brgyan par bya //
T02D2626:208b-12: zhes gsungs pa ni bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:208b-13: de la sbyin sreg 'bum ma them gyi bar du
T02D2626:208b-14: nang par re re ga bur la sogs pas lus
T02D2626:208b-15: byugs pa dang / gong du bstan pa'i rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:208b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug pa dang //
T02D2626:208b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa 'dug pa ni seng ge'i
T02D2626:208b-18: khri'i steng ngam yang na rnal 'byor gyis padma 'dab
T02D2626:208b-19: ma bcu drug pa bsams pa la 'dug par bya
T02D2626:208b-20: ba nyid do // mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang //
T02D2626:208b-21: nas kyi thug pa la sogs dang //
T02D2626:208b-22: til dang mar dang kha ra dang //
T02D2626:208b-23: yungs kar dang ni 'bras yos dang //
T02D2626:208b-24: 'bras chan nas dang gro rnams dang //
T02D2626:208b-25: me tog shin tu dri zhim rnams //
T02D2626:208b-26: ga bur dang ni bsres nas kyang //
T02D2626:208b-27: tsandan dkar pos bsgos pa dang //
T02D2626:208b-29: zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing ni //
T02D2626:208b-30: de dag khung bu'i khyad par las //
T02D2626:208b-31: rang gi sor gyis gzhal bya ba //
T02D2626:208b-32: nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog / sor mo bcu drug bar ma ste //
T02D2626:208b-33: tha ma bcu gnyis nyid du bshad //
T02D2626:208b-34: shin tu chung na sor brgyad de //
T02D2626:208b-35: bud shing zho dang ldan pa la //
T02D2626:208b-36: dri chus bskus par shes par bya //
T02D2626:208b-38: sreg rdzas rnams gsungs pa ste //
T02D2626:208b-39: de la sreg pa'i rdzas gong du smos pa'i tshul gyis mar dang /
T02D2626:209a-0: nas kyi thug pa zho dang @209a * //
T02D2626:209a-7: 'bras yos la sogs pa dang ga bur dang tsandan gyis bsgos pa gzhag par bya ba dang /
T02D2626:209a-8: yam shing ni me spor bar byed pa ste de
T02D2626:209a-9: ba da ru'am kha dog dkar zhing 'o ma dang
T02D2626:209a-10: ldan pa rnams la khung bu rab la ni sor
T02D2626:209a-13: tha ma la ni bcu gnyis dang brgyad du bya ba ste /
T02D2626:209a-14: de las thung ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rdzas su rung ba ma yin no //
T02D2626:209a-15: de dag kyang dbyibs ni rtse mo ral gri ltar byas la rtsa bzlum por bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:209a-16: bud shing ni ka ma la sogs pa kha dog
T02D2626:209a-17: dkar zhing 'o ma dang 'bras bur ldan pa la
T02D2626:209a-18: ga bur la sogs bas bsgre bar byas bas zlum
T02D2626:209a-19: po nyid du brtsig par bya'o //
T02D2626:209a-20: bud shing de las byung ba'i me //
T02D2626:209a-21: sbar nas dri chus gtor nas ni //
T02D2626:209a-22: padma dkar po zhal 'dra dge / padma nor bu ril ba thogs //
T02D2626:209a-23: lag pa gza' skar mchog thogs pa //
T02D2626:209a-25: de lta'i me lha bkug nas kyang //
T02D2626:209a-26: aargha blangs te dbul bar bya ;
T02D2626:209a-27: / zhes gsungs pa ni las kyi me lha spyan drang ba ste /
T02D2626:209a-28: de la dang por rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
T02D2626:209a-29: las 'od zer spros pas las kyi me sbar bar
T02D2626:209a-30: bya ba'i phyir las kyi me lha drang srong chen
T02D2626:209a-31: po kha dog dkar dmar du 'dug pa /
T02D2626:209a-32: zhi ba'i cha lugs can lag pa bzhi pa la
T02D2626:209a-33: g-yas pa gnyis na gzar bu dang padma'i steng na
T02D2626:209a-35: g-yon pa gnyis kyis ril pa spyi blugs dang /
T02D2626:209a-37: ra skyes kyi steng na padma dkar po'i gdan la
T02D2626:209a-38: bzhugs ba spyan drangs la aargha phul nas me sbar
T02D2626:209a-39: nas shar lho mtshams su bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o
T02D2626:209a-40: // de nas zla rgyas dkar po la //
T02D2626:209a-41: bzhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te //
T02D2626:209a-42: padma'i steng du shar phyogs su //
T02D2626:209a-43: bsams te brtan par bzhugs par bya //
T02D2626:209b-0: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs ba gsungs @209b ba ste /
T02D2626:209b-1: de yang rang gi sa bon las 'od zer spros
T02D2626:209b-2: pas khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba padma'i
T02D2626:209b-3: steng na zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa sku mdog
T02D2626:209b-4: dkar po dang phyag mtshan gong du gsungs pa spyan
T02D2626:209b-5: drangs nas shar phyogs su bzhugs par bsam pa nyid
T02D2626:209b-6: do // de ltar bsams nas de nas ni //
T02D2626:209b-7: bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste //
T02D2626:209b-8: de yi nyes pa drangs nas ni //
T02D2626:209b-9: shin tu bsrings te spar bar bya //
T02D2626:209b-10: nang par sngar ni mtshan byas nas //
T02D2626:209b-11: dri zhim chu yis lus byugs la //
T02D2626:209b-12: bdud rtsi bzhin bsams sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2626:209b-13: zhes ba ni rnal 'byor ba gsungs te /
T02D2626:209b-14: de la gang gi bsgrub par bya ba de mdun
T02D2626:209b-15: du dmigs pa de'i nyes pa nad la sogs pa
T02D2626:209b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyis me'i nang du bcug ste /
T02D2626:209b-17: aom aagha ye zhes pa dang /
T02D2626:209b-18: aom ti bi sh'akya buddha si zhes pa la sogs
T02D2626:209b-19: pa'i sngags kyis mar khu blugs te me sbar bar
T02D2626:209b-21: nang par sngar ni gtsang byas la //
T02D2626:209b-22: zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi skabs su lus khrus byas la dri yis lus byugs nas /
T02D2626:209b-23: rdzas rnams bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas bsreg par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:209b-24: dam tshig 'di ni las kyi mchog / lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'dis //
T02D2626:209b-25: dang por me lha brtag byas la //
T02D2626:209b-26: khro bo de ni de lus su //
T02D2626:209b-27: spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs par bsham //
T02D2626:209b-28: de nas dang bor khro bo la //
T02D2626:209b-29: bsreg bya lan gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2626:209b-30: de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum //
T02D2626:209b-31: de nas me lha nyid la gsum //
T02D2626:209b-32: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la //
T02D2626:209b-33: de nas lha rnams re re la //
T02D2626:209b-34: phul te bgegs la'ang de bzhin 'gyur //
T02D2626:209b-35: lha rnams yid 'ong mdzes pa yis //
T02D2626:209b-36: rnam par dag pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2626:209b-37: zhes gsungs pa ni gong ma la snyegs shing go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D2626:209b-38: de nas dang por khro bo yi //
T02D2626:209b-39: sngags kyis yam shing sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2626:209b-40: de nas gcig tu bsres nas ni //
T02D2626:209b-41: bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
T02D2626:209b-42: de bzhin sbyin sreg de 'og tu //
T02D2626:209b-43: brgya stong rnyed dam yang na ni /
T02D2626:210a-0: @210a * // brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni //
T02D2626:210a-1: khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya //
T02D2626:210a-2: zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir pho nya las kyi sbyin sreg gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:210a-3: de la khro bo chen po me'i nang du bzhugs
T02D2626:210a-4: su gsol te zhal bsil la sogs pas mchod nas
T02D2626:210a-5: / rdzas lhag ma rnams gcig tu bsres la de
T02D2626:210a-6: bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sngags kyis bdud
T02D2626:210a-7: rtsir byas nas 'bum mam brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar
T02D2626:210a-8: du khro bo'i sngags kyis dbul bar byas te /
T02D2626:210a-9: de ni khro bos bsgrub par bya ba'i nyes pa
T02D2626:210a-10: rnams myur du sel bar byed pa'i phyir sbyin sreg
T02D2626:210a-12: de nas lus la dbang bskur zhing //
T02D2626:210a-13: mnyam par gzhag pas bsrungs nas kyang //
T02D2626:210a-14: mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni //
T02D2626:210a-15: lha rnams thams cad gshegs su gsol //
T02D2626:210a-16: 'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams bya //
T02D2626:210a-18: ces gsungs pa ni yo byad rdzogs pa'i cho ga
T02D2626:210a-19: gsungs pa ste de la phyis nyes pas mi gos
T02D2626:210a-20: pa'i phyir bsgrub bya'i lus bum pa'i chus dbang bskur
T02D2626:210a-21: bar bya ste / bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i sngags
T02D2626:210a-22: dang phyag rgyas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsrung
T02D2626:210a-24: de nas mchod pa'i yo byad lngas legs par mchod nas rol mo rnam pa mang po dang /
T02D2626:210a-25: ting nge 'dzin gyis lha thams cad la bzod par gsol te /
T02D2626:210a-26: gshegs su gsol ba byas nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad par zhu ba gsol bar bya ba nyid do ;
T02D2626:210a-27: / des ni zhi ba'i las the tshom mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2626:210a-28: gal te de yi sdig la sogs //
T02D2626:210a-29: sems kyis mnyam par ma bzhag pas //
T02D2626:210a-30: de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na //
T02D2626:210a-31: stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la //
T02D2626:210a-32: de nas de bzhin las byas na ;
T02D2626:210a-33: / gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D2626:210a-34: zhes gsungs pa ni phyis bskyar ba'i cho ga gsungs
T02D2626:210a-35: pa ste de la gang dag sdig pa'am nad la
T02D2626:210a-36: sogs pa zhi bar ma gyur pa na phyis chos
T02D2626:210a-37: thams cad stong pa nyid du bsams pas lha'i skur
T02D2626:210b-0: bskyed de / snga ma ji @210b lta ba bzhin
T02D2626:210b-1: du zhi ba'i las byas par 'gyur na lan gnyis
T02D2626:210b-2: pa'i stobs kyis nges pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2626:210b-3: bskyed de / ba nyid do // de dag gis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2626:210b-4: 'bras bur ldan pa'i nags tshal lam //
T02D2626:210b-5: yang na skyed mo tshal mchog gam //
T02D2626:210b-6: rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni //
T02D2626:210b-7: dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste //
T02D2626:210b-8: khru do yang na khru bzhi 'am /
T02D2626:210b-9: de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad de //
T02D2626:210b-10: thab khung legs par brkos nas ni //
T02D2626:210b-11: rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba ste //
T02D2626:210b-12: dkyil 'khor stegs bu brtsig bya ba //
T02D2626:210b-13: chung du la ni khru brgyad de //
T02D2626:210b-14: bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid //
T02D2626:210b-15: mchog la bcu drug yang na ni //
T02D2626:210b-16: nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya //
T02D2626:210b-17: mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam //
T02D2626:210b-18: sum cu gnyis su bya ba yin //
T02D2626:210b-19: zhes gsungs pa ni rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gsungs te /
T02D2626:210b-20: de la gong du gsungs pa'i gnas ji lta ba
T02D2626:210b-21: rnams su stegs bu tha ma ni khru brgyad pa
T02D2626:210b-22: brtsig pa dang / bar ma ni bcu gnyis brtsig pa dang /
T02D2626:210b-23: rab la ni bcu drug gam nyi shu rtsa bzhir
T02D2626:210b-24: brtsigs nas de ji lta ba bzhin du thab khru
T02D2626:210b-25: do pa dang / bzhi pa dang /
T02D2626:210b-27: rin po che lta bu zur lnga pa'am /
T02D2626:210b-28: brgyad par byas la zabs su ni phyed brko bar bya zhing /
T02D2626:210b-29: de'i phyi rol gyi steng du mu khyud sor brgyad pa dang /
T02D2626:210b-30: bcu drug pa dang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ni
T02D2626:210b-31: gong du gsungs pa'i rab 'bring la sbyar te bya
T02D2626:210b-32: ba nyid do // phyi yi dkyil 'khor de yi phyed //
T02D2626:210b-33: padma sna tshogs brgyan par bya //
T02D2626:210b-34: dkyil 'khor dbus su rin chen dang //
T02D2626:210b-35: padma sna tshogs gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:210b-36: de yi dbus su bsgo ba ni //
T02D2626:210b-37: legs par bltas te phyed kyi tshad //
T02D2626:210b-38: khru bzhi pa'am khru brgyad pa //
T02D2626:210b-39: yang na dpal ster rin chen 'dra //
T02D2626:210b-40: mdor na 'jim pa ser po yis //
T02D2626:210b-41: khung mchog de ni bsgo bar bya //
T02D2626:210b-42: zhes gsungs pa ni dkyil 'khor bri bar gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:210b-43: de la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du ni padma'i steng
T02D2626:210b-44: du rin po che 'bar ba 'od zer po dang
T02D2626:210b-45: ldan pa bri bar bya ba dang /
T02D2626:211a-0: de'i mu ran la rin po che @211a * //
T02D2626:211a-1: padma'i steng na 'dug pa pri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:211a-2: de'i phyi rol du gru bzhi pa la rim pa
T02D2626:211a-3: gsum pa la ni bde bar gshegs pa sras dang
T02D2626:211a-4: 'khor du bcas pa phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams tshon dmar
T02D2626:211a-5: ser gyis yongs su rjogs par bri zhing de'i khung
T02D2626:211a-6: bu ni 'jim pa ser pos bsku ba ste lhag
T02D2626:211a-7: ma ni gong du bshad pa la snyegs so //
T02D2626:211a-8: gur gum la sogs bskus nas kyang //
T02D2626:211a-9: de yi dbus su bri ba ni //
T02D2626:211a-10: tshon mchog ser po nyid kyis ni //
T02D2626:211a-11: rin chen zur brgyad 'bar ba bri //
T02D2626:211a-12: de nas tshon ni dmar ser gyis//
T02D2626:211a-13: rin chen padma la sogs pa'i //
T02D2626:211a-15: gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya //
T02D2626:211a-16: rim gnyis sam ni rim gsum mam //
T02D2626:211a-17: yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par //
T02D2626:211a-18: der ni sgo ba de dag sogs //
T02D2626:211a-19: phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri bar bya //
T02D2626:211a-20: zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2626:211a-21: bum pa kha dog gser 'dra zhing //
T02D2626:211a-22: dri zhim chu yis bkang ba la //
T02D2626:211a-23: shin tu mdzes pa bcu gnyis sam //
T02D2626:211a-24: sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste //
T02D2626:211a-25: dkri ba dar ni ser po la //
T02D2626:211a-26: kha rgyan yal ga me tog can //
T02D2626:211a-27: dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang //
T02D2626:211a-28: phreng ba mar me rnams dang ni //
T02D2626:211a-29: rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs pa dang //
T02D2626:211a-30: bla re gdugs rnams ser pos brgyan //
T02D2626:211a-31: zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir mchod pa'i yo byad gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:211a-32: de la 'dir rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg yin pa'i phyir
T02D2626:211a-33: bum pa la sogs pa kha dog ser pos bsgos
T02D2626:211a-34: pa dang / btsos pa rnams kyis brgyan par bya ba ste /
T02D2626:211a-35: de la bum pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
T02D2626:211a-36: pa ma gtogs pa rnams mchod pa'i bu ma par
T02D2626:211a-37: shes par bya'o // bdag nyid gos dang rgyan rnams dang //
T02D2626:211a-38: me tog la sogs ser pos brgyan //
T02D2626:211a-39: byang phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas ni //
T02D2626:211a-40: rin chen rgyal bo rgyas mdzad pa //
T02D2626:211a-41: btso ma gser gyi mdog dang 'dra //
T02D2626:211a-42: yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan ma chog / yid kyis rnal 'byor rjes dran pas //
T02D2626:211a-43: las 'di dag kyang bya bar bshad //
T02D2626:211b-0: ces @211b gsungs ba ni bdag dang rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:211b-1: de la bdag nyid gong du smos pa'i rgyan thams
T02D2626:211b-2: cad gser las byas pa ste gos dang me tog
T02D2626:211b-3: phreng ba yang rigs dang rjes su mthun pa las
T02D2626:211b-4: / bdag nyid mngon par byang chub pa ldas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan du bskyed de /
T02D2626:211b-5: yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan gyis //
T02D2626:211b-6: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa ni rgyas pa'i las kyi gtso bo ste /
T02D2626:211b-7: las ni 'di dag bya bar bshad //
T02D2626:211b-9: de bzhin nyi zla ku be ra//
T02D2626:211b-10: gnod sbyin sde dpon dzambha la //
T02D2626:211b-11: gser gyi char ni rab 'bebs shing //
T02D2626:211b-12: yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad pa //
T02D2626:211b-13: mdor na de yi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2626:211b-14: nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam //
T02D2626:211b-15: de nas rgyal srid thob par gsungs //
T02D2626:211b-16: lus rgyas pa la smos ci dgos ;
T02D2626:211b-17: / zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir 'tsho ba da ltar
T02D2626:211b-18: ba'i las gsungs pa ste de la slob ma dbang
T02D2626:211b-19: bskur ba'i dus su dpal dang 'byor pa thams cad
T02D2626:211b-20: ster bar byed pa lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla
T02D2626:211b-21: ba dang / rnam thos sras dang /
T02D2626:211b-23: dzambha la rnams gser la sogs pa rin po che'i char gyis lag par 'bebs pa dang /
T02D2626:211b-24: de dag gi 'od zer gyis de'i lus la dpal
T02D2626:211b-25: dang longs spyod rgyas par byed pa sgom pa ni
T02D2626:211b-26: mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rgyal srid kyang thob
T02D2626:211b-27: par 'gyur na / longs spyod rgyas pa lta smos mi dgos pa nyid do //
T02D2626:211b-28: rgyas par byed phyir de'i ming nas //
T02D2626:211b-29: smos te brgya phrag brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2626:211b-30: yang na de bzhin stong phrag ni //
T02D2626:211b-31: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya //
T02D2626:211b-32: zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i
T02D2626:211b-33: sngags la las kyi sngags che ge mo pushtam ku
T02D2626:211b-34: ru zhes pa btags te grangs gnyis pa'i tshad du
T02D2626:211b-35: bzlas par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:211b-36: de nas sbyin sreg rab byas te //
T02D2626:211b-37: byang phyogs su ni seng ge yi //
T02D2626:211b-38: gdan gyi steng na rin chen dang //
T02D2626:211b-39: padma nyi zla'i gdan steng na //
T02D2626:212a-0: rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog / rin chen @212a * //
T02D2626:212a-1: dpal dang gzi brjid mchog / rdo rje bzhad dang rgyal ba yang //
T02D2626:212a-2: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas ni //
T02D2626:212a-3: phyag ni mchod sbyin gzhol ba dang //
T02D2626:212a-4: rin chen char yang 'bebs brtson zhing //
T02D2626:212a-6: de la shin tu khyab byed bsam //
T02D2626:212a-7: zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir ye shes kyi tshogs rgyas
T02D2626:212a-8: par byed pa'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi yang dag
T02D2626:212a-9: par bsams te / de la rgyas pa'i las yin
T02D2626:212a-10: pas na byang phyogs su seng ge'i gdan gyi steng
T02D2626:212a-11: du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la de'i steng du
T02D2626:212a-12: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2626:212a-13: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2626:212a-14: de dag gi steng du rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02D2626:212a-17: rdo rje bzhad pa rnams sku mdog ser por snang
T02D2626:212a-18: ba la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag g-yas
T02D2626:212a-20: g-yon pa dpal dang longs spyod rgyas par byed pa'i
T02D2626:212a-21: nor bu rin po che bsnams pas slob ma la
T02D2626:212a-22: rin po che'i char 'bebs shing de dag gi 'od
T02D2626:212a-23: zer gyis lus la khyab par bsam pa kho na'o
T02D2626:212a-24: // dung dang pi wang cang te'u dang //
T02D2626:212a-25: sil snyan glu dang gar mchog gis //
T02D2626:212a-26: mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang //
T02D2626:212a-27: de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo //
T02D2626:212a-28: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum gyi
T02D2626:212a-29: mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas la gong
T02D2626:212a-30: du bshad pa'i rim pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba'o zhes
T02D2626:212a-31: pa'o // khung bu'i khyad par nyid las kyang yam shing bud shing khyad par dbye //
T02D2626:212a-32: mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang //
T02D2626:212a-33: chung du nyid du bshad pa yin //
T02D2626:212a-34: bar ma khru dor shes gsungs te //
T02D2626:212a-35: khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin pas //
T02D2626:212a-36: shing ni me tog 'bras bcas rigs //
T02D2626:212a-37: ya thog ma thog mar khu gzhug /'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang //
T02D2626:212a-38: me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan //
T02D2626:212a-39: mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa'am //
T02D2626:212a-40: phal cher dpal gyi 'bras bur ldan //
T02D2626:212a-42: sreg rdzas yongs su gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:212b-0: de yang khung bu rab la @212b sogs pa'i khyad
T02D2626:212b-1: par las dang bud shing khyad par bya ba dang
T02D2626:212b-2: / yam shing ni sor brgyad pa dang /
T02D2626:212b-4: nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams su bya ba ste /
T02D2626:212b-5: de dag nyid bal po se'u la sogs pa 'bras
T02D2626:212b-6: bu dang bcas pa'i shing las bya ste rtse mo
T02D2626:212b-7: gnyis sbrang rtsir smyugs pa dang /
T02D2626:212b-8: til la sogs pa'i 'bru dang me tog la sogs
T02D2626:212b-9: pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad la tshon ser
T02D2626:212b-11: mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa'am //
T02D2626:212b-12: zhes pa ni dpal dang shis pa bskyed pa'i rdzas mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i ri lu'am /
T02D2626:212b-13: pa tra ka'i 'bras bu rnams bsres par bya ba nyid du gsungs so //
T02D2626:212b-14: me lha gser dang 'dra ba la //
T02D2626:212b-15: phyag bzhi pa ni 'dir de bzhin //
T02D2626:212b-16: padma'i gdan bzhugs rnam brgyan pa //
T02D2626:212b-17: spyan drangs nas ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2626:212b-18: zhes pa ni 'dir las su bya ba'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:212b-19: de la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las las
T02D2626:212b-20: kyi me lha drang srong chen po sku mdog ser
T02D2626:212b-22: phyag mtshan gong du smos pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2626:212b-23: du 'dzin pa lus rgyas pa spyan drangs la sbyin
T02D2626:212b-25: de yi lus la khro rgyal po //
T02D2626:212b-26: gzi can legs par spyan drangs nas //
T02D2626:212b-27: sngon bzhin dran byed de bzhin du //
T02D2626:212b-28: sbyin sreg yongs su brtag byas te //
T02D2626:212b-30: de ni nges par rab tu 'grub //
T02D2626:212b-31: ces gsungs pa ni ye shes kyi me lha mchod pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:212b-32: de la gong du bshad pa ltar khro bo khams
T02D2626:212b-33: gsum rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog ser bo gong
T02D2626:212b-34: du gsungs pa'i cha lugs can spyan drangs la 'gro
T02D2626:212b-35: ba gang dag dran par byas la /
T02D2626:212b-36: de'i tshe dang 'byor pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:212b-37: sbyin sreg grangs kyi tshad du bya ba ste /
T02D2626:212b-38: de'i tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur ba'i don nges par 'grub par gsungs so //
T02D2626:212b-39: 'bum phrag brgya ni rgyal srid dam //
T02D2626:212b-40: longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub //
T02D2626:212b-41: de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis //
T02D2626:212b-42: de la dbang bskur bsrung bar bya //
T02D2626:212b-43: de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te //
T02D2626:213a-0: phyag na rdo rje bka' bzhin @213a * //
T02D2626:213a-2: / zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir de nyid kyi phan yon yongs su gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:213a-3: de la 'bum phrag brgyas ni mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rgyal srid thob par 'gyur pa dang /
T02D2626:213a-4: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang mtshungs par longs spyod
T02D2626:213a-5: phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2626:213a-6: phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so //
T02D2626:213a-7: yang 'dir sbyin sreg de nyid kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2626:213a-8: rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D2626:213a-9: de la dbang bskur ba dang bgegs la sogs pa'i
T02D2626:213a-10: gnod pa nyung ba'i phyir go cha'i bsrung ba byas
T02D2626:213a-11: pas ni de yi gnod pa dang bkren pa thams
T02D2626:213a-12: cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2626:213a-13: de nyid gong du gsungs pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2626:213a-14: de dag gis ni rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2626:213a-15: da ni dbang gi sbyin sreg bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:213a-16: dbang ni chags pa'i sems dang ni //
T02D2626:213a-17: chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya //
T02D2626:213a-18: chags pa bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D2626:213a-19: rdo rje chags pa de las byung //
T02D2626:213a-20: khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir //
T02D2626:213a-21: padma sems dpa' rtag tu chags //
T02D2626:213a-22: de bas 'dir ni de dag gi / las grub par ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2626:213a-24: de la 'dir bdag nyid 'dod chags chen po'i bdag
T02D2626:213a-25: nyid bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med du yang dag
T02D2626:213a-26: par bskyed de / de gang la chags pa'i sems
T02D2626:213a-27: chen po dang 'dod pa dbang du byed pa'i ting
T02D2626:213a-29: de nyid 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis khams gsum po
T02D2626:213a-30: thams cad chags par bya ba'i phyir padma rigs kyi
T02D2626:213a-31: bcom ldan 'das rtag tu chags pa chen por bzhugs
T02D2626:213a-32: pa ste / de'i phyir de'i rnal 'byor gyis dbang gi las yongs su 'grub pa nyid do //
T02D2626:213a-33: chags dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam //
T02D2626:213a-34: chags par byed pa'i khyim du shis //
T02D2626:213a-35: btso blag mkhan nam zla mtshan 'dzag / khyim du chags pa'i las rnams bya //
T02D2626:213a-36: yang na rdo rje chags gnas sam //
T02D2626:213a-37: phyag na padmo'i gnas nyid dam //
T02D2626:213a-38: rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas//
T02D2626:213b-0: @213b bde chen gyi ni gnas nyid dang //
T02D2626:213b-2: me tog tsandan tshal dang ni //
T02D2626:213b-3: me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal dang //
T02D2626:213b-4: yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa //
T02D2626:213b-5: zhes gsungs pa ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan
T02D2626:213b-6: pa ste de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang
T02D2626:213b-7: gi las la shin tu bsngags pa nyid de de
T02D2626:213b-8: dag ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D2626:213b-9: 'dir ni stegs bu khru brgyad dam //
T02D2626:213b-10: de ltar bcu gnyis bcu drug rnams //
T02D2626:213b-11: byas nas de yi dbus su yang //
T02D2626:213b-12: thab khung dkyil 'khor bya ba ni //
T02D2626:213b-13: khru gang yang na khru do'am //
T02D2626:213b-14: de ltar khru ni bzhi pa bya //
T02D2626:213b-15: zhes gsungs pa ni stegs bu brtsig pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D2626:213b-16: de la rgyal po la sogs pa'i rim pas khru
T02D2626:213b-17: bcu drug pa dang thab khung khru bzhi pa la
T02D2626:213b-18: sogs pa bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:213b-19: de nyid kyi dbyibs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:213b-21: yang na rdo rje 'dra bar bya //
T02D2626:213b-23: zheng du mchu yi phyed kyi tshad //
T02D2626:213b-24: zhing gi phyed kyi tshad tsam du //
T02D2626:213b-25: thab khung zabs su brko bar bya //
T02D2626:213b-26: mu khyud sor mo bzhi par bya //
T02D2626:213b-28: tha ma mchog gi khyad par las //
T02D2626:213b-29: yam shing so sor nges par bya //
T02D2626:213b-30: zhes gsungs pa ste de la gzhu bdungs pa lta bu'am /
T02D2626:213b-32: rdo rje'i rtse mo ra gcig pa lcags kyu'i rnam pa lta bu'am /
T02D2626:213b-33: autpala'i mda' sgro dang bcas pa lta bu'am /
T02D2626:213b-34: zla ba kham pa lta bu la zheng dkyus kyi
T02D2626:213b-35: phyed dang zabs su zheng gi phyed bskor bar bya
T02D2626:213b-36: ste mu khyud phyi dang nang gnyis su sor brgyad
T02D2626:213b-37: du byas la rab 'bring gsum gyi bye brag gis
T02D2626:213b-38: yam shing sor brgyad pa la sogs par bya ba
T02D2626:213b-39: nyid do // yang na yam shing bsreg shing ni //
T02D2626:213b-40: zhi ba'i tshad du gsungs pa ste //
T02D2626:213b-41: shin tu dmar ba'i tsandan nam ;
T02D2626:213b-42: / yang na shing dmar gzhan yang rung //
T02D2626:213b-44: btsag dang tsandan rgya skyegs sogs //
T02D2626:213b-45: le brgan tsi dang gur gum gyis //
T02D2626:213b-46: mdor na bud pa'i shing dang ni //
T02D2626:213b-47: yam shing la yang bskus nas kyang //
T02D2626:214a-0: yungs kar kha dog dmar po @214a * //
T02D2626:214a-2: btsag dang mtshal dang de bzhin du //
T02D2626:214a-3: zangs kyi phye dang ske tshe dang //
T02D2626:214a-4: til dang lan tshva skyur rtsi dang //
T02D2626:214a-5: la phug nyung rdog de bzhin te //
T02D2626:214a-6: khrag dang rdul ni chen po rnams //
T02D2626:214a-7: bsreg pa'i phyir ni bsdus nas kyang //
T02D2626:214a-8: sngar bshad 'bras bu la sogs pa'i //
T02D2626:214a-9: khu bas yang nas yang bskus nas //
T02D2626:214a-10: khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te //
T02D2626:214a-11: ba dang ra las bzhos pa yi //
T02D2626:214a-12: bshigs ma thag pa'i mar sar dang //
T02D2626:214a-13: mar dang til ni rnams kyis dgang //
T02D2626:214a-14: ga bur la sogs bsgos nas kyang //
T02D2626:214a-15: bdud rtsi btab ste gzhag par bya ;
T02D2626:214a-18: de la yang na yam shing dang bsreg shing dag zhi ba'i tshad du bya ba dang /
T02D2626:214a-19: sreg rdzas bcu gcig po rgyud gzhan nas bsngags pa thams cad la btsag dang /
T02D2626:214a-20: tsandan dmar po dang rgya skyegs rnams kyis dmar por
T02D2626:214a-21: bsgos pa la de dag thams cad khro bo khams
T02D2626:214a-22: gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis btab nas yongs
T02D2626:214a-23: su bsrungs te / de'i rjes la bdud rtsi 'byung
T02D2626:214a-24: gnas kyi sngags kyis bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2626:214a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du gzhag par bya ba nyid
T02D2626:214a-26: su bsrungs te / do // de nas thab khung dmar po ni //
T02D2626:214a-27: byi ru'i sdong po 'dra ba la //
T02D2626:214a-28: bsnyams nas spos dmar la sogs dang //
T02D2626:214a-29: gur gum dmar pos byug par bya //
T02D2626:214a-30: de nas kha dog dmar po yis //
T02D2626:214a-31: stug po nyid du bskus nas ni //
T02D2626:214a-32: gur gum ser po bsres pa yi //
T02D2626:214a-33: tshon gyis ri mo bri ba ni //
T02D2626:214a-34: thab khung nang du padma bri //
T02D2626:214a-35: de steng mdar bcas gzhu bri ste //
T02D2626:214a-36: rtag tu thab khung khor yug ni //
T02D2626:214a-37: padma nyid ni bri bar bya //
T02D2626:214a-38: gzhu yi dbyibs su rdo rje nyid //
T02D2626:214a-39: 'khor yug tu ni gzhu yin te //
T02D2626:214a-40: gzhu yi phyi rol padma nyid //
T02D2626:214a-41: bris nas de steng mda' yin te ;
T02D2626:214a-42: / lcags kyu mda' bcas gzhu yang bri //
T02D2626:214a-43: zhes gsungs pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs pa
T02D2626:214a-44: ste de la thab khung byi ru'i sdong po lta
T02D2626:214a-45: bur sa dmar po las byas te rnal 'byor pa
T02D2626:214a-46: mnyam par gzhag pas gur gum mam rgya skyegs la
T02D2626:214b-0: sogs pa'i tshon dmar pos thab @214b khung stug po
T02D2626:214b-1: nyid du bskus nas de'i steng du gur gum ser
T02D2626:214b-2: po dang / tsandan dmar po bsres pas bri bar
T02D2626:214b-3: bya ba ni thab khung gi nang du padma 'dab
T02D2626:214b-5: de'i lte ba la me tog gi mda' ltongs pa'i
T02D2626:214b-6: gzhu bris la gzhu'i dkyil mda'i rked par rdo rje
T02D2626:214b-8: de nas thab khung nang gi mu khyud la padma'i
T02D2626:214b-9: phreng ba bris nas de'i phyi rol gyi mu khyud
T02D2626:214b-10: la gzhu bris la de'i steng du padma kha 'bus
T02D2626:214b-12: de nyid mde'ur byas pa'i mda' dmar po gzhu la ltongs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:214b-13: da ni phyag rgya'i tshogs dgod pa bstan pa ni /
T02D2626:214b-14: de yi phyi rol rdo rje dang //
T02D2626:214b-15: lcags kyu mda' bcas gzhu dang ni //
T02D2626:214b-16: legs pa'i blo gros autpala bri //
T02D2626:214b-17: lho phyogs rin chen gzi brjid dang //
T02D2626:214b-18: rgyal mtshan bzhad pa bzhugs pa ste //
T02D2626:214b-20: gsungs pa rnams ni nub phyogs bri //
T02D2626:214b-21: las rab go cha mche ba dang //
T02D2626:214b-22: mtshams sbyor rnams ni byang phyogs bri //
T02D2626:214b-23: grva rnams su ni spos la sogs //
T02D2626:214b-24: phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri bar bya //
T02D2626:214b-25: zhes gsungs te de la padma dmar po'i lte ba
T02D2626:214b-26: la gzhu'i dbus su rdo rje'i lte ba la h'um
T02D2626:214b-27: bris la de nyid 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par
T02D2626:214b-29: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dang /
T02D2626:214b-32: sna tshogs rdo rje rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:214b-33: thab khung gi phyi rol du ni 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa dmar po bris la /
T02D2626:214b-34: de dag gi steng du rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du shar la sogs par rdo rje dang //
T02D2626:214b-38: de bzhin du rin po che dang /
T02D2626:214b-41: padma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i spyan dang /
T02D2626:214b-45: padma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i lce dang /
T02D2626:214b-49: khu tshur rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:214b-50: de'i zur bzhir ni cod pan dang /
T02D2626:215a-2: sgo rnams su ni lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag
T02D2626:215a-3: rgya ci rigs par bri bar bya ba nyid do
T02D2626:215a-4: // de nyid du bsreg pa'i rdzas ji lta bus bya snyam pa la /
T02D2626:215a-5: me tog dmar po la sogs pas //
T02D2626:215a-6: shin tu snga ma bzhin mchod de //
T02D2626:215a-7: zhes gsungs te me tog dmar po dang /
T02D2626:215a-10: til dmar po rnams dang gzhan yang rdzas thams cad
T02D2626:215a-11: la rgya skyegs khu bas bsgos par byas pa nyid
T02D2626:215a-12: do // rnal 'byor ci lta bus bya snyam pa la /
T02D2626:215a-13: dpal ldan gos dang phreng ba dang //
T02D2626:215a-14: dmar po'i dris ni bskus nas kyang //
T02D2626:215a-15: rtag tu thub pa nub bltas la //
T02D2626:215a-16: dmar thag ma chad las byas te //
T02D2626:215a-17: padma dmar po'i gdan bsams la //
T02D2626:215a-18: rab chags phyag na padma bsnams //
T02D2626:215a-19: g-yon du rdo rje chags pa la //
T02D2626:215a-20: g-yas su bde ba chen po ste //
T02D2626:215a-21: de bzhin bsams nas de dbus su //
T02D2626:215a-22: chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa gzhag / rdo rje gzhu dang g-yon 'gyings ma //
T02D2626:215a-23: me tog dmar pos rab brgyan la //
T02D2626:215a-24: dri dmar sogs kyis mchod par bya //
T02D2626:215a-26: de la bdag gong du bstan pa ltar gos dmar
T02D2626:215a-27: po la sogs pas brgyan nas nyi ma nub kar
T02D2626:215a-28: kha nub tu bltas te bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag
T02D2626:215a-29: med padma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsams te /
T02D2626:215a-30: de'i g-yas phyogs su bde ba chen po kun du bzang po /
T02D2626:215a-31: g-yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
T02D2626:215a-32: kun du bzang po'i g-yon du yum kun du bzang
T02D2626:215a-33: mo 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed pa phyag
T02D2626:215a-34: na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa bsam mo
T02D2626:215a-35: // spyan ras gzigs kyi g-yon phyogs su sgrol ma
T02D2626:215a-36: 'dod pa'i mnga' gzhu 'gengs pas 'gro ba rnams kyi
T02D2626:215a-37: snying la 'bigs pa gzhag par bya ba ste me
T02D2626:215a-38: tog dmar po la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par
T02D2626:215a-39: gyis yang dag par mchod par bya ba nyid do
T02D2626:215a-40: // // de nyid du chags pa chen po'i me lha bkug pa ni //
T02D2626:215a-41: mda' dang gzhu thogs de bzhin du //
T02D2626:215a-42: padma dmar dang dbyug bsnams pa'i //
T02D2626:215a-43: me yi lha ni bkug nas kyang//
T02D2626:215b-0: @215b de yi dbus su khro rgyal po //
T02D2626:215b-1: legs par gzhug ste gzhag par bya //
T02D2626:215b-2: gsungs pa ste 'di ltar rang gi sa bon las
T02D2626:215b-3: 'od zer dmar pos las kyi me lha kha dog
T02D2626:215b-4: dmar po phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i dang po
T02D2626:215b-5: gnyis na mda' dang gzhu thogs pa tha ma gnyis
T02D2626:215b-6: na padma dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa bkug ste gzhag
T02D2626:215b-7: par bya'o // de'i rjes la dam tshig gi me
T02D2626:215b-8: lha khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba spyan drangs nas
T02D2626:215b-9: de'i lus la yang dar par bcug ste sbyin sreg
T02D2626:215b-10: gi las thams cad bya'o zhes 'dod do //
T02D2626:215b-11: de nyid ji lta bus gzhug par bya ba ni /
T02D2626:215b-12: de'i lus rdo rje lcags kyu dang //
T02D2626:215b-13: zhags pa dgug gzhug byas pa ni //
T02D2626:215b-14: spyi bo zhabs kyi drung du gzhag / de ltar bsams te snyoms zhugs pas //
T02D2626:215b-15: las bya ba ni gang yin pa //
T02D2626:215b-16: des ni lha yang dbang gyur na //
T02D2626:215b-17: mi dang lha min smos ci dgos //
T02D2626:215b-19: de la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D2626:215b-20: dang phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas
T02D2626:215b-21: bdag nyid kyi spyi pos phyag btsal bar bya'o //
T02D2626:215b-22: gong du gsungs pa'i rim pa de dag ni lha
T02D2626:215b-23: dang mi la sogs pa smos mi dgos par 'grub
T02D2626:215b-24: par 'gyur ba ste cho ga rgyas pa ni gong
T02D2626:215b-26: de nyid bsam pa 'di lta bus bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir chags pa'i sems su byas nas ni /
T02D2626:215b-27: de yi 'od zer spyi bor dgang //
T02D2626:215b-28: de bsrungs nas ni gtang bar bya //
T02D2626:215b-29: de nas rdo rje 'dod pa yis //
T02D2626:215b-30: lha rnams mchod de gshegs su gsol //
T02D2626:215b-31: de nas srung ba byas na ni //
T02D2626:215b-32: rdo rje 'dod pas rtag tu bzlas //
T02D2626:215b-34: de la bsgrub bya gang la chags pa chen po'i
T02D2626:215b-35: sems kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'od
T02D2626:215b-36: zer spyi bor 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed
T02D2626:215b-38: de'i rjes la rdo rje'i go chas gnas lngar srung
T02D2626:215b-39: ba byas la gtang bar bya ba dang de nyid
T02D2626:215b-41: aom badzra r'a ga sarba karma ba sham ku ru
T02D2626:215b-42: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bzlas par bya
T02D2626:215b-43: ba ste bsnyen pa dang dbang bskur ba'i skabs su
T02D2626:216a-0: de nas rdo rje 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad @216a * //
T02D2626:216a-1: 'dod pa chen po'i mchod pas rgyas par byas te
T02D2626:216a-2: chags pa chen po'i don du slar gshegs su gsol
T02D2626:216a-4: des ni rgyal po gtum po'i bran bzhin du 'dod pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2626:216a-5: de dag gis ni dbang gi las bstan nas ;
T02D2626:216a-6: da ni mngon spyod kyi las bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2626:216a-7: dur khrod dag dang shan pa yi //
T02D2626:216a-8: khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su //
T02D2626:216a-9: mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba //
T02D2626:216a-10: thab khung tha ma bar ma mchog / phyed dang gsum ma ma khru gsum mam //
T02D2626:216a-11: khru dgu ru ni byas pa las //
T02D2626:216a-12: stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te //
T02D2626:216a-14: lcags phye sol phye dug gis ni //
T02D2626:216a-15: bskus pa thab khung nag por bya //
T02D2626:216a-17: de la gong du gsungs pa'i gnas ji lta ba
T02D2626:216a-18: rnams su 'dir gsungs pa'i thab khung gi tshad la
T02D2626:216a-19: lcags phye la sogs pas bskus pa nag po dang
T02D2626:216a-20: rtsub par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2626:216a-21: stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te //
T02D2626:216a-22: zhes pa ni thab khung las mtshon pa'i tshad de /
T02D2626:216a-23: de la thab khung las nyis 'gyur du stegs bu brtsig par bya ba kho na'o //
T02D2626:216a-24: dkyil 'khor 'di lta bus bri bar bya ba kho na zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:216a-25: dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa //
T02D2626:216a-26: nag po shin tu 'bar ba bri //
T02D2626:216a-27: mu ran steng du rtse gsum dang //
T02D2626:216a-28: rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D2626:216a-29: de yi phyi rol mu khyud la //
T02D2626:216a-30: dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang //
T02D2626:216a-31: ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri //
T02D2626:216a-32: de yi phyi rol keng rus te //
T02D2626:216a-33: bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02D2626:216a-35: de la thab khung nang du rdo rje rtse dgu pa kha dog nag po gcig bri bar bya'o //
T02D2626:216a-36: de'i zur gsum du ni mtshon rtse gsum pa gsum bri'o //
T02D2626:216a-37: de'i logs gsum la ni rdo rje rgya gram gsum bri'o //
T02D2626:216a-38: de'i mu khyud nang ma la ni dbyug pa dang /
T02D2626:216a-39: rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D2626:216a-41: de'i mu khyud kyi steng du ni ral gri dang me 'od nag po bri ba dang /
T02D2626:216a-42: de'i phyi rol du ni keng rus kyi steng du
T02D2626:216a-43: rim pa gsum mam bzhi la bde bar gshegs pa
T02D2626:216a-44: la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams rim pa dang po
T02D2626:216b-0: la lnga dang / gnyis pa la bcu drug la @216b sogs pa bri bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2626:216b-1: me lha 'di lta bu bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:216b-2: dud srin mdog 'dra drang srong mchog / mi ro'i steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang //
T02D2626:216b-3: gzar bu phreng ba ril bar ldan //
T02D2626:216b-4: de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nas //
T02D2626:216b-5: lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg / ces gsungs te /
T02D2626:216b-6: de la las kyi me lha kha dog nag po
T02D2626:216b-7: mi ro la zhon pa phyag bzhi pa rtse gsum
T02D2626:216b-8: pa dang / gzar bu dang ril ba thogs pa
T02D2626:216b-9: spyan drang ba gzhan du bstan pa ltar ye shes
T02D2626:216b-10: kyi me lha spyan drangs pa bcug ste /
T02D2626:216b-11: khros pa dang bcas pas de nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2626:216b-12: de nyid kyi rgyu 'di lta bus bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2626:216b-13: shin tu gdug cing tsher mar bcas //
T02D2626:216b-14: bsreg shing yam shing byas nas kyang //
T02D2626:216b-15: sha dang khrag dang lcags phye dang //
T02D2626:216b-16: rus phye dug dang ske tshe dang //
T02D2626:216b-17: dri chen dri chu la sogs pa'i//
T02D2626:216b-18: rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni //
T02D2626:216b-19: bsgos pas lan grangs gsum bsregs nas //
T02D2626:216b-20: de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang //
T02D2626:216b-21: gnyen dang 'khor dang bran rnams dang //
T02D2626:216b-22: bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams //
T02D2626:216b-23: spangs te srog dang bral nas ni //
T02D2626:216b-24: sdug bsngal mi bzad myong bar 'gyur //
T02D2626:216b-26: de la shin tu gdug pa'i seng ldeng la sogs pa la bsreg shing dang yam shing byas la /
T02D2626:216b-27: de nyid kyi bsreg pa'i rdzas sha dang khrag dang rus phye dang /
T02D2626:216b-28: seng ldeng gi tsher ma dang /
T02D2626:216b-31: til nag po la sogs pa'i rdzas thams cad la
T02D2626:216b-32: dug gis bskus nas nyi ma phyed nas kha shar
T02D2626:216b-33: lhor bltas te de'i ming rus dang bsres nas bsreg
T02D2626:216b-35: des ni bsgrub bya gang dag 'jig rten gyi 'byor
T02D2626:216b-36: pa thams cad dang bral nas sdug bsngal chen po
T02D2626:216b-37: nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ni nges par shes
T02D2626:216b-38: par bya ste de dag gis ni mngon spyod kyi
T02D2626:216b-40: de ltar bshad pa'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs nas /
T02D2626:216b-41: da ni de nyid kyi ston pa po bcom ldan
T02D2626:216b-42: 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'khor 'dus pa'i tshangs
T02D2626:216b-43: pa la sogs pas sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan
T02D2626:217a-1: bstod pa 'di lta bu'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2626:217a-2: de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha //
T02D2626:217a-3: phyag 'tshal yang nas yang du ni //
T02D2626:217a-4: rin chen gdugs sogs mchog gis ni //
T02D2626:217a-5: mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang //
T02D2626:217a-6: phyag na rdo rje rgyal spyan la //
T02D2626:217a-7: dga' ba'i bsam pas stod byed pa //
T02D2626:217a-8: zhes gsungs te de la 'dir tshangs pa la sogs
T02D2626:217a-9: pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don
T02D2626:217a-10: phun sum tshogs pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par
T02D2626:217a-11: mdzad pa'i phyir drin chen po de nyid la mchod
T02D2626:217a-12: pa'i khyad par mchod pa ni /
T02D2626:217a-13: rin po che'i gdugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon
T02D2626:217a-14: tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis bdag dang
T02D2626:217a-15: gzhan gyi mngon par mchod nas 'gro ba rnams kyi
T02D2626:217a-16: mun pa bsal ba'i spyan gyi rgyal po phyag na
T02D2626:217a-17: rdo rje la bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2626:217a-18: de nyid kyi bstod pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D2626:217a-19: sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas ;
T02D2626:217a-20: / mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa //
T02D2626:217a-21: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2626:217a-22: de la 'dir ni sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rnam pa bzhi mdzad pa nyid de /
T02D2626:217a-23: de la sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas pa
T02D2626:217a-24: ni thugs de nyid rnam par rtog pa thams cad
T02D2626:217a-25: dang bral ba de bzhin nyid de /
T02D2626:217a-26: de nyid la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2626:217a-27: rdo rje ngag gi yul las 'das pas dmigs pa
T02D2626:217a-28: nyid de / de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa yang yin la /
T02D2626:217a-29: rgyal po yang yin pa dang /
T02D2626:217a-30: sku gsum mngon par gsal ba nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2626:217a-31: rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
T02D2626:217a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shlo ka gcig tu bsdus so //
T02D2626:217a-33: de nyid las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yan lag 'byung ba'i phyir rdo rje yan lag ces bya'o //
T02D2626:217a-34: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de nyid gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2626:217a-35: rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i shugs dang ldan pa dang ;
T02D2626:217a-36: bdud kyi tshogs 'joms pa'i mtshon cha dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T02D2626:217a-37: phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su zhugs pa nyid kyis /
T02D2626:217a-38: rdo rje yan lag rdo rje mchog / ces pa
T02D2626:217a-39: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsdus so
T02D2626:217a-40: // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de nyid kyis nyon
T02D2626:217b-0: @217b mongs pa tha ma 'bigs par byed pa de
T02D2626:217b-1: // nyid dang / srid pa'i dra ba rab tu gcod pa nyid dang /
T02D2626:217b-2: chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod rgya mtsho lta bur mnga' ba nyid dang /
T02D2626:217b-3: thabs dang shes rab las byung ba nyid kyis /
T02D2626:217b-4: rdo rje mnga' ste rab 'bigs pa //
T02D2626:217b-5: zhes pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsdus so //
T02D2626:217b-6: de nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku'i sgo nas bstod pa
T02D2626:217b-7: ni sprul pa'i sku nyid smon pa med pa'i ting
T02D2626:217b-8: nge 'dzin las byung ba nyid dang /
T02D2626:217b-9: phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pa nyid dang /
T02D2626:217b-10: sna tshogs par sprul pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2626:217b-11: sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi tshogs 'joms shing
T02D2626:217b-12: ye shes skyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir
